h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, sekhabalaani {sekkhabalaani (ka0)}. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m {hiribala.m (sii0 pii0)}, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m {viriyabala.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhabalaani.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V2.0002^ea^, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `saddhaabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, hiriibalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, ottappabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, viiriyabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, pa~n~naabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalenaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^T3.0002^ea^ ^a^M2.0002^ea^ ^a^P3.0002^ea^, bhikkhave, sekhabalaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, hiriibala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako hirimaa hoti, hiriiyati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, hiriibala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, ottappabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ottappii hoti, ottappati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ottappabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa ^a^V2.0003^ea^ pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhabalaani.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m ^a^T3.0003^ea^ -- `saddhaabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, hiriibalena... ottappabalena ^a^P3.0003^ea^... viiriyabalena... pa~n~naabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalenaa'ti. eva~nhi kho, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m viharati savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa ^a^M2.0003^ea^ duggati paa.tika"nkhaa. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappii hoti, kusiito hoti, duppa~n~no hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m viharati savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hiriimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m, kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappii hoti ^a^V2.0004^ea^, kusiito hoti ^a^T3.0004^ea^, duppa~n~no hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0004^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hiriimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati, tassa di.t.theva {di.t.the ceva (sii0)} dhamme pa~nca sahadhammikaa vaadaanupaataa {vaadaanuvaadaa (a0 ni0 8.12; a0 ni0 3.58)} gaarayhaa .thaanaa aagacchanti. katame pa~nca? saddhaapi naama te naahosi kusalesu dhammesu, hiriipi naama te naahosi kusalesu dhammesu, ottappampi ^a^M2.0004^ea^ naama te naahosi kusalesu dhammesu, viiriyampi naama te naahosi kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naapi naama te naahosi kusalesu dhammesu. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati, tassa di.t.theva dhamme ime pa~nca sahadhammikaa vaadaanupaataa gaarayhaa .thaanaa aagacchanti.

[03] ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena assumukho {assumukhopi (syaa0)} rudamaano paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, tassa di.t.theva dhamme pa~nca sahadhammikaa paasa.msaa .thaanaa {paasa.msa.m .thaana.m (syaa0)} aagacchanti. katame ^a^T3.0005^ea^ pa~nca? saddhaapi naama te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu, hiriipi naama te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu, ottappampi naama te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu, viiriyampi naama te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naapi naama te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena assumukho rudamaano paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati, tassa di.t.theva ^a^P3.0005^ea^ dhamme ime pa~nca sahadhammikaa paasa.msaa .thaanaa aagacchantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``na ^a^V2.0005^ea^ taava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samaapatti hoti yaava saddhaa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti kusalesu dhammesu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, saddhaa antarahitaa hoti, asaddhiya.m pariyu.t.thaaya ti.t.thati; atha akusalassa samaapatti hoti.

[03] ``na taava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samaapatti hoti yaava hirii paccupa.t.thitaa hoti kusalesu dhammesu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, hirii antarahitaa hoti, ahirika.m pariyu.t.thaaya ti.t.thati; atha akusalassa samaapatti hoti.

[03] ``na taava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samaapatti hoti yaava ottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ottappa.m antarahita.m hoti, anottappa.m pariyu.t.thaaya ti.t.thati; atha akusalassa samaapatti hoti.

[03] ``na ^a^M2.0005^ea^ taava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samaapatti hoti yaava viiriya.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, viiriya.m antarahita.m hoti, kosajja.m ^a^T3.0006^ea^ pariyu.t.thaaya ti.t.thati; atha akusalassa samaapatti hoti.

[03] ``na taava, bhikkhave, akusalassa samaapatti hoti yaava pa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti kusalesu dhammesu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, pa~n~naa antarahitaa hoti, duppa~n~naa {duppa~n~na.m (ka0)} pariyu.t.thaaya ti.t.thati; atha akusalassa samaapatti hotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, sattaa kaamesu la.litaa {palaa.litaa (sii0)}. asitabyaabha"ngi.m {asitabyaabha"ngi cepi (?)}, bhikkhave, kulaputto ohaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, `saddhaapabbajito kulaputto'ti ala.m vacanaaya. ta.m kissa hetu? labbhaa {labbhaa hi (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, yobbanena kaamaa te ca kho yaadisaa vaa taadisaa vaa. ye ca, bhikkhave, hiinaa kaamaa ye ca majjhimaa kaamaa ye ca pa.niitaa kaamaa ^a^V2.0006^ea^, sabbe kaamaa `kaamaa'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti. seyyathaapi ^a^P3.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, daharo kumaaro mando uttaanaseyyako dhaatiyaa pamaadamanvaaya ka.t.tha.m vaa ka.thala.m {kathala.m (ka0)} vaa mukhe aahareyya. tamena.m dhaati siigha.m siigha.m {siighasiigha.m (sii0)} manasi kareyya; siigha.m siigha.m manasi karitvaa siigha.m siigha.m aahareyya. no ce sakku.neyya siigha.m siigha.m aaharitu.m, vaamena hatthena siisa.m pariggahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena va"nka"nguli.m karitvaa salohitampi aahareyya. ta.m kissa hetu? `atthesaa, bhikkhave, kumaarassa vihesaa; nesaa natthii'ti vadaami. kara.niiya~nca kho eta.m {eva.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, dhaatiyaa atthakaamaaya hitesiniyaa anukampikaaya, anukampa.m upaadaaya. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, so kumaaro vuddho ^a^T3.0007^ea^ hoti ala.mpa~n~no, anapekkhaa daani {anapekkhaa pana (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, dhaati tasmi.m kumaare hoti -- `attagutto daani kumaaro naala.m pamaadaayaa'ti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yaavakiiva~nca bhikkhuno saddhaaya akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, hiriyaa akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, ottappena akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, viiriyena akata.m hoti ^a^M2.0006^ea^ kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naaya akata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, anurakkhitabbo taava me so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno saddhaaya kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, hiriyaa kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, ottappena kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, viiriyena kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naaya kata.m hoti kusalesu dhammesu, anapekkho daanaaha.m, bhikkhave {panaaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, tasmi.m bhikkhusmi.m homi -- `attagutto daani bhikkhu naala.m pamaadaayaa'''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. katamehi pa~ncahi? asaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme ^a^P3.0007^ea^. ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. anottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. kusiito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. duppa~n~no, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme.

[03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0007^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati ^a^T3.0008^ea^, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. hiriimaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. ottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. aaraddhaviiriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. katamehi pa~ncahi? assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. anottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. kusiito ^a^M2.0007^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. duppa~n~no, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso cavati, nappati.t.thaati saddhamme.

[03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0008^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. hirimaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. ottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso ^a^T3.0009^ea^ na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. aaraddhaviiriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso na cavati, pati.t.thaati saddhamme''ti. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0008^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. anottappii, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. kusiito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. duppa~n~no, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye ^a^M2.0008^ea^ vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. hiriimaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu...pe0... ottappii, bhikkhave ^a^P3.0009^ea^, bhikkhu...pe0... aaraddhaviiriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu...pe0... pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0010^ea^, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu''nti. dasama.m.
[06] sekhabalavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sa.mkhitta.m vitthata.m dukkhaa, bhata.m sikkhaaya pa~ncama.m.
[22] samaapatti ca kaamesu, cavanaa dve agaaravaati..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``pubbaaha.m ^a^V2.0009^ea^, bhikkhave, ananussutesu dhammesu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippatto pa.tijaanaami. pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani, yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavattetii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P3.0010^ea^, bhikkhave, sekhabalaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiriibala.m, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhabalaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m sekhabalaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m pa~n~naabala.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0009^ea^, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0011^ea^, kuu.taagaarassa eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m kuu.ta.m. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m sekhabalaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m pa~n~naabala.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `saddhaabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalena, hiriibalena... ottappabalena... viiriyabalena... pa~n~naabalena samannaagataa bhavissaama sekhabalenaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0010^ea^, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti. tatiya.m.
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti ^a^P3.0011^ea^. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0012^ea^, satibala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako satimaa hoti paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, satibala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, samaadhibala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m ^a^M2.0010^ea^ pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti ^a^V2.0011^ea^ -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, samaadhibala.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m ^a^P3.0012^ea^. kattha ca, bhikkhave, saddhaabala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu sotaapattiya"ngesu. ettha saddhaabala.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, viiriyabala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu sammappadhaanesu. ettha viiriyabala.m ^a^T3.0013^ea^ da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, satibala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu. ettha satibala.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, samaadhibala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu jhaanesu. ettha samaadhibala.m da.t.thabba.m. kattha ca, bhikkhave, pa~n~naabala.m da.t.thabba.m? catuusu ariyasaccesu. ettha pa~n~naabala.m da.t.thabba.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaani. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m balaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m pa~n~naabala.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m kuu.ta.m. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m balaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaataniya.m, yadida.m pa~n~naabala''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0012^ea^ ^a^M2.0011^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa samaadhisampanno hoti, no para.m samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa pa~n~naasampanno hoti, no para.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa vimuttisampanno hoti, no para.m vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, no para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. imehi ^a^P3.0013^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ^a^T3.0014^ea^ bhikkhu attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaayaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no attahitaaya. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa na siilasampanno hoti, para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na samaadhisampanno hoti, para.m samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na pa~n~naasampanno hoti, para.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimuttisampanno hoti, para.m vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no attahitaayaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu neva attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa na siilasampanno hoti, no para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na samaadhisampanno hoti, no para.m samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na pa~n~naasampanno hoti, no para.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimuttisampanno hoti, no para.m vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, no para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. imehi ^a^P3.0014^ea^ kho ^a^V2.0013^ea^ ^a^M2.0012^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu neva attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0015^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu attahitaaya ca pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti, para~nca siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti, para~nca samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti, attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, para~nca pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, para~nca vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, para~nca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu attahitaaya ca pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya caa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] balavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] ananussutakuu.ta~nca, sa.mkhitta.m vitthatena ca.
[22] da.t.thabba~nca puna kuu.ta.m, cattaaropi hitena caati..

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V2.0014^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso asabhaagavuttiko `sabrahmacaariisu aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m ^a^P3.0015^ea^ paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m aparipuuretvaa sekha.m {sekkha.m (ka0)} dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m ^a^T3.0016^ea^ .thaana.m vijjati. `sekha.m dhamma.m aparipuuretvaa siilaani paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `siilaani aparipuuretvaa sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sammaadi.t.thi.m aparipuuretvaa sammaasamaadhi.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[01] ``so ^a^M2.0013^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso sabhaagavuttiko `sabrahmacaariisu aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa siilaani paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `siilaani paripuuretvaa sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuretvaa sammaasamaadhi.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V2.0015^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaaravo appatisso asabhaagavuttiko `sabrahmacaariisu aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m aparipuuretvaa sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sekha.m dhamma.m aparipuuretvaa siilakkhandha.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `siilakkhandha.m aparipuuretvaa samaadhikkhandha.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `samaadhikkhandha.m aparipuuretvaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[01] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaaravo sappatisso sabhaagavuttiko `sabrahmacaariisu aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa siilakkhandha.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `siilakkhandha.m paripuuretvaa samaadhikkhandha.m ^a^T3.0017^ea^ paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m ^a^P3.0016^ea^ vijjati. `samaadhikkhandha.m paripuuretvaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya. katame pa~nca? ayo, loha.m, tipu, siisa.m, sajjha.m {sajjhu (sii0)} -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca jaataruupassa upakkilesaa ^a^M2.0014^ea^, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m jaataruupa.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, jaataruupa.m imehi pa~ncahi upakkilesehi vimutta.m {vippamutta.m (sii0)} hoti, ta.m hoti jaataruupa.m mudu ca kammaniya~nca pabhassara~nca na ca pabha"ngu sammaa upeti kammaaya. yassaa yassaa ca {yassa kassaci (syaa0 pii0)} pi.landhanavikatiyaa aaka"nkhati -- yadi muddikaaya yadi ku.n.dalaaya yadi giiveyyakaaya {giiveyyakena (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0, a0 ni0 3.102)} yadi suva.n.namaalaaya -- ta~ncassa attha.m anubhoti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime cittassa upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m citta.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya. katame pa~nca? kaamacchando, byaapaado, thinamiddha.m {thiinamiddha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, uddhaccakukkucca.m, vicikicchaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca cittassa upakkilesaa yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.tha.m citta.m na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca na ca sammaa ^a^T3.0018^ea^ samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, citta.m imehi pa~ncahi upakkilesehi vimutta.m hoti, ta.m hoti citta.m mudu ca kammaniya~nca ^a^P3.0017^ea^ pabhassara~nca na ca pabha"ngu sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya. yassa yassa ca abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^V2.0016^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhaveyya.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa assa.m, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko assa.m; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m kareyya.m, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaano gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kameyya.m, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye {candimasuriye (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimaseyya.m {paraamaseyya.m (ka0)} parimajjeyya.m yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^M2.0015^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.neyya.m -- dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa'ti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaaneyya.m -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti ^a^P3.0018^ea^ pajaaneyya.m, sadosa.m vaa citta.m sadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitadosa.m vaa ^a^T3.0019^ea^ citta.m viitadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, samoha.m vaa citta.m samoha.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m viitamoha.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m sa.mkhitta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m vikkhitta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, mahaggata.m vaa citta.m mahaggata.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, amahaggata.m vaa citta.m amahaggata.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, sauttara.m vaa citta.m sauttara.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, anuttara.m vaa citta.m anuttara.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, samaahita.m vaa citta.m samaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, asamaahita.m vaa citta.m asamaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya.m, seyyathida.m {seyyathiida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaariisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi ^a^V2.0017^ea^ sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato ^a^T3.0020^ea^ cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapannoti, iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^M2.0016^ea^ ^a^P3.0019^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passeyya.m cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya.m -- ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaati, iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passeyya.m cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.168; 6.50; 7.65} ``dussiilassa ^a^T3.0021^ea^, bhikkhave, siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0018^ea^, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi na paaripuuri.m ^a^P3.0020^ea^ gacchati, pheggupi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti ^a^M2.0017^ea^ nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``siilavato, bhikkhave, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi paaripuuri.m gacchati, pheggupi paaripuuri.m gacchati, saaropi paaripuuri.m gacchati; evameva.m ^a^T3.0022^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, siilavato siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. catuttha.m.
[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha ^a^P3.0021^ea^, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi siilaanuggahitaa ca hoti, sutaanuggahitaa ca hoti, saakacchaanuggahitaa ca hoti, samathaanuggahitaa ca hoti, vipassanaanuggahitaa ca hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa caa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0019^ea^, bhikkhave, vimuttaayatanaani yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa ^a^M2.0018^ea^ vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno satthaa dhamma.m deseti a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, tassa bhikkhuno satthaa dhamma.m deseti, a~n~nataro ^a^T3.0023^ea^ vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m {paamujja.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) dii0 ni0 3.322} jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti {vediyati (sii0)}. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m deseti, a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, api ca kho yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m ^a^P3.0022^ea^ yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m deseti, a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, naapi yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti, api ca kho yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0024^ea^, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m ^a^V2.0020^ea^ yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino ^a^M2.0019^ea^ dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino...pe0... yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m deseti, a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, naapi yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti, naapi yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti; api ca kho yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m ^a^P3.0023^ea^ dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m deseti a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, naapi yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti ^a^T3.0025^ea^, naapi yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti, naapi yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati; api ca khvassa a~n~natara.m samaadhinimitta.m suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno a~n~natara.m samaadhinimitta.m suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m vimuttaayatana.m yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa ^a^P3.0024^ea^ viharato ^a^V2.0021^ea^ avimutta.m vaa citta.m ^a^M2.0020^ea^ vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca vimuttaayatanaani yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa vaa aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta.m vaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha appamaa.na.m nipakaa patissataa. samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavayata.m appamaa.na.m nipakaana.m patissataana.m pa~nca ~naa.naani paccatta~n~neva uppajjanti. katamaani pa~nca? `aya.m samaadhi paccuppannasukho ceva aayati~nca sukhavipaako'ti paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `aya.m samaadhi ariyo niraamiso'ti paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `aya.m samaadhi akaapurisasevito'ti {mahaapurisasevitoti (ka0)} paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `aya.m samaadhi santo ^a^T3.0026^ea^ pa.niito pa.tippassaddhaladdho ekodibhaavaadhigato, na sa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato'ti {na ca sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritappatitoti (sii0), na ca sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritapattoti (syaa0), na ca sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaarivaava.toti (ka0), na sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaariyaadhigatoti (?) dii0 ni0 3.355; a0 ni0 3.102; 9.27} paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati, `sato kho panaaha.m ima.m samaapajjaami sato vu.t.thahaamii'ti {so kho panaaha.m ima.m samaadhi.m satova samaapajjaami, sato u.t.thahaamiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} paccatta~n~neva ~naa.na.m uppajjati.

[01] ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha appamaa.na.m nipakaa patissataa. samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavayata.m appamaa.na.m nipakaana.m patissataana.m imaani pa~nca ~naa.naani paccatta~n~neva uppajjantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``ariyassa ^a^P3.0025^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa bhaavana.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamaa ^a^M2.0021^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, ariyassa pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa bhaavanaa? idha, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0022^ea^, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho nhaapako {nahaapako (sii0 pii0)} vaa nhaapakantevaasii vaa ka.msathaale nhaaniiyacu.n.naani {nahaaniiyacu.n.naani (sii0 pii0)} aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m sanneyya. saaya.m nhaaniiyapi.n.di {saassa nahaaniiyapi.n.dii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} snehaanugataa snehaparetaa santarabaahiraa phu.taa snehena, na ca paggharinii. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa aya.m pa.thamaa bhaavanaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T3.0027^ea^ viharati. so imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhiiro ubbhidodako {ubbhitodako (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tassa nevassa puratthimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na pacchimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na uttaraaya disaaya ^a^P3.0026^ea^ udakassa aayamukha.m, na dakkhi.naaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, devo ca kaalena kaala.m sammaa dhaara.m naanuppaveccheyya {devo ca na kaalena... anupaveccheyya (dii0 ni0 1.227 aadayo; ma0 ni0 2.251 aadayo}. atha kho tamhaava udakarahadaa siitaa vaaridhaaraa ubbhijjitvaa tameva udakarahada.m siitena vaarinaa abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripuureyya paripphareyya; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato udakarahadassa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa aya.m dutiyaa bhaavanaa.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0022^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m ^a^V2.0023^ea^ vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani anto nimuggaposiini. taani yaava ^a^T3.0028^ea^ caggaa yaava ca muulaa siitena vaarinaa abhisannaani parisannaani paripuuraani paripphu.taani; naassa ki~nci sabbaavata.m uppalaana.m vaa padumaana.m vaa pu.n.dariikaana.m vaa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa aya.m tatiyaa bhaavanaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa ^a^P3.0027^ea^ ...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno hoti; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso odaatena vatthena sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisinno assa; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa odaatena vatthena apphu.ta.m assa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno hoti; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa aya.m catutthaa bhaavanaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naanimitta.m suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, a~n~nova a~n~na.m {a~n~no vaa a~n~na.m vaa (sii0), a~n~no vaa a~n~na.m (syaa0 ka.m0), a~n~no a~n~na.m (?)} paccavekkheyya, .thito vaa nisinna.m paccavekkheyya, nisinno vaa nipanna.m paccavekkheyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naanimitta.m ^a^T3.0029^ea^ suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. ariyassa, bhikkhave, pa~nca"ngikassa sammaasamaadhissa aya.m pa~ncamaa {pa~ncamii (sii0)} bhaavanaa. eva.m bhaavite kho ^a^M2.0023^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu {eva.m bhaavite kho bhikkhave (sii0)} ariye pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udakama.niko aadhaare .thapito puuro udakassa samatittiko kaakapeyyo ^a^V2.0024^ea^. tamena.m balavaa puriso yato yato aavajjeyya {aava.t.teyya (syaa0 ka.m0)}, aagaccheyya udaka''nti? ``eva.m, bhante'' ^a^P3.0028^ea^. ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m bhaavite ariye pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, same bhuumibhaage pokkhara.nii catura.msaa aalibaddhaa puuraa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. tamena.m balavaa puriso yato yato aali.m mu~nceyya, aagaccheyya udaka''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m bhaavite ariye pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa...pe0... sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, subhuumiya.m catumahaapathe {caatummahaapathe (sii0 pii0), catummahaapathe (syaa0 ka.m0)} aaja~n~naratho yutto assa .thito odhastapatodo ^a^T3.0030^ea^. tamena.m dakkho yoggaacariyo assadammasaarathi abhiruhitvaa vaamena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena patoda.m gahetvaa yenicchaka.m yadicchaka.m saareyyapi paccaasaareyyapi. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m bhaavite ariye pa~nca"ngike sammaasamaadhimhi eva.m bahuliikate yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhaveyya.m ^a^P3.0029^ea^ -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa assa.m...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^M2.0024^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.neyya.m -- dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa'ti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aka"nkhati -- `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaaneyya.m -- saraaga.m ^a^V2.0025^ea^ vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, sadosa.m vaa citta.m... viitadosa.m vaa citta.m... samoha.m vaa citta.m... viitamoha.m vaa citta.m... sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m... vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m... mahaggata.m vaa citta.m... amahaggata.m vaa citta.m... sauttara.m vaa citta.m... anuttara.m vaa citta.m... samaahita.m vaa citta.m... asamaahita.m vaa citta.m... vimutta.m vaa citta.m... avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya.m, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m, dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva ^a^T3.0031^ea^ sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati sati aayatane''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, ca"nkame aanisa.msaa. katame pa~nca? addhaanakkhamo ^a^P3.0030^ea^ hoti, padhaanakkhamo hoti, appaabaadho hoti, asita.m piita.m khaayita.m saayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, ca"nkamaadhigato samaadhi cira.t.thitiko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca ca"nkame aanisa.msaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M2.0025^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena icchaana"ngala.m naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa ^a^V2.0026^ea^ icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. assosu.m kho icchaana"ngalakaa {icchaana"ngalikaa (sii0) a0 ni0 6.42; a0 ni0 8.86} braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito icchaana"ngala.m anuppatto; icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi, satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m ^a^T3.0032^ea^ brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti. atha kho icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya yena icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.tha.msu uccaasaddamahaasaddaa.

[03] tena ^a^P3.0031^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagito bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m naagita.m aamantesi -- ``ke pana kho, naagita, uccaasaddamahaasaddaa, keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``ete, bhante, icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya bahidvaarako.t.thake .thitaa bhagavanta~n~neva uddissa bhikkhusa"ngha~ncaa''ti. ``maaha.m, naagita, yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo kho, naagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii ^a^M2.0026^ea^ akasiralaabhii. so ta.m {soha.m (ka0), so (syaa0 ka.m0)} mii.lhasukha.m middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m saadiyeyyaa''ti.

[03] ``adhivaasetu daani, bhante, bhagavaa, adhivaasetu sugato; adhivaasanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato. yena yeneva daani bhagavaa gamissati ta.mninnaava gamissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. seyyathaapi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathaaninna.m udakaani pavattanti; evameva.m kho, bhante, yena yeneva daani bhagavaa gamissati, ta.mninnaava gamissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva ^a^T3.0033^ea^ jaanapadaa ca. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi, bhante, bhagavato siilapa~n~naa.na''nti.

[03] ``maaha.m ^a^V2.0027^ea^, naagita, yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo kho, naagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. so ta.m mii.lhasukha.m middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m saadiyeyya. asitapiitakhaayitasaayitassa ^a^P3.0032^ea^ kho, naagita, uccaarapassaavo -- eso tassa nissando. piyaana.m kho, naagita, vipari.naama~n~nathaabhaavaa uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa -- eso tassa nissando. asubhanimittaanuyoga.m anuyuttassa kho, naagita, subhanimitte paa.tikulyataa {pa.tikkuulataa (sii0), pa.tikkuulyataa (syaa0 ka.m0)} sa.n.thaati -- eso tassa nissando. chasu kho, naagita, phassaayatanesu aniccaanupassino viharato phasse paa.tikulyataa sa.n.thaati -- eso tassa nissando. pa~ncasu kho, naagita, upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassino viharato upaadaane paa.tikulyataa sa.n.thaati -- eso tassa nissando''ti. dasama.m.
[06] pa~nca"ngikavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T3.0034^ea^ ^a^M2.0027^ea^ ^a^V2.0028^ea^ samaya.m...pe0... anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sumanaa raajakumaarii pa~ncahi rathasatehi pa~ncahi raajakumaarisatehi parivutaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho sumanaa raajakumaarii bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhassu, bhante, bhagavato dve saavakaa samasaddhaa samasiilaa samapa~n~naa -- eko daayako, eko adaayako. te kaayassa bhedaa ^a^P3.0033^ea^ para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyu.m. devabhuutaana.m pana nesa.m {tesa.m (sii0)}, bhante, siyaa viseso, siyaa naanaakara.na''nti?

[03] ``siyaa, sumane''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``yo so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m devabhuuto samaano pa~ncahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati -- dibbena aayunaa, dibbena va.n.nena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena aadhipateyyena. yo so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m devabhuuto samaano imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati''.

[03] ``sace pana te, bhante, tato cutaa itthatta.m aagacchanti, manussabhuutaana.m pana nesa.m, bhante, siyaa viseso, siyaa naanaakara.na''nti? ``siyaa, sumane''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``yo so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m manussabhuuto samaano pa~ncahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati -- maanusakena aayunaa, maanusakena va.n.nena, maanusakena sukhena, maanusakena yasena, maanusakena aadhipateyyena. yo so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m manussabhuuto samaano imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati''.

[03] ``sace ^a^T3.0035^ea^ pana te, bhante, ubho agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, pabbajitaana.m pana nesa.m, bhante ^a^V2.0029^ea^, siyaa viseso, siyaa naanaakara.na''nti? ``siyaa, sumane''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``yo so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m pabbajito samaano pa~ncahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati -- yaacitova bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati appa.m ayaacito, yaacitova bahula.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njati ^a^M2.0028^ea^ appa.m ayaacito, yaacitova bahula.m senaasana.m paribhu~njati appa.m ayaacito, yaacitova bahula.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njati appa.m ayaacito. yehi kho pana sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharati tyassa manaapeneva bahula.m kaayakammena samudaacaranti appa.m amanaapena, manaapeneva bahula.m vaciikammena samudaacaranti appa.m amanaapena, manaapeneva bahula.m manokammena samudaacaranti appa.m amanaapena, manaapa.myeva bahula.m upahaara.m upaharanti appa.m amanaapa.m ^a^P3.0034^ea^. yo so, sumane, daayako so amu.m adaayaka.m pabbajito samaano imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaatii''ti.

[03] ``sace pana te, bhante, ubho arahatta.m paapu.nanti, arahattappattaana.m pana nesa.m, bhante, siyaa viseso, siyaa naanaakara.na''nti? ``ettha kho panesaaha.m, sumane, na ki~nci naanaakara.na.m vadaami, yadida.m vimuttiyaa vimutti''nti {vimuttanti (syaa0 ka.m0)}.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava~ncida.m, bhante, alameva daanaani daatu.m ala.m pu~n~naani kaatu.m; yatra hi naama devabhuutassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naani, manussabhuutassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naani, pabbajitassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naanii''ti. ``evameta.m, sumane! ala~nhi, sumane, daanaani daatu.m ala.m pu~n~naani kaatu.m! devabhuutassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naani, manussabhuutassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naani, pabbajitassaapi upakaaraani pu~n~naanii''ti ^a^T3.0036^ea^.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana {ida.m vatvaa (sii0 pii0) evamuparipi} sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``yathaapi cando vimalo, gaccha.m aakaasadhaatuyaa.
[22] sabbe taaraaga.ne loke, aabhaaya atirocati..
[21] ``tatheva siilasampanno, saddho purisapuggalo.
[22] sabbe maccharino loke, caagena atirocati..

[22] thala.m ninna~nca puureti, abhivassa.m vasundhara.m..
[21] ``eva.m dassanasampanno, sammaasambuddhasaavako.
[22] macchari.m adhiga.nhaati, pa~nca.thaanehi pa.n.dito..

[22] sa ve bhogaparibyuu.lho {bhogaparibbuu.lho (sii0)}, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P3.0035^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho cundii raajakumaarii pa~ncahi rathasatehi pa~ncahi ca kumaarisatehi parivutaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho cundii raajakumaarii bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``amhaaka.m, bhante, bhaataa cundo naama ^a^T3.0037^ea^ raajakumaaro, so evamaaha -- `yadeva so hoti itthii vaa puriso vaa buddha.m sara.na.m gato, dhamma.m sara.na.m gato, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato, paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati'nti. saaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m pucchaami -- `katha.mruupe kho, bhante, satthari pasanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati.m? katha.mruupe dhamme pasanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati.m? katha.mruupe sa"nghe pasanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati.m? katha.mruupesu siilesu paripuurakaarii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.myeva upapajjati, no duggati'''nti?

[03] ``yaavataa, cundi, sattaa apadaa vaa dvipadaa vaa catuppadaa vaa bahuppadaa vaa {apaadaa vaa dviipaadaa vaacatuppaadaa vaa bahuppaadaa vaa (sii0) a0 ni0 4.34; itivu0 90} ruupino vaa aruupino vaa sa~n~nino vaa asa~n~nino vaa nevasa~n~ninaasa~n~nino vaa, tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayati ^a^V2.0031^ea^ araha.m sammaasambuddho. ye kho, cundi, buddhe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa, cundi, dhammaa sa"nkhataa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo tesa.m aggamakkhaayati. ye, cundi, ariye a.t.tha"ngike magge pasannaa, agge te pasannaa, agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa ^a^M2.0030^ea^, cundi, dhammaa sa"nkhataa vaa asa"nkhataa vaa, viraago tesa.m {tesa.m dhammaana.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- madanimmadano pipaasavinayo aalayasamugghaato va.t.tupacchedo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. ye kho, cundi ^a^P3.0036^ea^, viraage ^a^T3.0038^ea^ dhamme pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa, cundi, sa"nghaa vaa ga.naa vaa, tathaagatasaavakasa"ngho tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa, esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. ye kho, cundi, sa"nghe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa, cundi, siilaani, ariyakantaani siilaani tesa.m {ariyakantaanitesa.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m -- akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. ye kho, cundi, ariyakantesu siilesu paripuurakaarino, agge te paripuurakaarino. agge kho pana paripuurakaariina.m aggo vipaako hotii''ti.
[21] ``aggato ve pasannaana.m, agga.m dhamma.m vijaanata.m.
[22] agge buddhe pasannaana.m, dakkhi.neyye anuttare..
[21] ``agge dhamme pasannaana.m, viraaguupasame sukhe.
[22] agge sa"nghe pasannaana.m, pu~n~nakkhette anuttare..
[21] ``aggasmi.m ^a^V2.0032^ea^ daana.m dadata.m, agga.m pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati.
[22] agga.m aayu ca va.n.no ca, yaso kitti sukha.m bala.m..
[21] ``aggassa daataa medhaavii, aggadhammasamaahito.
[22] devabhuuto manusso vaa, aggappatto pamodatii''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa bhaddiye viharati jaatiyaa vane. atha kho uggaho ^a^T3.0039^ea^ me.n.dakanattaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``adhivaasetu ^a^M2.0031^ea^ me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya attacatuttho bhatta''nti ^a^P3.0037^ea^. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena uggahassa me.n.dakanattuno nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uggaho me.n.dakanattaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imaa me, bhante, kumaariyo patikulaani gamissanti. ovadatu taasa.m, bhante, bhagavaa; anusaasatu taasa.m, bhante, bhagavaa, ya.m taasa.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa taa kumaariyo etadavoca -- ``tasmaatiha, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yassa vo {yassa kho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} maataapitaro bhattuno dassanti atthakaamaa hitesino anukampakaa anukampa.m upaadaaya, tassa bhavissaama pubbu.t.thaayiniyo pacchaanipaatiniyo ki.mkaarapa.tissaaviniyo ^a^V2.0033^ea^ manaapacaariniyo piyavaadiniyo'ti. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ye te bhattu garuno {guruno (ka0)} bhavissanti maataati vaa pitaati vaa sama.nabraahma.naati vaa, te sakkarissaama garu.m karissaama {garukarissaama (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maanessaama puujessaama abbhaagate ca aasanodakena pa.tipuujessaamaa'ti {puujessaamaati (sii0)}. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^T3.0040^ea^, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ye te bhattu abbhantaraa kammantaa u.n.naati vaa kappaasaati vaa, tattha dakkhaa bhavissaama analasaa ^a^M2.0032^ea^, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagataa, ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatu'nti. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yo so bhattu abbhantaro {abbhantare (ka0)} antojano daasaati vaa pessaati vaa ^a^P3.0038^ea^ kammakaraati vaa, tesa.m kata~nca katato jaanissaama akata~nca akatato jaanissaama, gilaanakaana~nca balaabala.m jaanissaama, khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya~ncassa pacca.msena {paccaya.m tena (ka0 sii0), paccaya.msena (syaa0 ka.m0), paccaya.m senaasana.m paccatta.msena (ka0) a0 ni0 8.46} sa.mvibhajissaamaa'ti {vibhajissaamaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, kumaariyo, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `ya.m bhattaa aaharissati dhana.m vaa dha~n~na.m vaa rajata.m vaa jaataruupa.m vaa, ta.m aarakkhena {ta.m aarakkhaaya (sii0)} guttiyaa sampaadessaama, tattha ca bhavissaama adhuttii athenii aso.n.dii avinaasikaayo'ti. eva~nhi vo, kumaariyo, sikkhitabba.m. imehi kho, kumaariyo, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa manaapakaayikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii''ti.
[21] ``yo na.m bharati sabbadaa, nicca.m aataapi ussuko.
[22] sabbakaamahara.m posa.m, bhattaara.m naatima~n~nati..
[21] ``na ^a^T3.0041^ea^ caapi sotthi bhattaara.m, issaacaarena {icchaacaarena (sii0), issaavaadena (pii0)} rosaye.
[22] bhattu ca garuno sabbe, pa.tipuujeti pa.n.ditaa..
[21] ``u.t.thaahikaa ^a^V2.0034^ea^ {u.t.thaayikaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} analasaa, sa"ngahitaparijjanaa.
[22] bhattu manaapa.m {manaapaa (sii0)} carati, sambhata.m anurakkhati..
[21] ``yaa eva.m vattatii naarii, bhattuchandavasaanugaa.
[22] manaapaa naama te devaa, yattha saa upapajjatii''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho siiho senaapati yena bhagavaa ^a^P3.0039^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M2.0033^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sakkaa nu kho, bhante, bhagavaa sandi.t.thika.m daanaphala.m pa~n~naapetu''nti?

[03] ``sakkaa, siihaa''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``daayako, siiha, daanapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo. yampi, siiha, daayako daanapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo, idampi sandi.t.thika.m daanaphala.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m, siiha, daayaka.m daanapati.m santo sappurisaa bhajanti. yampi, siiha, daayaka.m daanapati.m santo sappurisaa bhajanti, idampi sandi.t.thika.m daanaphala.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m, siiha, daayakassa daanapatino kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. yampi, siiha, daayakassa daanapatino kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, idampi sandi.t.thika.m daanaphala.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, siiha, daayako daanapati ya.m yadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado ^a^T3.0042^ea^ {visaaradova (sii0) a0 ni0 7.57 passitabba.m} upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto. yampi, siiha, daayako daanapati ya.m yadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati -- yadi ^a^V2.0035^ea^ khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto, idampi sandi.t.thika.m daanaphala.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, siiha, daayako daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. yampi, siiha, daayako daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, ida.m {idampi siiha (ka0)} samparaayika.m daanaphala''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte siiho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa cattaari sandi.t.thikaani daanaphalaani akkhaataani, naaha.m ettha bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami; aha.m petaani jaanaami. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati bahuno janassa piyo manaapo. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati; ma.m santo sappurisaa bhajanti. aha.m, bhante, daayako daanapati; mayha.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `siiho senaapati daayako kaarako ^a^M2.0034^ea^ sa"nghupa.t.thaako'ti. aha.m, bhante ^a^P3.0040^ea^, daayako daanapati ya.m yadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamaami -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado upasa"nkamaami ama"nkubhuuto. yaanimaani, bhante, bhagavataa cattaari sandi.t.thikaani daanaphalaani akkhaataani, naaha.m ettha bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami; aha.m petaani jaanaami. ya~nca kho ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa evamaaha -- `daayako, siiha, daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatii'ti, etaaha.m na jaanaami; ettha ca panaaha.m ^a^T3.0043^ea^ bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaamii''ti. ``evameta.m, siiha, evameta.m, siiha! daayako daanapati kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatii''ti.
[21] ``dada.m piyo hoti bhajanti na.m bahuu,
[27] kitti~nca pappoti yaso ca va.d.dhati {yasassa va.d.dhati (syaa0 ka.m0), yasa.m pava.d.dhati (ka0)}.
[26] ama"nkubhuuto parisa.m vigaahati,
[22] visaarado hoti naro amaccharii..
[21] ``tasmaa hi daanaani dadanti pa.n.ditaa,
[27] vineyya maccheramala.m sukhesino.
[26] te ^a^V2.0036^ea^ diigharatta.m tidive pati.t.thitaa,
[22] devaana.m sahabyagataa ramanti te {sahabyata.m gataa ramanti (sii0), sahabyataa ramanti te (ka0)}..
[21] ``kataavakaasaa katakusalaa ito cutaa {tato cutaa (sii0)},
[27] saya.mpabhaa anuvicaranti nandana.m {nandane (syaa0 ka.m0)}.
[26] te tattha nandanti ramanti modare,
[27] samappitaa kaamagu.nehi pa~ncahi.
[26] ``katvaana vaakya.m asitassa taadino,
[22] ramanti sagge {ramanti sumanaa (ka0), kamanti sabbe (syaa0 ka.m0)} sugatassa saavakaa''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0041^ea^, bhikkhave, daane aanisa.msaa. katame pa~nca? bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo; santo sappurisaa bhajanti; kalyaa.no kittisaddo ^a^M2.0035^ea^ abbhuggacchati; gihidhammaa anapagato {gihidhammaa anapeto (sii0 pii0), gihidhammamanupagato (ka0)} hoti; kaayassa ^a^T3.0044^ea^ bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca daane aanisa.msaa''ti.
[21] ``dadamaano piyo hoti, sata.m dhamma.m anukkama.m.
[22] santo na.m sadaa bhajanti {santo bhajanti sappurisaa (sii0)}, sa~n~nataa brahmacaarayo..
[21] ``te tassa dhamma.m desenti, sabbadukkhaapanuudana.m.
[22] ya.m so dhamma.m idha~n~naaya, parinibbaati anaasavo''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, kaaladaanaani. katamaani pa~nca? aagantukassa daana.m deti; gamikassa daana.m deti; gilaanassa daana.m deti; dubbhikkhe daana.m deti; yaani taani navasassaani ^a^V2.0037^ea^ navaphalaani taani pa.thama.m siilavantesu pati.t.thaapeti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaaladaanaanii''ti.
[21] ``kaale dadanti sappa~n~naa, vada~n~nuu viitamaccharaa.
[22] kaalena dinna.m ariyesu, ujubhuutesu taadisu..
[21] ``vippasannamanaa tassa, vipulaa hoti dakkhi.naa.
[27] ye tattha anumodanti, veyyaavacca.m karonti vaa.
[22] na tena {na tesa.m (pii0 ka0)} dakkhi.naa uunaa, tepi pu~n~nassa bhaagino..
[21] ``tasmaa dade appa.tivaanacitto, yattha dinna.m mahapphala.m.
[22] pu~n~naani paralokasmi.m, pati.t.thaa honti paa.nina''nti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``bhojana.m ^a^P3.0042^ea^, bhikkhave, dadamaano daayako pa.tiggaahakaana.m pa~nca .thaanaani deti. katamaani pa~nca? aayu.m deti, va.n.na.m deti, sukha.m deti, bala.m deti, pa.tibhaana.m {pa.tibhaa.na.m (sii0)} deti. aayu.m kho pana datvaa aayussa ^a^T3.0045^ea^ bhaagii hoti dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa; va.n.na.m datvaa va.n.nassa bhaagii hoti dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa; sukha.m datvaa sukhassa bhaagii hoti dibbassa vaa maanusassa ^a^M2.0036^ea^ vaa; bala.m datvaa balassa bhaagii hoti dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa; pa.tibhaana.m datvaa pa.tibhaanassa bhaagii hoti dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa. bhojana.m, bhikkhave, dadamaano daayako pa.tiggaahakaana.m imaani pa~nca .thaanaani detii''ti.

[22] diighaayu yasavaa hoti, yattha yatthuupapajjatii''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0038^ea^, bhikkhave, saddhe kulaputte aanisa.msaa. katame pa~nca? ye te, bhikkhave, loke santo sappurisaa te saddha~n~neva pa.thama.m anukampantaa anukampanti, no tathaa assaddha.m; saddha~n~neva pa.thama.m upasa"nkamantaa upasa"nkamanti, no tathaa assaddha.m; saddha~n~neva pa.thama.m pa.tigga.nhantaa pa.tigga.nhanti, no tathaa assaddha.m; saddha~n~neva pa.thama.m dhamma.m desentaa desenti, no tathaa assaddha.m; saddho kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca saddhe kulaputte aanisa.msaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, subhuumiya.m catumahaapathe mahaanigrodho samantaa pakkhiina.m pa.tisara.na.m hoti; evameva.m ^a^P3.0043^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, saddho kulaputto bahuno janassa pa.tisara.na.m hoti bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T3.0046^ea^ bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana''nti.
[21] ``saakhaapattaphaluupeto {saakhaapattabahupeto (katthaci), saakhaapattapalaasuupeto (?)}, khandhimaava {khandhimaa ca (sii0)} mahaadumo.
[22] muulavaa phalasampanno, pati.t.thaa hoti pakkhina.m..
[21] ``manorame aayatane, sevanti na.m viha"ngamaa.
[22] chaaya.m chaayatthikaa {chaayatthino (sii0)} yanti, phalatthaa phalabhojino..
[21] ``tatheva siilasampanna.m, saddha.m purisapuggala.m.
[22] nivaatavutti.m atthaddha.m, sorata.m sakhila.m mudu.m..
[21] ``viitaraagaa ^a^M2.0037^ea^ viitadosaa, viitamohaa anaasavaa.
[22] pu~n~nakkhettaani lokasmi.m, sevanti taadisa.m nara.m..
[21] ``te tassa dhamma.m desenti, sabbadukkhaapanuudana.m.
[22] ya.m so dhamma.m idha~n~naaya, parinibbaati anaasavo''ti.. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0039^ea^, bhikkhave, .thaanaani sampassantaa maataapitaro putta.m icchanti kule jaayamaana.m. katamaani pa~nca? bhato vaa no bharissati; kicca.m vaa no karissati; kulava.mso cira.m .thassati; daayajja.m pa.tipajjissati; atha vaa pana petaana.m kaala"nkataana.m dakkhi.na.m anuppadassatiiti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca .thaanaani sampassantaa maataapitaro putta.m icchanti kule jaayamaana''nti.
[21] {kathaa0 491} ``pa~nca .thaanaani sampassa.m, putta.m icchanti pa.n.ditaa.
[22] bhato vaa no bharissati, kicca.m vaa no karissati..
[21] ``kulava.mso cira.m ti.t.the, daayajja.m pa.tipajjati.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``himavanta.m, bhikkhave, pabbataraaja.m nissaaya mahaasaalaa pa~ncahi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhanti. katamaahi pa~ncahi? saakhaapattapalaasena va.d.dhanti; tacena va.d.dhanti; papa.tikaaya va.d.dhanti; pheggunaa va.d.dhanti; saarena va.d.dhanti. himavanta.m, bhikkhave, pabbataraaja.m nissaaya mahaasaalaa imaahi pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0040^ea^ va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhanti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, saddha.m kulaputta.m nissaaya antojano pa~ncahi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhati. katamaahi ^a^M2.0038^ea^ pa~ncahi? saddhaaya va.d.dhati; siilena va.d.dhati; sutena va.d.dhati; caagena va.d.dhati; pa~n~naaya va.d.dhati. saddha.m, bhikkhave, kulaputta.m nissaaya antojano imaahi pa~ncahi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhatii''ti.
[21] ``yathaa hi pabbato selo, ara~n~nasmi.m brahaavane.
[22] ta.m rukkhaa upanissaaya, va.d.dhante te vanappatii..

[22] passamaanaanukubbanti, ye bhavanti vicakkha.naa..
[21] ``ima.m dhamma.m caritvaana, magga.m {sagga.m (syaa0 ka0)} sugatigaamina.m.
[22] nandino devalokasmi.m, modanti kaamakaamino''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] sumanavaggo catuttho.
