[03] 41^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0041^ea^ ^a^P3.0045^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``pa~ncime, gahapati, bhogaana.m aadiyaa. katame pa~nca? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m ^a^M2.0039^ea^ pariharati; maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati; puttadaaradaasakammakaraporise sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati. aya.m pa.thamo bhogaana.m aadiyo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi ^a^T3.0049^ea^ bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati. aya.m dutiyo bhogaana.m aadiyo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi yaa taa honti aapadaa -- aggito vaa udakato vaa raajato vaa corato vaa appiyato vaa daayaadato {appiyato vaa daayaadato vaa (bahuusu) a0 ni0 4.61; 5.148} -- tathaaruupaasu aapadaasu bhogehi pariyodhaaya vattati, sotthi.m attaana.m karoti. aya.m tatiyo bhogaana.m aadiyo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi pa~ncabali.m kattaa hoti. ~naatibali.m, atithibali.m, pubbapetabali.m, raajabali.m, devataabali.m -- aya.m catuttho bhogaana.m aadiyo.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0042^ea^ capara.m, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi ^a^P3.0046^ea^ dhammaladdhehi ye te sama.nabraahma.naa madappamaadaa pa.tivirataa khantisoracce nivi.t.thaa ekamattaana.m damenti ekamattaana.m samenti ekamattaana.m parinibbaapenti, tathaaruupesu sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m. aya.m pa~ncamo bhogaana.m aadiyo. ime kho, gahapati, pa~nca bhogaana.m aadiyaa.

[03] ``tassa ce, gahapati, ariyasaavakassa ime pa~nca bhogaana.m aadiye aadiyato bhogaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, tassa eva.m hoti -- `ye vata bhogaana.m aadiyaa te caaha.m ^a^T3.0050^ea^ aadiyaami bhogaa ca me parikkhaya.m gacchantii'ti. itissa hoti avippa.tisaaro. tassa ce, gahapati, ariyasaavakassa ime pa~nca bhogaana.m aadiye aadiyato bhogaa abhiva.d.dhanti ^a^M2.0040^ea^, tassa eva.m hoti -- `ye vata bhogaana.m aadiyaa te caaha.m aadiyaami bhogaa ca me abhiva.d.dhantii'ti. itissa hoti {itissa hoti avippa.tisaaro, (sii0 syaa0)} ubhayeneva avippa.tisaaro''ti.
[21] ``bhuttaa bhogaa bhataa bhaccaa {gataa tacchaa (ka0)}, viti.n.naa aapadaasu me.
[27] uddhaggaa dakkhi.naa dinnaa, atho pa~ncabaliikataa.
[22] upa.t.thitaa siilavanto, sa~n~nataa brahmacaarayo..
[21] ``yadattha.m bhoga.m iccheyya, pa.n.dito gharamaavasa.m.
[22] so me attho anuppatto, kata.m ananutaapiya.m..
[21] ``eta.m {eva.m (ka0)} anussara.m macco, ariyadhamme .thito naro.
[22] idheva na.m pasa.msanti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti {pecca sagge ca modatiiti (sii0 syaa0)}.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ``sappuriso, bhikkhave, kule jaayamaano bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; maataapituuna.m {maataapitunna.m (sii0 pii0)} atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; puttadaarassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; daasakammakaraporisassa ^a^V2.0043^ea^ atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; mittaamaccaana.m atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; sama.nabraahma.naana.m atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaamegho sabbasassaani sampaadento bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; evameva.m ^a^P3.0047^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso kule ^a^T3.0051^ea^ jaayamaano bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; maataapituuna.m atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; puttadaarassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; daasakammakaraporisassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; mittaamaccaana.m atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hoti; sama.nabraahma.naana.m atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya hotii''ti.
[21] ``hito bahunna.m pa.tipajja bhoge, ta.m devataa rakkhati dhammagutta.m.
[22] bahussuta.m siilavatuupapanna.m, dhamme .thita.m na vijahati {vijahaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kitti..
[21] ``dhamma.t.tha.m ^a^M2.0041^ea^ siilasampanna.m, saccavaadi.m hiriimana.m.
[27] nekkha.m jambonadasseva, ko ta.m ninditumarahati.
[22] devaapi na.m pasa.msanti, brahmunaapi pasa.msito''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~ncime, gahapati, dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? aayu, gahapati, i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m; va.n.no i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m; sukha.m i.t.tha.m kanta.m manaapa.m dullabha.m lokasmi.m; yaso i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m; saggaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m. ime ^a^T3.0052^ea^ kho, gahapati, pa~nca dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``imesa.m ^a^V2.0044^ea^ kho, gahapati, pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m dullabhaana.m lokasmi.m na aayaacanahetu ^a^P3.0048^ea^ vaa patthanaahetu vaa {na patthanaahetu vaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.tilaabha.m vadaami. imesa.m kho, gahapati, pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m dullabhaana.m lokasmi.m aayaacanahetu vaa patthanaahetu vaa pa.tilaabho abhavissa, ko idha kena haayetha?

[03] ``na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasaavako aayukaamo aayu.m aayaacitu.m vaa abhinanditu.m vaa aayussa vaapi hetu. aayukaamena, gahapati, ariyasaavakena aayusa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa pa.tipajjitabbaa. aayusa.mvattanikaa hissa pa.tipadaa pa.tipannaa aayupa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati. so laabhii hoti aayussa dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa.

[03] ``na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasaavako va.n.nakaamo va.n.na.m aayaacitu.m vaa abhinanditu.m vaa va.n.nassa vaapi hetu. va.n.nakaamena, gahapati, ariyasaavakena va.n.nasa.mvattanikaa pa.tipadaa pa.tipajjitabbaa. va.n.nasa.mvattanikaa hissa pa.tipadaa pa.tipannaa va.n.napa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati. so laabhii hoti va.n.nassa dibbassa vaa maanusassa vaa.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, pu~n~naabhisandaa kusalaabhisandaa sukhassaahaaraa sovaggikaa sukhavipaakaa saggasa.mvattanikaa i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti.

[26] asocamaano adhivaasayeyya,

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P3.0057^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] (tena kho pana samayena mallikaa devii kaala"nkataa hoti.) {( ) natthi (sii0)} atha kho a~n~nataro puriso yena raajaa pasenadi kosalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa upaka.n.nake aaroceti -- ``mallikaa devii, deva {deva devii (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, kaala"nkataa''ti. eva.m vutte raajaa pasenadi kosalo dukkhii dummano pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidi.

[01] atha kho bhagavaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m dukkhi.m dummana.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m ^a^T3.0064^ea^ appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavoca -- ``pa~ncimaani, mahaaraaja, alabbhaniiyaani .thaanaani sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. katamaani pa~nca? `jaraadhamma.m maa jiirii'ti alabbhaniiya.m .thaana.m...pe0... na socanaaya paridevanaaya...pe0... kamma.m da.lha.m kinti karomi daanii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa naarado paa.taliputte viharati kukku.taaraame. tena kho pana samayena mu.n.dassa ra~n~no bhaddaa devii kaala"nkataa ^a^M2.0051^ea^ hoti piyaa manaapaa. so bhaddaaya deviyaa kaala"nkataaya piyaaya manaapaaya neva nhaayati {nahaayati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} na vilimpati na bhatta.m bhu~njati na kammanta.m payojeti -- rattindiva.m {rattidiva.m (ka0)} bhaddaaya deviyaa sariire ajjhomucchito. atha kho mu.n.do raajaa piyaka.m kosaarakkha.m {sokaarakkha.m (syaa0)} ^a^V2.0054^ea^ aamantesi -- ``tena hi, samma piyaka ^a^P3.0058^ea^, bhaddaaya deviyaa sariira.m aayasaaya telado.niyaa pakkhipitvaa a~n~nissaa aayasaaya do.niyaa pa.tikujjatha, yathaa maya.m bhaddaaya deviyaa sariira.m ciratara.m passeyyaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho piyako kosaarakkho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa bhaddaaya deviyaa sariira.m aayasaaya telado.niyaa pakkhipitvaa a~n~nissaa aayasaaya do.niyaa pa.tikujji.

[03] atha kho piyakassa kosaarakkhassa etadahosi -- ``imassa kho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no bhaddaa devii kaala"nkataa piyaa manaapaa. so bhaddaaya deviyaa kaala"nkataaya piyaaya manaapaaya neva nhaayati na vilimpati na bhatta.m bhu~njati na kammanta.m payojeti ^a^T3.0065^ea^ -- rattindiva.m bhaddaaya deviyaa sariire ajjhomucchito. ka.m {ki.m (ka0)} nu kho mu.n.do raajaa sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa payirupaaseyya, yassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pajaheyyaa''ti!

[03] atha kho piyakassa kosaarakkhassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa naarado paa.taliputte viharati kukku.taaraame. ta.m kho panaayasmanta.m naarada.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `pa.n.dito viyatto {vyatto (sii0 pii0), byatto (syaa0 ka.m0, dii0 ni0 2.407)} medhaavii bahussuto cittakathii kalyaa.napa.tibhaano vuddho ceva {buddho ceva (ka0)} arahaa ca' {arahaa caa'ti (?)}. ya.mnuuna mu.n.do raajaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m payirupaaseyya, appeva naama mu.n.do raajaa aayasmato naaradassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pajaheyyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho piyako kosaarakkho yena mu.n.do raajaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mu.n.da.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m kho, deva, aayasmaa naarado paa.taliputte viharati kukku.taaraame. ta.m kho panaayasmanta.m naarada.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii bahussuto cittakathii kalyaa.napa.tibhaano vuddho ceva ^a^M2.0052^ea^ arahaa ca' {arahaa caa'ti (?)}. yadi pana devo aayasmanta.m naarada.m payirupaaseyya, appeva naama devo aayasmato naaradassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pajaheyyaa''ti. ``tena hi, samma piyaka ^a^P3.0059^ea^, aayasmanta.m naarada.m pa.tivedehi. katha~nhi naama maadiso sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa vijite vasanta.m pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti ^a^T3.0066^ea^! ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho piyako kosaarakkho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa naarado tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho piyako kosaarakkho aayasmanta.m naarada.m etadavoca --

[03] ``imassa ^a^V2.0055^ea^, bhante, mu.n.dassa ra~n~no bhaddaa devii kaala"nkataa piyaa manaapaa. so bhaddaaya deviyaa kaala"nkataaya piyaaya manaapaaya neva nhaayati na vilimpati na bhatta.m bhu~njati na kammanta.m payojeti -- rattindiva.m bhaddaaya deviyaa sariire ajjhomucchito. saadhu, bhante, aayasmaa naarado mu.n.dassa ra~n~no tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa mu.n.do raajaa aayasmato naaradassa dhamma.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pajaheyyaa''ti. ``yassadaani, piyaka, mu.n.do raajaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] atha kho piyako kosaarakkho u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena mu.n.do raajaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mu.n.da.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``kataavakaaso kho, deva, aayasmataa naaradena. yassadaani devo kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. ``tena hi, samma piyaka, bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapehii''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho piyako kosaarakkho mu.n.dassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa mu.n.da.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- ``yuttaani kho te, deva, bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani. yassadaani devo kaala.m ^a^T3.0067^ea^ ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] atha kho mu.n.do raajaa bhadra.m yaana.m {bhadra.m bhadra.m yaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), bhadda.m yaana.m (pii0)} abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi yena kukku.taaraamo tena paayaasi mahaccaa {mahacca (bahuusu)} raajaanubhaavena aayasmanta.m naarada.m dassanaaya. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena gantvaa, yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova aaraama.m paavisi. atha kho mu.n.do raajaa ^a^M2.0053^ea^ yena aayasmaa naarado tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P3.0060^ea^ nisinna.m kho mu.n.da.m raajaana.m aayasmaa naarado etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, mahaaraaja, alabbhaniiyaani .thaanaani sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. katamaani pa~nca? `jaraadhamma.m maa jiirii'ti alabbhaniiya.m .thaana.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. `byaadhidhamma.m maa byaadhiiyii'ti...pe0... `mara.nadhamma.m maa miiyii'ti... `khayadhamma.m maa khiiyii'ti... `nassanadhamma.m maa nassii'ti alabbhaniiya.m .thaana.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``assutavato ^a^V2.0056^ea^, mahaaraaja, puthujjanassa jaraadhamma.m jiirati. so jaraadhamme ji.n.ne na iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho mayhevekassa jaraadhamma.m jiirati, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m jaraadhamma.m jiirati. aha~nceva kho pana jaraadhamme ji.n.ne soceyya.m kilameyya.m parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m, sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m, bhattampi me ^a^T3.0068^ea^ nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m okkameyya, kammantaapi nappavatteyyu.m, amittaapi attamanaa assu, mittaapi dummanaa assuu'ti. so jaraadhamme ji.n.ne socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, mahaaraaja -- `assutavaa puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attaana.myeva paritaapeti'''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, assutavato puthujjanassa byaadhidhamma.m byaadhiiyati...pe0... mara.nadhamma.m miiyati... khayadhamma.m khiiyati... nassanadhamma.m nassati. so nassanadhamme na.t.the na iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhamma.m nassati, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m nassanadhamma.m nassati. aha~nceva kho pana nassanadhamme na.t.the soceyya.m kilameyya.m parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m, sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m, bhattampi me nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m okkameyya, kammantaapi nappavatteyyu.m, amittaapi attamanaa assu, mittaapi dummanaa ^a^P3.0061^ea^ assuu'ti. so nassanadhamme na.t.the socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, mahaaraaja -- `assutavaa puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attaana.myeva paritaapeti'''.

[03] ``sutavato ^a^M2.0054^ea^ ca kho, mahaaraaja, ariyasaavakassa jaraadhamma.m jiirati. so jaraadhamme ji.n.ne iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho mayhevekassa jaraadhamma.m jiirati, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m jaraadhamma.m jiirati. aha~nceva kho pana jaraadhamme ji.n.ne soceyya.m kilameyya.m ^a^T3.0069^ea^ parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m, sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m, bhattampi me nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m okkameyya, kammantaapi nappavatteyyu.m, amittaapi attamanaa assu, mittaapi dummanaa assuu'ti. so jaraadhamme ji.n.ne na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, mahaaraaja -- `sutavaa ariyasaavako abbuhi savisa.m sokasalla.m, yena viddho assutavaa puthujjano attaana.myeva paritaapeti. asoko visallo ariyasaavako attaana.myeva parinibbaapeti'''.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0057^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, sutavato ariyasaavakassa byaadhidhamma.m byaadhiiyati...pe0... mara.nadhamma.m miiyati... khayadhamma.m khiiyati... nassanadhamma.m nassati. so nassanadhamme na.t.the iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhamma.m nassati, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m nassanadhamma.m nassati. aha~nceva kho pana nassanadhamme na.t.the soceyya.m kilameyya.m parideveyya.m, urattaa.li.m kandeyya.m, sammoha.m aapajjeyya.m, bhattampi me nacchaadeyya, kaayepi dubba.n.niya.m okkameyya, kammantaapi nappavatteyyu.m, amittaapi attamanaa assu, mittaapi dummanaa assuu'ti. so nassanadhamme na.t.the na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, mahaaraaja -- `sutavaa ariyasaavako abbuhi savisa.m sokasalla.m, yena viddho assutavaa puthujjano attaana.myeva paritaapeti. asoko visallo ariyasaavako attaana.myeva parinibbaapeti ^a^T3.0070^ea^'''.
[03] ``imaani ^a^P3.0062^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, pa~nca alabbhaniiyaani .thaanaani sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti.
[21] ``na socanaaya paridevanaaya,
[27] atthodha labbhaa api appakopi.
[26] socantamena.m dukhita.m viditvaa,
[22] paccatthikaa attamanaa bhavanti..
[21] ``yato ^a^M2.0055^ea^ ca kho pa.n.dito aapadaasu,
[27] na vedhatii atthavinicchaya~n~nuu.
[26] paccatthikaassa dukhitaa bhavanti,
[22] disvaa mukha.m avikaara.m puraa.na.m..
[21] ``jappena mantena subhaasitena,
[27] anuppadaanena pave.niyaa vaa.
[26] yathaa yathaa yattha labhetha attha.m,
[22] tathaa tathaa tattha parakkameyya..
[21] ``sace ^a^V2.0058^ea^ pajaaneyya alabbhaneyyo,
[27] mayaava a~n~nena vaa esa attho.
[26] asocamaano adhivaasayeyya,
[22] kamma.m da.lha.m kinti karomi daanii''ti {jaa0 1 jaatakepi}..

[03] eva.m ^a^T3.0071^ea^ vutte mu.n.do raajaa aayasmanta.m naarada.m etadavoca -- ``ko naamo {ko nu kho (sii0 pii0)} aya.m, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti? ``sokasallahara.no naama aya.m, mahaaraaja, dhammapariyaayo''ti. ``taggha, bhante, sokasallahara.no {taggha bhante sokasallahara.no, taggha bhante sokasallahara.no (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}! ima~nhi me, bhante, dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa sokasalla.m pahiina''nti.

[03] atha kho mu.n.do raajaa piyaka.m kosaarakkha.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddaaya deviyaa sariira.m jhaapetha; thuupa~ncassaa karotha. ajjatagge daani maya.m nhaayissaama ceva vilimpissaama bhatta~nca bhu~njissaama kammante ca payojessaamaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] mu.n.daraajavaggo ^a^P3.0063^ea^ pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] aadiyo sappuriso i.t.thaa, manaapadaayiibhisanda.m.
[22] sampadaa ca dhana.m .thaana.m, kosalo naaradena caati..
[06] pa.thamapa.n.naasaka.m samatta.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0059^ea^ ^a^M2.0056^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m ^a^T3.0072^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchando, bhikkhave, aavara.no niivara.no cetaso ajjhaaruho pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.no. byaapaado, bhikkhave, aavara.no niivara.no cetaso ajjhaaruho pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.no. thinamiddha.m, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m niivara.na.m cetaso ajjhaaruha.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. uddhaccakukkucca.m, bhikkhave, aavara.na.m niivara.na.m cetaso ajjhaaruha.m pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.na.m. vicikicchaa, bhikkhave, aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aavara.naa niivara.naa cetaso ajjhaaruhaa pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.naa.

[03] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ime pa~nca aavara.ne niivara.ne cetaso ajjhaaruhe pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne appahaaya, abalaaya pa~n~naaya dubbalaaya attattha.m vaa ~nassati parattha.m ^a^P3.0064^ea^ vaa ~nassati ubhayattha.m vaa ~nassati uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nadii pabbateyyaa duura"ngamaa {duuragamaa (sii0)} siighasotaa haarahaarinii. tassaa puriso ^a^T3.0073^ea^ ubhato na"ngalamukhaani vivareyya. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, majjhe nadiyaa soto vikkhitto visa.to byaadi.n.no neva {na ceva (ka0)} duura"ngamo assa na {na ca (ka0)} siighasoto na {na ca (ka0)} haarahaarii {haarahaari.nii (sii0)}. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu ime pa~nca aavara.ne niivara.ne ^a^V2.0060^ea^ cetaso ajjhaaruhe pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne appahaaya, abalaaya pa~n~naaya dubbalaaya attattha.m ^a^M2.0057^ea^ vaa ~nassati parattha.m vaa ~nassati ubhayattha.m vaa ~nassati uttari vaa manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ime pa~nca aavara.ne niivara.ne cetaso ajjhaaruhe pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne pahaaya, balavatiyaa pa~n~naaya attattha.m vaa ~nassati parattha.m vaa ~nassati ubhayattha.m vaa ~nassati uttari vaa manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nadii pabbateyyaa duura"ngamaa siighasotaa haarahaarinii. tassaa puriso ubhato na"ngalamukhaani pidaheyya. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, majjhe nadiyaa soto avikkhitto avisa.to abyaadi.n.no duura"ngamo ceva assa siighasoto ca haarahaarii ca. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, so vata bhikkhu ime pa~nca aavara.ne niivara.ne cetaso ajjhaaruhe pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne pahaaya, balavatiyaa pa~n~naaya attattha.m vaa ~nassati parattha.m vaa ~nassati ubhayattha.m vaa ~nassati uttari vaa manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarissatiiti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ``akusalaraasiiti ^a^T3.0074^ea^ ^a^P3.0065^ea^, bhikkhave, vadamaano pa~nca niivara.ne {ime pa~nca niivara.ne (sii0)} sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m {haya.m (sii0), caaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0), saaya.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, akusalaraasi yadida.m pa~nca niivara.naa. katame pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m, byaapaadaniivara.na.m, thinamiddhaniivara.na.m, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m. akusalaraasiiti, bhikkhave, vadamaano ime pa~nca niivara.ne sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. kevalo haaya.m, bhikkhave, akusalaraasi yadida.m pa~nca niivara.naa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, padhaaniya"ngaani. katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti ^a^V2.0061^ea^. appaabaadho hoti ^a^M2.0058^ea^ appaata"nko; samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya; asa.tho hoti amaayaavii; yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca padhaaniya"ngaanii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, asamayaa padhaanaaya. katame pa~nca? idha ^a^P3.0066^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ji.n.no hoti jaraayaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo asamayo padhaanaaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byaadhito hoti byaadhinaabhibhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo asamayo padhaanaaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, dubbhikkha.m hoti dussassa.m dullabhapi.n.da.m, na sukara.m u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo asamayo padhaanaaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhaya.m hoti a.tavisa"nkopo, cakkasamaaruu.lhaa jaanapadaa pariyaayanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho asamayo padhaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho bhinno hoti. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m paribhaasaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajaa ca honti. tattha appasannaa ceva nappasiidanti, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathatta.m hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo asamayo padhaanaaya. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca asamayaa padhaanaayaati.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, samayaa padhaanaaya. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu daharo hoti ^a^V2.0062^ea^ yuvaa susu kaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo samayo padhaanaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0059^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko, samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya ^a^T3.0076^ea^ padhaanakkhamaaya. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo samayo padhaanaaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, subhikkha.m hoti susassa.m ^a^P3.0067^ea^ sulabhapi.n.da.m, sukara.m u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo samayo padhaanaaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, manussaa samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho samayo padhaanaaya.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho samaggo sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharati. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m paribhaasaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajaa honti. tattha appasannaa ceva pasiidanti, pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavo {bhiiyyobhaavaaya (ka0)} hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo samayo padhaanaaya. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca samayaa padhaanaayaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m ubho maataaputtaa vassaavaasa.m upagami.msu {upasa"nkami.msu (ka0)} -- bhikkhu ca bhikkhunii ca. te a~n~nama~n~nassa abhi.nha.m dassanakaamaa ahesu.m. maataapi puttassa abhi.nha.m dassanakaamaa ahosi; puttopi maatara.m abhi.nha.m dassanakaamo ahosi. tesa.m abhi.nha.m dassanaa sa.msaggo ahosi. sa.msagge sati vissaaso ahosi. vissaase sati otaaro ahosi. te oti.n.nacittaa sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya ^a^T3.0077^ea^ dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevi.msu.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0063^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, saavatthiya.m ubho maataaputtaa ^a^M2.0060^ea^ vassaavaasa.m upagami.msu -- bhikkhu ca bhikkhunii ca, te a~n~nama~n~nassa abhi.nha.m ^a^P3.0068^ea^ dassanakaamaa ahesu.m, maataapi puttassa abhi.nha.m dassanakaamaa ahosi, puttopi maatara.m abhi.nha.m dassanakaamo ahosi. tesa.m abhi.nha.m dassanaa sa.msaggo ahosi, sa.msagge sati vissaaso ahosi, vissaase sati otaaro ahosi, te oti.n.nacittaa sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevi.msuu''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso ma~n~nati -- `na maataa putte saarajjati, putto vaa pana maatarii'ti? naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekaruupampi samanupassaami eva.m {ya.m eva.m (sii0)} rajaniiya.m eva.m kamaniiya.m eva.m madaniiya.m eva.m bandhaniiya.m eva.m mucchaniiya.m eva.m antaraayakara.m anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya yathayida.m, bhikkhave, itthiruupa.m. itthiruupe, bhikkhave, sattaa rattaa giddhaa gathitaa {gadhitaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} mucchitaa ajjhosannaa {ajjhopannaa (bahuusu)}. te diigharatta.m socanti itthiruupavasaanugaa.

[03] ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekasaddampi...pe0... ekagandhampi... ekarasampi... ekapho.t.thabbampi samanupassaami eva.m rajaniiya.m eva.m kamaniiya.m eva.m madaniiya.m eva.m bandhaniiya.m eva.m mucchaniiya.m eva.m antaraayakara.m anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya yathayida.m, bhikkhave, itthipho.t.thabba.m ^a^T3.0078^ea^. itthipho.t.thabbe, bhikkhave, sattaa rattaa giddhaa gathitaa mucchitaa ajjhosannaa. te diigharatta.m socanti itthipho.t.thabbavasaanugaa.

[03] ``itthii, bhikkhave, gacchantiipi purisassa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati; .thitaapi...pe0... nisinnaapi... sayaanaapi... hasantiipi... bha.nantiipi... gaayantiipi... rodantiipi... ugghaatitaapi {ugghaanitaapi (sii0)} ... mataapi purisassa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `samantapaaso maarassaa'ti maatugaama.myeva sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `samantapaaso maarassaa'''ti.
[21] ``sallape ^a^P3.0069^ea^ asihatthena, pisaacenaapi sallape.
[22] aasiivisampi aasiide {aasadde (syaa0 ka.m0)}, yena da.t.tho na jiivati..
[21] ``natveva ^a^V2.0064^ea^ eko ekaaya, maatugaamena sallape.
[22] mu.t.thassati.m ^a^M2.0061^ea^ taa bandhanti, pekkhitena sitena ca {mhitena ca (syaa0 ka.m0)}..
[21] ``athopi dunnivatthena, ma~njunaa bha.nitena ca.
[22] neso jano svaasiisado, api ugghaatito mato..
[21] ``pa~nca kaamagu.naa ete, itthiruupasmi.m dissare.
[22] ruupaa saddaa rasaa gandhaa, pho.t.thabbaa ca manoramaa..
[21] ``tesa.m kaamoghavuu.lhaana.m, kaame aparijaanata.m.
[22] kaala.m gati {gati.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavaabhava.m, sa.msaarasmi.m purakkhataa..
[21] ``ye ^a^T3.0079^ea^ ca kaame pari~n~naaya, caranti akutobhayaa.
[22] te ve paara"ngataa loke, ye pattaa aasavakkhaya''nti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena sako upajjhaayo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa saka.m upajjhaaya.m etadavoca -- ``etarahi me, bhante, madhurakajaato ceva kaayo, disaa ca me na pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ma.m nappa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, anabhirato ca brahmacariya.m caraami, atthi ca me dhammesu vicikicchaa''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu ta.m saddhivihaarika.m bhikkhu.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, bhikkhu evamaaha -- `etarahi me, bhante, madhurakajaato ceva kaayo, disaa ca ma.m na pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca me nappa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, anabhirato ca brahmacariya.m caraami, atthi ca me dhammesu vicikicchaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva~nheta.m ^a^V2.0065^ea^ ^a^P3.0070^ea^, bhikkhu, hoti indriyesu aguttadvaarassa, bhojane amatta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m ananuyuttassa, avipassakassa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m ananuyuttassa viharato, ya.m madhurakajaato ceva kaayo hoti, disaa cassa na ^a^M2.0062^ea^ pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ta.m nappa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~ncassa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, anabhirato ca brahmacariya.m carati, hoti cassa dhammesu vicikicchaa. tasmaatiha te, bhikkhu, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `indriyesu guttadvaaro bhavissaami, bhojane matta~n~nuu, jaagariya.m anuyutto, vipassako kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyutto viharissaamii'ti. eva~nhi te, bhikkhu, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavataa iminaa ovaadena ovadito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho so bhikkhu eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro pana so bhikkhu arahata.m ahosi.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu arahatta.m patto yena sako upajjhaayo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa saka.m upajjhaaya.m etadavoca -- ``etarahi me, bhante, na ceva {na tveva (sii0)} madhurakajaato kaayo, disaa ca me pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ma.m pa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, abhirato ca brahmacariya.m caraami, natthi ca me dhammesu vicikicchaa''ti. atha kho so bhikkhu ta.m saddhivihaarika.m bhikkhu.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^P3.0071^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, bhikkhu evamaaha -- `etarahi me, bhante, na ceva madhurakajaato kaayo, disaa ca me pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ma.m pa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~nca me citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, abhirato ca brahmacariya.m caraami, natthi ca me dhammesu vicikicchaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva~nheta.m, bhikkhu, hoti indriyesu guttadvaarassa, bhojane matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttassa, vipassakassa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m ^a^V2.0066^ea^ anuyuttassa viharato, ya.m na ceva madhurakajaato kaayo hoti, disaa cassa pakkhaayanti, dhammaa ca ^a^M2.0063^ea^ ta.m pa.tibhanti, thinamiddha~ncassa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, abhirato ca brahmacariya.m carati, na cassa hoti dhammesu vicikicchaa. tasmaatiha vo, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhavissaama, bhojane matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttaa, vipassakaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m anuyuttaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, .thaanaani abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabbaani itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa. katamaani pa~nca? `jaraadhammomhi, jara.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa. `byaadhidhammomhi, byaadhi.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa. `mara.nadhammomhi, mara.na.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa ^a^P3.0072^ea^ vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa. `sabbehi me piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa. `kammassakomhi, kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapa.tisara.no. ya.m kamma.m karissaami -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado bhavissaamii'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `jaraadhammomhi, jara.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m yobbane yobbanamado, yena madena mattaa kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `jaraadhammomhi, jara.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.

[03] ``ki~nca ^a^V2.0067^ea^, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `byaadhidhammomhi, byaadhi.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m aarogye aarogyamado, yena madena mattaa kaayena ^a^M2.0064^ea^ duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato yo aarogye aarogyamado so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `byaadhidhammomhi, byaadhi.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `mara.nadhammomhi, mara.na.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m jiivite jiivitamado, yena madena mattaa kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m ^a^P3.0073^ea^ caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato yo jiivite jiivitamado so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `mara.nadhammomhi, mara.na.m anatiito'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `sabbehi me piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m piyesu manaapesu yo chandaraago yena raagena rattaa kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato yo piyesu manaapesu chandaraago so sabbaso vaa pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `sabbehi me piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `kammassakomhi, kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissaami -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado bhavissaamii'ti abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa ^a^V2.0068^ea^? atthi, bhikkhave, sattaana.m kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato sabbaso vaa duccarita.m pahiiyati tanu vaa pana hoti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, atthavasa.m pa.ticca `kammassakomhi, kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissaami -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado bhavissaamii'ti ^a^M2.0065^ea^ abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa gaha.t.thena vaa pabbajitena vaa.

[03] ``sa kho {sace (pii0 ka0)} so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na ^a^P3.0074^ea^ kho aha~n~neveko jaraadhammo {aha~nceveko jaraadhammomhi (ka0)} jara.m anatiito, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa jaraadhammaa jara.m anatiitaa'ti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato maggo sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso pahiiyanti anusayaa byantiihonti.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho aha~n~neveko byaadhidhammo byaadhi.m anatiito, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa byaadhidhammaa byaadhi.m anatiitaa'ti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato maggo sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso pahiiyanti, anusayaa byantiihonti.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho aha~n~neveko mara.nadhammo mara.na.m anatiito, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa mara.nadhammaa mara.na.m anatiitaa'ti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato maggo sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso pahiiyanti, anusayaa byantiihonti.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho mayhevekassa sabbehi piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo, atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbesa.m sattaana.m piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m ^a^V2.0069^ea^ paccavekkhato maggo sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso pahiiyanti, anusayaa byantiihonti.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na ^a^M2.0066^ea^ kho aha~n~neveko kammassako kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammappa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissaami -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaado bhavissaami; atha kho yaavataa sattaana.m aagati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattaa kammassakaa kammadaayaadaa kammayoni kammabandhu kammappa.tisara.naa, ya.m kamma.m karissanti -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaadaa bhavissantii'ti ^a^P3.0075^ea^. tassa ta.m .thaana.m abhi.nha.m paccavekkhato maggo sa~njaayati. so ta.m magga.m aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tassa ta.m magga.m aasevato bhaavayato bahuliikaroto sa.myojanaani sabbaso pahiiyanti, anusayaa byantiihontii''ti.
[21] ``byaadhidhammaa jaraadhammaa, atho mara.nadhammino.
[22] yathaa dhammaa tathaa sattaa {santaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, jigucchanti puthujjanaa..
[21] ``aha~nce ta.m jiguccheyya.m, eva.m dhammesu paa.nisu.
[22] na meta.m patiruupassa, mama eva.m vihaarino..
[21] ``soha.m eva.m viharanto, ~natvaa dhamma.m niruupadhi.m.
[22] aarogye yobbanasmi~nca, jiivitasmi~nca ye madaa..

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0070^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa licchavikumaarakaa sajjaani dhanuuni aadaaya kukkurasa"nghaparivutaa mahaavane anuca"nkamamaanaa anuvicaramaanaa addasu ^a^M2.0067^ea^ bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m; disvaana sajjaani dhanuuni nikkhipitvaa kukkurasa"ngha.m ekamanta.m uyyojetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^P3.0076^ea^ tu.nhiibhuutaa tu.nhiibhuutaa pa~njalikaa bhagavanta.m payirupaasanti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena mahaanaamo licchavi mahaavane ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano addasa te licchavikumaarake tu.nhiibhuute tu.nhiibhuute pa~njalike bhagavanta.m payirupaasante; disvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo licchavi udaana.m udaanesi -- `bhavissanti vajjii, bhavissanti vajjii'''ti!

[03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, mahaanaama, eva.m vadesi -- `bhavissanti vajjii, bhavissanti vajjii'''ti? ``ime, bhante, licchavikumaarakaa ca.n.daa pharusaa apaanubhaa {apajahaati (sii0), apaa.tubhaa (syaa0 ka.m0), apajahaa (pii0), apaanutaa (katthaci)}. yaanipi taani kulesu pahe.nakaani {pahiinakaani (sii0), pahii.nakaani (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pahiiyanti, ucchuuti vaa badaraati vaa puuvaati vaa modakaati vaa sa.mkulikaati vaa {sakkhalikaati vaa (sii0 pii0)}, taani vilumpitvaa vilumpitvaa khaadanti; kulitthiinampi kulakumaariinampi pacchaaliya.m khipanti. te daanime tu.nhiibhuutaa tu.nhiibhuutaa pa~njalikaa bhagavanta.m payirupaasantii''ti.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa pa~nca dhammaa sa.mvijjanti -- yadi vaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa, yadi vaa ra.t.thikassa pettanikassa {muddhaabhisittassa (ka0) a0 ni0 5.135, 136 passitabba.m}, yadi vaa senaaya senaapatikassa, yadi ^a^V2.0071^ea^ vaa gaamagaama.nikassa, yadi vaa puugagaama.nikassa, ye vaa pana kulesu paccekaadhipacca.m kaarenti, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, mahaanaama, kulaputto u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi maataapitaro sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti ^a^P3.0077^ea^. tamena.m maataapitaro sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti. maataapitaanukampitassa, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0068^ea^ capara.m, mahaanaama, kulaputto u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi puttadaaradaasakammakaraporise {... saamantasa.mvohaare (sii0 pii0)} sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti. tamena.m puttadaaradaasakammakaraporisaa sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti. puttadaaradaasakammakaraporisaanukampitassa, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kulaputto u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi khettakammantasaamantasabyohaare sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti. tamena.m khettakammantasaamantasabyohaaraa sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti. khettakammantasaamantasabyohaaraanukampitassa, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0072^ea^ capara.m, mahaanaama, kulaputto u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi sama.nabraahma.ne sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti. tamena.m sama.nabraahma.naa sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti -- `cira.m jiiva, diighamaayu.m paalehii'ti. sama.nabraahma.naanukampitassa ^a^P3.0078^ea^, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaani.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa ime pa~nca dhammaa sa.mvijjanti -- yadi vaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa, yadi vaa ra.t.thikassa pettanikassa ^a^M2.0069^ea^, yadi vaa senaaya senaapatikassa, yadi vaa gaamagaama.nikassa, yadi vaa puugagaama.nikassa, ye vaa pana kulesu paccekaadhipacca.m kaarenti, vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa, no parihaanii''ti.
[21] ``maataapitukiccakaro, puttadaarahito sadaa.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato dullabho vu.d.dhapabbajito. katamehi pa~ncahi? dullabho, bhikkhave, vu.d.dhapabbajito nipu.no, dullabho aakappasampanno, dullabho bahussuto ^a^V2.0073^ea^, dullabho dhammakathiko, dullabho vinayadharo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato dullabho vu.d.dhapabbajito''ti. navama.m.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^M2.0070^ea^ ^a^V2.0074^ea^, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa. katamaa pa~nca? asubhasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa, aadiinavasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa {anabhiratisa~n~naa (ka0) a0 ni0 5.121-122, 303-304 passitabba.m} -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa. katamaa pa~nca? aniccasa~n~naa, anattasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa -- imaa ^a^P3.0080^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaano ariyasaavako ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayii ca hoti varaadaayii ca kaayassa. katamaahi pa~ncahi? saddhaaya va.d.dhati, siilena va.d.dhati, sutena va.d.dhati, caagena va.d.dhati, pa~n~naaya va.d.dhati -- imaahi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaano ariyasaavako ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayii ca hoti varaadaayii ca kaayassaa''ti.

[27] pa~n~naaya caagena sutena cuubhaya.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0071^ea^, bhikkhave, va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaanaa ariyasaavikaa ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayinii ca hoti varaadaayinii ca kaayassa. katamaahi pa~ncahi? saddhaaya va.d.dhati, siilena va.d.dhati, sutena va.d.dhati, caagena va.d.dhati, pa~n~naaya va.d.dhati -- imaahi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaanaa ariyasaavikaa ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayinii ca hoti varaadaayinii ca kaayassaa''ti.
[21] ``saddhaaya siilena ca yaa pava.d.dhati {yaadha va.d.dhati (sii0)},
[27] pa~n~naaya caagena sutena cuubhaya.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.164} ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0081^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaakaccho sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti, siilasampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti, samaadhisampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya kathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaakaccho sabrahmacaariina''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.164} ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0076^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti, siilasampadaaya kathaaya ca kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti, samaadhisampadaaya kathaaya ca ^a^M2.0072^ea^ kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaaya kathaaya ca kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadaaya kathaaya ca kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya kathaaya ca kata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa pa~nca dhamme {ime pa~nca dhamme (ka0)} bhaaveti, pa~nca dhamme {ime pa~nca dhamme (ka0)} bahuliikaroti, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva ^a^P3.0082^ea^ dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa.

[03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi... viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, usso.lhi~n~neva pa~ncami.m {usso.lhiiyeva pa~ncamii (sii0)}. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa ime pa~nca dhamme bhaaveti, ime pa~nca dhamme bahuliikaroti, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``pubbevaaha.m, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samaano pa~nca dhamme bhaavesi.m, pa~nca dhamme bahuliikaasi.m {bahulimakaasi.m (ka0), bahulamakaasi.m (ka0)}. katame pa~nca? chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaavesi.m ^a^V2.0077^ea^, viiriyasamaadhi... cittasamaadhi... viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaavesi.m, usso.lhi~n~neva pa~ncami.m. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m usso.lhipa~ncamaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa yassa yassa abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaamesi.m abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.ni.m sati sati aayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^M2.0073^ea^ sace aaka"nkhi.m -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhaveyya.m...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.ni.m sati sati aayatane.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhaanupassii kaaye viharati, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nii {pa.tikkuulasa~n~nii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~nii, sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii, mara.nasa~n~naa kho panassa ajjhatta.m suupa.t.thitaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa cetovimuttiphalaa ca honti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca honti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cetovimutto ca hoti pa~n~naavimutto ca hoti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho itipi, sa.mki.n.naparikho {sa.mki.n.naparikkho (syaa0 ka.m0)} itipi, abbuu.lhesiko itipi, niragga.lo itipi, ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto itipi'''.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti ucchinnamuulaani taalaavatthukataani anabhaava.mkataani aayati.m anuppaadadhammaani. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa cetovimuttiphalaa ca honti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca honti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. katame pa~nca? aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa cetovimuttiphalaa ca honti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca honti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cetovimutto ca hoti pa~n~naavimutto ca -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho itipi, sa.mki.n.naparikho itipi, abbuu.lhesiko itipi, niragga.lo itipi, ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto itipi'''.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaa pahiinaa hoti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikho hoti? idha ^a^P3.0086^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobhaviko ^a^V2.0081^ea^ jaatisa.msaaro pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikho ^a^T3.0098^ea^ hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto hotii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```dhammavihaarii, dhammavihaarii'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihaarii hotii''ti?

[03] ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. so taaya dhammapariyattiyaa divasa.m atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.

[03] ``puna ^a^T3.0099^ea^ ^a^V2.0082^ea^ ^a^P3.0087^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti. so taaya dhammapa~n~nattiyaa divasa.m atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu pa~n~nattibahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti. so tena sajjhaayena divasa.m atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu sajjhaayabahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0077^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati. so tehi dhammavitakkehi divasa.m atinaameti, ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu -- `bhikkhu vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihaarii'''.

[03] ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. so taaya dhammapariyattiyaa na divasa.m atinaameti, naapi ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihaarii hoti.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhu, desito mayaa pariyattibahulo, desito pa~n~nattibahulo, desito sajjhaayabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihaarii. ya.m kho, bhikkhu {ya.m bhikkhu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m vo ta.m mayaa. etaani, bhikkhu, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani. jhaayatha, bhikkhu, maa pamaadattha ^a^T3.0100^ea^, maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P3.0088^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```dhammavihaarii ^a^V2.0083^ea^ dhammavihaarii'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihaarii hotii''ti?

[03] ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m; uttari cassa pa~n~naaya attha.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihaarii hoti.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhu, desito mayaa pariyattibahulo, desito ^a^P3.0089^ea^ pa~n~nattibahulo, desito sajjhaayabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihaarii. ya.m kho, bhikkhu, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m vo ta.m mayaa. etaani, bhikkhu, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani. jhaayatha bhikkhu, maa pamaadattha, maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0084^ea^, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco yodhaajiivo rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi {evaruupo (sii0) pu0 pa0 193}, bhikkhave, idhekacco {ekacco (sii0)} yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m; api ca kho dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati ^a^T3.0101^ea^ visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m sahati dhajagga.m; api ca kho ussaara.na~n~neva {ussaadana.myeva (sii0 pii0)} sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na ^a^M2.0079^ea^ sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m; api ca kho sampahaare ha~n~nati {aaha~n~nati (sii0)} byaapajjati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, sahati ^a^P3.0090^ea^ sampahaara.m. so ta.m sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca yodhaajiivaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime yodhaajiivuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusu ^a^V2.0085^ea^. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m {santaanetu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa rajaggasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0102^ea^, bhikkhu su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa kumaarii vaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa'ti. so ta.m sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. idamassa rajaggasmi.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m; api ca kho dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m ^a^M2.0080^ea^ aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa dhajaggasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa kumaarii vaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa'ti; api ca kho saama.m passati itthi.m vaa kumaari.m vaa abhiruupa.m dassaniiya.m paasaadika.m paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagata.m. so ta.m disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti ^a^P3.0091^ea^ brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. idamassa dhajaggasmi.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m; api ca kho dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati ^a^T3.0103^ea^ visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0086^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m; api ca kho ussaara.na~n~neva sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa ussaara.naaya? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ara~n~nagata.m vaa rukkhamuulagata.m vaa su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa maatugaamo upasa"nkamitvaa uuhasati {uhasati (ka0), ohasati (syaa0 ka.m0) pu0 pa0 196} ullapati ujjagghati uppa.n.deti. so maatugaamena uuhasiyamaano ullapiyamaano ujjagghiyamaano uppa.n.diyamaano sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m. sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. idamassa ussaara.naaya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m; api ca kho ussaara.na~n~neva sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m; api ^a^T3.0104^ea^ ca kho sampahaare ha~n~nati byaapajjati. kimassa sampahaarasmi.m ^a^M2.0081^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ara~n~nagata.m vaa rukkhamuulagata.m vaa ^a^P3.0092^ea^ su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa maatugaamo upasa"nkamitvaa abhinisiidati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati. so maatugaamena abhinisiidiyamaano abhinipajjiyamaano ajjhotthariyamaano sikkha.m apaccakkhaaya dubbalya.m anaavikatvaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati. idamassa sampahaarasmi.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, api ca kho sampahaare ha~n~nati byaapajjati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, sahati sampahaara.m, so ta.m sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati ^a^V2.0087^ea^. kimassa sa"ngaamavijayasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagata.m vaa rukkhamuulagata.m vaa su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa maatugaamo upasa"nkamitvaa abhinisiidati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati. so maatugaamena abhinisiidiyamaano abhinipajjiyamaano ajjhotthariyamaano vinive.thetvaa vinimocetvaa yena kaama.m pakkamati. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m.

[03] ``so ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa ^a^T3.0105^ea^. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti; byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii ^a^P3.0093^ea^ kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti. so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``so ^a^M2.0082^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi ^a^V2.0088^ea^ citta.m vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti ^a^T3.0106^ea^ pajaanaati. idamassa sa"ngaamavijayasmi.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m, sahati dhajagga.m, sahati ussaara.na.m, sahati sampahaara.m, so ta.m sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca yodhaajiivuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusuu''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo asicamma.m gahetvaa dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa viyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m otarati. so tasmi.m sa"ngaame ussahati ^a^M2.0083^ea^ vaayamati. tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare upalikkhanti {upalikhanti (ka0)}, tamena.m apanenti; apanetvaa ~naatakaana.m nenti. so ~naatakehi niiyamaano appatvaava ~naatake antaraamagge kaala.m karoti. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.
