[03] ``katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami. ekaka.m kho pana ma.m {ekaka.m kho pana (syaa0 ka.m0)} ara~n~ne viharanta.m ahi vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, vicchiko {vicchikaa (syaa0)} vaa ^a^V2.0095^ea^ ma.m .da.mseyya, satapadii vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, tena me assa kaala"nkiriyaa, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami. ekako kho panaaha.m ara~n~ne viharanto upakkhalitvaa vaa papateyya.m, bhatta.m vaa bhutta.m me byaapajjeyya, pitta.m vaa me kuppeyya, semha.m vaa me kuppeyya, satthakaa vaa me vaataa kuppeyyu.m, tena me assa kaala"nkiriyaa, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa ^a^T3.0116^ea^ sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami. ekako kho panaaha.m ara~n~ne viharanto vaa.lehi samaagaccheyya.m, siihena vaa byagghena vaa diipinaa vaa acchena vaa taracchena vaa, te ma.m jiivitaa voropeyyu.m, tena me assa kaala"nkiriyaa ^a^P3.0102^ea^, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m ^a^M2.0090^ea^ appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami. ekako kho panaaha.m ara~n~ne viharanto maa.navehi samaagaccheyya.m katakammehi vaa akatakammehi vaa, te ma.m jiivitaa voropeyyu.m, tena me assa kaala"nkiriyaa ^a^V2.0096^ea^, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa ^a^T3.0117^ea^ adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, aara~n~niko bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi ekako ara~n~ne viharaami. santi kho panaara~n~ne vaa.laa amanussaa, te ma.m jiivitaa voropeyyu.m, tena me assa kaala"nkiriyaa, so mamassa antaraayo; handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani sampassamaanena alameva aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P3.0103^ea^, bhikkhave, anaagatabhayaani sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi daharo yuvaa susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa ^a^M2.0091^ea^. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m ima.m kaaya.m jaraa phusati. ji.n.nena kho pana jaraaya abhibhuutena na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, na sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^T3.0118^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. puraa ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m pa.tikacceva {pa.tigacceva (sii0)} viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya ^a^V2.0097^ea^ asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena samannaagato ji.n.nakopi phaasu.m {phaasu (pii0 ka0)} viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho etarahi appaabaadho appaata"nko samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m ima.m kaaya.m byaadhi phusati. byaadhitena kho pana byaadhinaa abhibhuutena {byaadhaabhibhuutena (sii0 pii0 ka0)} na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, na sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. puraa ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya ^a^P3.0104^ea^, yenaaha.m dhammena samannaagato byaadhitopi phaasu.m viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `etarahi kho subhikkha.m susassa.m sulabhapi.n.da.m ^a^T3.0119^ea^, sukara.m u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m dubbhikkha.m hoti dussassa.m dullabhapi.n.da.m, na sukara.m u~nchena paggahena yaapetu.m. dubbhikkhe kho pana manussaa yena subhikkha.m tena sa"nkamanti {tenupasa"nkamanti (ka0)}. tattha sa"nga.nikavihaaro hoti aaki.n.navihaaro. sa"nga.nikavihaare kho pana sati aaki.n.navihaare na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi ^a^M2.0092^ea^ kaatu.m, na sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. puraa ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena samannaagato dubbhikkhepi phaasu viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0098^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `etarahi kho manussaa samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharanti. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m bhaya.m hoti a.tavisa"nkopo, cakkasamaaruu.lhaa jaanapadaa pariyaayanti. bhaye kho pana sati manussaa yena khema.m tena sa"nkamanti. tattha sa"nga.nikavihaaro hoti aaki.n.navihaaro. sa"nga.nikavihaare ^a^P3.0105^ea^ kho pana sati aaki.n.navihaare na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, na sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani ^a^T3.0120^ea^ pa.tisevitu.m. puraa ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena samannaagato bhayepi phaasu.m viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `etarahi kho sa"ngho samaggo sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu viharati. hoti kho pana so samayo ya.m sa"ngho bhijjati. sa"nghe kho pana bhinne na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, na sukaraani ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. puraa ma.m so dhammo aagacchati ani.t.tho akanto amanaapo; handaaha.m pa.tikacceva viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, yenaaha.m dhammena samannaagato bhinnepi sa"nghe phaasu.m viharissaamii'ti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena ^a^M2.0093^ea^ aataapinaa pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa appamattena aataapinaa ^a^T3.0121^ea^ pahitattena viharitu.m appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0099^ea^, bhikkhave, anaagatabhayaani etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m samuppajjissanti. taani vo {kho (katthaci)} pa.tibujjhitabbaani ^a^P3.0106^ea^; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``katamaani pa~nca? bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa a~n~ne upasampaadessanti. tepi {te (sii0)} na sakkhissanti vinetu.m adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya. tepi bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa a~n~ne upasampaadessanti. tepi {te (?)} na sakkhissanti vinetu.m adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya. tepi bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa a~n~nesa.m nissaya.m dassanti. tepi na sakkhissanti vinetu.m adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya ^a^T3.0122^ea^. tepi bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa ^a^M2.0094^ea^ abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa a~n~nesa.m nissaya.m dassanti. tepi na sakkhissanti vinetu.m adhisiile adhicitte adhipa~n~naaya. tepi bhavissanti abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0100^ea^ ^a^P3.0107^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa abhidhammakatha.m vedallakatha.m kathentaa ka.nhadhamma.m okkamamaanaa na bujjhissanti. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa ye te suttantaa tathaagatabhaasitaa gambhiiraa gambhiiratthaa lokuttaraa su~n~nataappa.tisa.myuttaa, tesu bha~n~namaanesu ^a^T3.0123^ea^ na sussuusissanti, na sota.m odahissanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapessanti, na ca te dhamme uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~nissanti. ye pana te suttantaa kavitaa {kavikataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0, sa.m0 ni0 2.229) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} kaaveyyaa cittakkharaa cittabya~njanaa baahirakaa saavakabhaasitaa, tesu bha~n~namaanesu sussuusissanti, sota.m odahissanti, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapessanti, te ca dhamme uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~nissanti. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0095^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa ^a^P3.0108^ea^. te abhaavitakaayaa samaanaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa theraa bhikkhuu baahulikaa {baahullikaa (syaa0 ka.m0) a0 ni0 2.49; 3.96} bhavissanti saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, na viiriya.m aarabhissanti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjissati. saapi bhavissati baahulikaa saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, na viiriya.m aarabhissati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammasandosaa vinayasandoso; vinayasandosaa dhammasandoso. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m ^a^T3.0124^ea^ etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m ^a^V2.0101^ea^. ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m samuppajjissanti. taani vo pa.tibujjhitabbaani; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba''nti. navama.m.
[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, anaagatabhayaani etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m samuppajjissanti. taani vo pa.tibujjhitabbaani; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``katamaani pa~nca? bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m ciivare kalyaa.nakaamaa. te ciivare kalyaa.nakaamaa samaanaa ri~ncissanti pa.msukuulikatta.m, ri~ncissanti ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani; gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu osaritvaa vaasa.m kappessanti, ciivarahetu ca anekavihita.m anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjissanti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0109^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m pi.n.dapaate kalyaa.nakaamaa. te pi.n.dapaate kalyaa.nakaamaa samaanaa ri~ncissanti pi.n.dapaatikatta.m ^a^M2.0096^ea^, ri~ncissanti ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani; gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu osaritvaa vaasa.m kappessanti jivhaggena rasaggaani pariyesamaanaa, pi.n.dapaatahetu ca anekavihita.m anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjissanti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m ^a^T3.0125^ea^ vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m senaasane kalyaa.nakaamaa. te senaasane kalyaa.nakaamaa samaanaa ri~ncissanti rukkhamuulikatta.m {aara~n~nakatta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, ri~ncissanti ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani; gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu osaritvaa vaasa.m kappessanti, senaasanahetu ^a^V2.0102^ea^ ca anekavihita.m anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjissanti. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m bhikkhuniisikkhamaanaasama.nuddesehi sa.msa.t.thaa viharissanti. bhikkhuniisikkhamaanaasama.nuddesehi sa.msagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `anabhirataa vaa brahmacariya.m carissanti, a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjissanti, sikkha.m vaa paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissanti'. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhuu anaagatamaddhaana.m aaraamikasama.nuddesehi sa.msa.t.thaa viharissanti. aaraamikasama.nuddesehi sa.msagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `anekavihita.m sannidhikaaraparibhoga.m ^a^P3.0110^ea^ anuyuttaa viharissanti, o.laarikampi nimitta.m karissanti, pathaviyaapi haritaggepi'. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m anaagatabhaya.m etarahi ^a^T3.0126^ea^ asamuppanna.m aayati.m samuppajjissati. ta.m vo pa.tibujjhitabba.m; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tassa pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m.

[03] ``imaani ^a^M2.0097^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca anaagatabhayaani etarahi asamuppannaani aayati.m samuppajjissanti. taani vo pa.tibujjhitabbaani; pa.tibujjhitvaa ca tesa.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0103^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? rajaniiye rajjati, dussaniiye {dusaniiye (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dussati, mohaniiye muyhati, kuppaniiye {kupaniiye (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), kopaniiye (pii0)} kuppati, madaniiye majjati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? rajaniiye ^a^P3.0111^ea^ na rajjati, dussaniiye na ^a^T3.0127^ea^ dussati, mohaniiye na muyhati, kuppaniiye na kuppati, madaniiye na majjati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi ^a^M2.0098^ea^ pa~ncahi? aviitaraago hoti, aviitadoso hoti, aviitamoho hoti, makkhii ca, pa.laasii ca -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? viitaraago hoti, viitadoso ^a^V2.0104^ea^ hoti, viitamoho hoti, amakkhii ca, apa.laasii ca -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? kuhako ca hoti, lapako ca, nemittiko {nimittiko (syaa0 ka.m0), nimittako (ka0)} ca, nippesiko ca, laabhena ca laabha.m nijigiisitaa {nijigi.msitaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0112^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? na ca kuhako hoti, na ca lapako, na ca nemittiko, na ca nippesiko, na ca laabhena laabha.m nijigiisitaa -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? atthapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, dhammapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, niruttipa.tisambhidaapatto hoti, pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaapatto hoti ^a^T3.0129^ea^, yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani ki.mkara.niiyaani tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato ala.m kaatu.m ^a^M2.0100^ea^ ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0106^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati. aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa ^a^P3.0114^ea^ saattha.m sabya~njana.m {saatthaa sabya~njanaa (sii0)} kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelaga.laaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu bahujanaahitaaya ^a^T3.0130^ea^ pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? thero hoti ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito; ~naato hoti yasassii sagaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m {gaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m (sii0)} bahujanaparivaaro; laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa ^a^M2.0101^ea^ pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa appa.tividdhaa; micchaadi.t.thiko hoti vipariitadassano, so bahujana.m saddhammaa vu.t.thaapetvaa asaddhamme pati.t.thaapeti. thero bhikkhu ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m ^a^P3.0115^ea^ aapajjanti ^a^V2.0107^ea^, ~naato thero bhikkhu yasassii sagaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m bahujanaparivaaro itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, laabhii thero bhikkhu ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, bahussuto thero bhikkhu sutadharo sutasannicayo itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu bahujanaahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m.
[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? thero hoti ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito; ~naato hoti yasassii sagaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m bahujanaparivaaro; laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m ^a^T3.0131^ea^; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; sammaadi.t.thiko hoti avipariitadassano, so bahujana.m asaddhammaa vu.t.thaapetvaa saddhamme pati.t.thaapeti. thero bhikkhu ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, ~naato thero bhikkhu yasassii sagaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m bahujanaparivaaro itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, laabhii thero bhikkhu ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, bahussuto thero bhikkhu sutadharo sutasannicayo itipissa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanasukhaaya ^a^M2.0102^ea^ ^a^P3.0116^ea^ bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca ^a^V2.0108^ea^? kammaaraamataa, bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa, sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, yathaavimutta.m citta.m na paccavekkhati -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? na kammaaraamataa, na bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, na sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu bahukicco hoti bahukara.niiyo ^a^T3.0132^ea^ viyatto ki.mkara.niiyesu; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu appamattakena kammena divasa.m atinaameti; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu sa.msa.t.tho viharati gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisa.msaggena; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m ^a^P3.0117^ea^. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu akaalena gaama.m pavisati, atidivaa pa.tikkamati; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0103^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yaaya.m kathaa aabhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa ^a^V2.0109^ea^ siilakathaa samaadhikathaa pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya na nikaamalaabhii hoti na akicchalaabhii na akasiralaabhii {kicchalaabhii kasiralaabhii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii)}; ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, naanuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu ^a^T3.0133^ea^ na bahukicco hoti na bahukara.niiyo viyatto ki.mkara.niiyesu; na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na appamattakena kammena divasa.m atinaameti; na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu asa.msa.t.tho viharati gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisa.msaggena; na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m ^a^P3.0118^ea^. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na atikaalena gaama.m pavisati, naatidivaa pa.tikkamati; na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m, anuyu~njati ajjhatta.m cetosamatha.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m aasevanto nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appa.t.tho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jiivitaparikkhaaresu; appaahaaro hoti anodarikatta.m anuyutto; appamiddho hoti jaagariya.m anuyutto; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati. imehi ^a^T3.0136^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m aasevanto nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0106^ea^ ^a^V2.0113^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m bhaavento nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appa.t.tho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jiivitaparikkhaaresu; appaahaaro hoti anodarikatta.m anuyutto; appamiddho ^a^P3.0121^ea^ hoti jaagariya.m anuyutto; yaaya.m kathaa aabhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupiyaa kathaaya nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m bhaavento nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m bahuliikaronto nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appa.t.tho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jiivitaparikkhaaresu; appaahaaro hoti anodarikatta.m anuyutto; appamiddho hoti jaagariya.m anuyutto; aara~n~nako hoti pantasenaasano; yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^T3.0137^ea^ bhikkhu aanaapaanassati.m bahuliikaronto nacirasseva akuppa.m pa.tivijjhatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ ``siiho, bhikkhave, migaraajaa saayanhasamaya.m aasayaa nikkhamati; aasayaa nikkhamitvaa vijambhati; vijambhitvaa samantaa catuddisa.m {catuddisaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) a0 ni0 4.33; sa.m0 ni0 3.78 passitabba.m} anuviloketi; samantaa catuddisa.m {catuddisaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) a0 ni0 4.33; sa.m0 ni0 3.78 passitabba.m} anuviloketvaa tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m nadati; tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa gocaraaya pakkamati. so hatthissa cepi pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti, no asakkacca.m; mahi.msassa {mahisassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} cepi pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti, no asakkacca.m; gavassa cepi pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti, no asakkacca.m; diipissa cepi ^a^M2.0107^ea^ pahaara.m deti, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti ^a^V2.0114^ea^, no asakkacca.m; khuddakaana~ncepi ^a^P3.0122^ea^ paa.naana.m pahaara.m deti antamaso sasabi.laaraanampi {sasabi.laaraana.m (ka0)}, sakkacca~n~neva pahaara.m deti, no asakkacca.m. ta.m kissa hetu? `maa me yoggapatho nassaa'ti.

[03] ``siihoti kho, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. ya.m kho, bhikkhave, tathaagato parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, idamassa hoti siihanaadasmi.m. bhikkhuuna~ncepi, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m; bhikkhuniina~ncepi, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m; upaasakaana~ncepi, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, sakkacca~n~neva ^a^T3.0138^ea^ tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m; upaasikaana~ncepi, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m; puthujjanaana~ncepi, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhamma.m deseti antamaso annabhaaranesaadaanampi {annabhaaranesaadaana.m (ka0)}, sakkacca~n~neva tathaagato dhamma.m deseti, no asakkacca.m. ta.m kissa hetu? dhammagaru, bhikkhave, tathaagato dhammagaaravo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. {cuu.lava0 333, 341} tena kho pana samayena kakudho naama koliyaputto {ko.liiyaputto (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa upa.t.thaako adhunaakaala"nkato a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno. tassa evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho hoti -- seyyathaapi naama dve vaa tii.ni vaa maagadhakaani {maagadhikaani (sii0 pii0 ka0)} gaamakkhettaani. so tena attabhaavapa.tilaabhena neva attaana.m {nevattaana.m byaabaadheti (sii0)} no para.m byaabaadheti.

[03] atha kho kakudho devaputto yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito ^a^P3.0123^ea^ kho kakudho devaputto aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m ^a^M2.0108^ea^ etadavoca -- ``devadattassa, bhante, evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- `aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti. sahacittuppaadaa ca, bhante, devadatto tassaa iddhiyaa parihiino''ti. idamavoca kakudho devaputto. ida.m vatvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0115^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T3.0139^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kakudho naama, bhante, koliyaputto mama.m upa.t.thaako adhunaakaala"nkato a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno hoti. tassa evaruupo attabhaavapa.tilaabho -- seyyathaapi naama dve vaa tii.ni vaa maagadhakaani gaamakkhettaani. so tena attabhaavapa.tilaabhena neva attaana.m no para.m byaabaadheti. atha kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `devadattassa, bhante, evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamiiti. sahacittuppaadaa ca, bhante, devadatto tassaa iddhiyaa parihiino'ti. idamavoca, bhante, kakudho devaputto. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana te, moggallaana, kakudho devaputto cetasaa ceto paricca vidito -- `ya.m ki~nci kakudho devaputto bhaasati sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa'''ti? ``cetasaa ceto paricca vidito me, bhante, kakudho devaputto -- `ya.m ki~nci kakudho devaputto bhaasati sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa'''ti. ``rakkhasseta.m, moggallaana, vaaca.m! (rakkhasseta.m, moggallaana, vaaca.m) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu natthi cuu.lava0 333 pana sabbatthapi dissatiyeva}! idaani so moghapuriso attanaava attaana.m paatukarissati ^a^T3.0140^ea^.

[03] ``pa~ncime, moggallaana, satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame pa~nca? idha ^a^P3.0124^ea^, moggallaana, ekacco satthaa aparisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m ^a^M2.0109^ea^ asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhasiilo samaano parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m {katha.m nu ta.m (sii0), katha.m nu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0), katha.m ta.m (katthaci)} maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m tumo karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti ^a^T3.0141^ea^ ^a^V2.0116^ea^. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisati {paccaasi.msati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhaajiivo samaano `parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddho me aajiivo pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhaajiivo samaano parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddho me aajiivo pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m tumo karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa aajiivato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi aajiivato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhadhammadesano samaano `parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhadhammadesano samaano parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti ^a^P3.0125^ea^ pa.tijaanaati `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m ^a^T3.0142^ea^ tumo karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa dhammadesanato rakkhanti ^a^M2.0110^ea^; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi dhammadesanato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano `parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m ^a^V2.0117^ea^. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama -- `sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m tumo karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa veyyaakara.nato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi veyyaakara.nato rakkha.m paccaasiisati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, moggallaana, idhekacco satthaa aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. tamena.m saavakaa eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa aparisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaati `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. maya~nceva kho pana gihiina.m aaroceyyaama, naassassa manaapa.m. ya.m kho panassa amanaapa.m, katha.m na.m maya.m tena samudaacareyyaama ^a^P3.0126^ea^ -- `sammannati kho pana ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; ya.m tumo karissati tumova tena pa~n~naayissatii'ti. evaruupa.m kho, moggallaana, satthaara.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti; evaruupo ca pana satthaa saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisati. ime kho, moggallaana, pa~nca satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``aha.m kho pana, moggallaana, parisuddhasiilo samaano `parisuddhasiilomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me siila.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. na ca ma.m saavakaa siilato rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi siilato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. parisuddhaajiivo samaano `parisuddhaajiivomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddho me aajiivo pariyodaato asa.mkili.t.tho'ti. na ca ma.m saavakaa ^a^M2.0111^ea^ aajiivato rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi aajiivato ^a^T3.0143^ea^ rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. parisuddhadhammadesano samaano `parisuddhadhammadesanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddhaa me dhammadesanaa pariyodaataa asa.mkili.t.thaa'ti. na ca ma.m saavakaa dhammadesanato rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi dhammadesanato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. parisuddhaveyyaakara.no samaano `parisuddhaveyyaakara.nomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me veyyaakara.na.m pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. na ca ma.m saavakaa veyyaakara.nato rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi veyyaakara.nato rakkha.m paccaasiisaami. parisuddha~naa.nadassano samaano `parisuddha~naa.nadassanomhii'ti pa.tijaanaami `parisuddha.m me ~naa.nadassana.m ^a^V2.0118^ea^ pariyodaata.m asa.mkili.t.tha'nti. na ca ma.m saavakaa ~naa.nadassanato rakkhanti, na caaha.m saavakehi ~naa.nadassanato rakkha.m paccaasiisaamii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0145^ea^ ^a^V2.0119^ea^ ^a^M2.0112^ea^, bhikkhave, sekhavesaarajjakara.naa dhammaa. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, siilavaa hoti, bahussuto hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti.
[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, assaddhassa saarajja.m hoti, saddhassa ta.m saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.
[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, dussiilassa saarajja.m hoti, siilavato ta.m saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.
[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, appassutassa saarajja.m hoti, bahussutassa ta.m saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.
[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, kusiitassa saarajja.m hoti, aaraddhaviiriyassa ta.m saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no.

[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, duppa~n~nassa saarajja.m hoti, pa~n~navato ta.m saarajja.m na hoti. tasmaaya.m dhammo sekhavesaarajjakara.no. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sekhavesaarajjakara.naa dhammaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0120^ea^ ^a^P3.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ussa"nkitaparisa"nkito hoti paapabhikkhuuti api akuppadhammopi {api akuppadhammo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}.
[03] katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vesiyaagocaro vaa hoti, vidhavaagocaro vaa hoti, thullakumaarikaagocaro vaa hoti, pa.n.dakagocaro vaa hoti, bhikkhuniigocaro vaa hoti.
[03] ``imehi ^a^M2.0113^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ussa"nkitaparisa"nkito hoti paapabhikkhuuti api akuppadhammopii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekaagaarikampi karoti, paripanthepi ti.t.thati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacaagii ca, ekacaarii ca.
[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro visamanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro nadiividugga.m vaa nissito hoti pabbatavisama.m vaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro visamanissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro gahananissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ti.nagahana.m vaa nissito hoti rukkhagahana.m vaa rodha.m {gedha.m (sii0) a0 ni0 3.51} vaa mahaavanasa.n.da.m vaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro gahananissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro balavanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro raajaana.m ^a^V2.0121^ea^ vaa raajamahaamattaana.m vaa nissito hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci ^a^P3.0129^ea^ vakkhati, ime me raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nissantii'ti. sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha, tyassa raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro balavanissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro bhogacaagii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro a.d.dho hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ito bhogena pa.tisantharissaamii'ti. sace na.m ^a^T3.0146^ea^ koci ki~nci aaha, tato bhogena pa.tisantharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro bhogacaagii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ekacaarii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ekakova gaha.naani {niggaha.naani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kattaa hoti. ta.m kissa hetu? `maa me ^a^M2.0114^ea^ guyhamantaa bahiddhaa sambheda.m agama.msuu'ti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ekacaarii hoti.
[03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro sandhimpi chindati nillopampi harati ekaagaarikampi karoti paripanthepi ti.t.thati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato paapabhikkhu khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacaagii ca, ekacaarii ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamena kaayakammena samannaagato hoti, visamena vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, visamena manokammena samannaagato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu gahananissito hoti? idha ^a^P3.0130^ea^, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu micchaadi.t.thiko ^a^V2.0122^ea^ hoti antaggaahikaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu balavanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu raajaana.m vaa raajamahaamattaana.m vaa nissito hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ime me raajaano vaa ^a^T3.0147^ea^ raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nissantii'ti. sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha, tyassa raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu balavanissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu bhogacaagii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ito laabhena pa.tisantharissaamii'ti. sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha, tato laabhena pa.tisantharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu bhogacaagii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0115^ea^, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu ekacaarii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu ekakova paccantimesu janapadesu nivaasa.m kappeti. so tattha kulaani upasa"nkamanto laabha.m labhati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu ekacaarii hoti.
[03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato paapabhikkhu khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti. tatiya.m.
[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo hoti.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaacitova bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m ^a^V2.0123^ea^ senaasana.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito. yehi kho ^a^P3.0131^ea^ pana sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharati ^a^T3.0148^ea^, tyassa {tyaassa (ka0) a0 ni0 4.87} manaapeneva bahula.m kaayakammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapeneva bahula.m vaciikammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapeneva bahula.m manokammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapa.myeva upahaara.m upaharanti, appa.m amanaapa.m. yaani kho pana taani vedayitaani pittasamu.t.thaanaani vaa semhasamu.t.thaanaani vaa vaatasamu.t.thaanaani vaa sannipaatikaani vaa utupari.naamajaani vaa visamaparihaarajaani vaa opakkamikaani vaa kammavipaakajaani vaa, taanissa na bahudeva uppajjanti. appaabaadho hoti, catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo hoti.

[03] ``ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo'ti, mameva ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa {mameva ta.m sammaa (?)} vadamaano vadeyya -- `sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo'ti ^a^M2.0116^ea^. aha~nhi, bhikkhave, yaacitova bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m senaasana.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njaami, appa.m ayaacito. yehi kho pana bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m viharaami, te ma.m manaapeneva bahula.m kaayakammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena ^a^T3.0149^ea^; manaapeneva bahula.m vaciikammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapeneva bahula.m manokammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapa.myeva upahaara.m upaharanti, appa.m amanaapa.m. yaani kho pana taani vedayitaani -- pittasamu.t.thaanaani vaa semhasamu.t.thaanaani vaa vaatasamu.t.thaanaani vaa sannipaatikaani vaa utupari.naamajaani vaa visamaparihaarajaani vaa opakkamikaani vaa kammavipaakajaani vaa ^a^P3.0132^ea^ -- taani me na bahudeva uppajjanti. appaabaadhohamasmi, catunna.m kho panasmi {catunna.m kho pana (sii0), catunna.m (syaa0 pii0)} jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii {nikaamalaabhii homi (sii0 ka0)} akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi ^a^V2.0124^ea^ ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo'ti, mameva ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo'''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, phaasuvihaaraa. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, metta.m vaciikamma.m...pe0... metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. yaani taani siilaani akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani, tathaaruupehi siilehi siilasaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya, tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa di.t.thisaama~n~nagato viharati ^a^T3.0150^ea^ sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca phaasuvihaaraa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0117^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sa"nghe {bhikkhu.msa.mgho (syaa0 pii0)} viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu ^a^P3.0133^ea^ attanaa {attanaa ca (pii0 ka0)} siilasampanno hoti, no {no ca (ka0)} para.m adhisiile sampavattaa {sampavattaa hoti (ka0)}; ettaavataapi kho, aananda, bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo yathaa bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda {aanandaati bhagavaa aavoca (syaa0 pii0)}! yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m adhisiile sampavattaa; attaanupekkhii ca hoti, no paraanupekkhii; ettaavataapi kho, aananda, bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa ^a^V2.0125^ea^ pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo yathaa bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda! yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m adhisiile sampavattaa; attaanupekkhii ca hoti, no paraanupekkhii; apa~n~naato ca hoti, tena ca apa~n~naatakena no paritassati; ettaavataapi kho, aananda, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0151^ea^ sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo yathaa bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda! yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m adhisiile sampavattaa; attaanupekkhii ca hoti, no paraanupekkhii; apa~n~naato ca hoti, tena ca apa~n~naatakena no paritassati; catunna~nca {catunna.m (pii0 ka0)} jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; ettaavataapi kho, aananda, bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa ^a^M2.0118^ea^ pana, bhante, a~n~nopi pariyaayo yathaa bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyyaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda! yato kho, aananda, bhikkhu attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m adhisiile sampavattaa; attaanupekkhii ca hoti, no paraanupekkhii; apa~n~naato ^a^P3.0134^ea^ ca hoti, tena ca apa~n~naatakena no paritassati; catunna~nca jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana~nca {aasavaana.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati; ettaavataapi kho, aananda, bhikkhu sa"nghe viharanto phaasu.m vihareyya.
[03] ``imamhaa caaha.m, aananda, phaasuvihaaraa a~n~no phaasuvihaaro uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthiiti vadaamii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0152^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.
[03] ``katamehi ^a^V2.0126^ea^ pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti, samaadhisampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampanno hoti, vimuttisampanno hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti.
[03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. sattama.m.
[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[03] ``katamehi, pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena ^a^M2.0119^ea^ pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0135^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu caatuddiso hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo ^a^T3.0153^ea^, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; santu.t.tho hoti itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^V2.0127^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi, kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu caatuddiso hotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^P3.0136^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi ^a^M2.0120^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu''nti. dasama.m.
[06] phaasuvihaaravaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] saarajja.m ^a^T3.0154^ea^ sa"nkito coro, sukhumaala.m phaasu pa~ncama.m.
[22] aananda siilaasekhaa ca, caatuddiso ara~n~nena caati..

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato kuluupako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? asanthavavissaasii {asanthutavissaasii (sii0), asandhavavissaasii (ka0)} ca hoti, anissaravikappii ca, vissa.t.thupasevii {viyatthupasevii (sii0), byatthupasevii (syaa0 ka.m0), vyattuupasevii (pii0)} ca, upaka.n.nakajappii ca, atiyaacanako ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato kuluupako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanaapo ca agaru ca abhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato kuluupako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? na asanthavavissaasii ca hoti, na anissaravikappii ca, na vissa.t.thupasevii ca, na upaka.n.nakajappii ca, na atiyaacanako ca. imehi ^a^P3.0137^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato kuluupako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pacchaasama.no na aadaatabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? atiduure vaa gacchati accaasanne vaa ^a^T3.0155^ea^, na pattapariyaapanna.m ^a^M2.0121^ea^ ga.nhati, aapattisaamantaa bha.namaana.m na nivaareti, bha.namaanassa antarantaraa katha.m opaateti, duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato pacchaasama.no na aadaatabbo.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pacchaasama.no aadaatabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? naatiduure gacchati na accaasanne, pattapariyaapanna.m ga.nhati, aapattisaamantaa bha.namaana.m nivaareti ^a^V2.0129^ea^, bha.namaanassa na antarantaraa katha.m opaateti, pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo ane.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato pacchaasama.no aadaatabbo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha ^a^P3.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti ruupaana.m, khamo saddaana.m, khamo gandhaana.m, khamo rasaana.m, khamo pho.t.thabbaana.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo sammaasamaadhi.m upasampajja viharitu''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu viharati andhakavinde. atha ^a^T3.0156^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ye te, aananda, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, te vo, aananda, bhikkhuu pa~ncasu dhammesu samaadapetabbaa {samaadaapetabbaa (?)} nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa ^a^M2.0122^ea^. katamesu pa~ncasu? `etha tumhe, aavuso, siilavaa hotha, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvutaa viharatha aacaaragocarasampannaa a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavino, samaadaaya sikkhatha sikkhaapadesuu'ti -- iti paatimokkhasa.mvare samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa.

[03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, indriyesu guttadvaaraa viharatha aarakkhasatino nipakkasatino {nipakasatino (sii0 syaa0), nepakkasatino (?)}, saarakkhitamaanasaa ^a^V2.0130^ea^ sataarakkhena cetasaa samannaagataa'ti -- iti indriyasa.mvare samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa.
[03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, appabhassaa hotha, bhasse pariyantakaarino'ti -- iti bhassapariyante samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa.
[03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, aara~n~nikaa hotha, ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevathaa'ti -- iti kaayavuupakaase samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa.

[03] ```etha tumhe, aavuso, sammaadi.t.thikaa hotha sammaadassanena samannaagataa'ti -- iti sammaadassane samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa. ye ^a^P3.0139^ea^ te, aananda, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, te vo, aananda, bhikkhuu imesu pa~ncasu dhammesu samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa''ti ^a^T3.0157^ea^. catuttha.m.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? aavaasamaccharinii hoti, kulamaccharinii hoti, laabhamaccharinii hoti, va.n.namaccharinii hoti, dhammamaccharinii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? na aavaasamaccharinii hoti, na kulamaccharinii hoti, na laabhamaccharinii hoti, na va.n.namaccharinii hoti, na dhammamaccharinii hoti ^a^M2.0123^ea^. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m sagge''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0131^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti, ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa pasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti, saddhaadeyya.m vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagataa bhikkhunii yathaabhata.m nikkhittaa eva.m niraye.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0134^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena gilaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m dubbala.m gilaanaka.m; disvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] ``ya.m ^a^M2.0126^ea^ ki~nci {ya.m ki~nci (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m dubbala.m {bhikkhave dubbala.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} gilaanaka.m pa~nca dhammaa na vijahanti, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `nacirasseva aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'''ti.

[03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0161^ea^ asubhaanupassii kaaye viharati, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nii, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~nii {sabbatthapi evameva dissati}, sabbasa"nkhaaresu ^a^P3.0143^ea^ aniccaanupassii, mara.nasa~n~naa kho panassa ajjhatta.m suupa.t.thitaa hoti. ya.m ki~nci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m dubbala.m gilaanaka.m ime pa~nca dhammaa na vijahanti, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `nacirasseva aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ``yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa pa~nca dhamme bhaaveti pa~nca dhamme bahuliikaroti, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa.

[03] ``katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ajjhatta~n~neva sati suupa.t.thitaa hoti dhammaana.m udayatthagaaminiyaa ^a^V2.0135^ea^ pa~n~naaya, asubhaanupassii kaaye viharati, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nii, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~nii, sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassii. yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa ime pa~nca dhamme bhaaveti ime pa~nca dhamme bahuliikaroti, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato gilaano duupa.t.thaako {dupa.t.thaako (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) mahaava0 366} hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? asappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m na jaanaati, bhesajja.m nappa.tisevitaa hoti, atthakaamassa gilaanupa.t.thaakassa ^a^T3.0162^ea^ na yathaabhuuta.m aabaadha.m aavikattaa hoti abhikkamanta.m vaa abhikkamatiiti pa.tikkamanta.m vaa pa.tikkamatiiti .thita.m vaa .thitoti, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m ^a^M2.0127^ea^ vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m {tippaana.m (sii0) mahaava0 366} kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m anadhivaasakajaatiko hoti. imehi ^a^P3.0144^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato gilaano duupa.t.thaako hoti.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato gilaano suupa.t.thaako hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? sappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m jaanaati, bhesajja.m pa.tisevitaa hoti, atthakaamassa gilaanupa.t.thaakassa yathaabhuuta.m aabaadha.m aavikattaa hoti abhikkamanta.m vaa abhikkamatiiti pa.tikkamanta.m vaa pa.tikkamatiiti .thita.m vaa .thitoti, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato gilaano suupa.t.thaako hotii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako naala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? nappa.tibalo hoti bhesajja.m sa.mvidhaatu.m; sappaayaasappaaya.m na jaanaati, asappaaya.m upanaameti, sappaaya.m apanaameti; aamisantaro gilaana.m upa.t.thaati, no mettacitto ^a^V2.0136^ea^; jegucchii hoti uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa vanta.m vaa khe.la.m vaa niiharitu.m; nappa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m {samaadaapetu.m (?) mahaava0 366} samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi ^a^T3.0163^ea^ samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako naala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako ala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? pa.tibalo hoti bhesajja.m sa.mvidhaatu.m; sappaayaasappaaya.m jaanaati, asappaaya.m apanaameti, sappaaya.m upanaameti; mettacitto gilaana.m upa.t.thaati, no aamisantaro; ajegucchii hoti uccaara.m vaa passaava.m vaa vanta.m vaa khe.la.m vaa niiharitu.m; pa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m. imehi ^a^P3.0145^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato gilaanupa.t.thaako ala.m gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa anaayussaa. katame pa~nca? asappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m na jaanaati, apari.natabhojii ca hoti, akaalacaarii ca hoti, abrahmacaarii ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa anaayussaa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa aayussaa. katame pa~nca? sappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m jaanaati, pari.natabhojii ca hoti, kaalacaarii ca hoti, brahmacaarii ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa aayussaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa anaayussaa. katame pa~nca? asappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m na jaanaati, apari.natabhojii ca hoti, dussiilo ca, paapamitto ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa anaayussaa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa aayussaa. katame pa~nca ^a^T3.0164^ea^? sappaayakaarii hoti, sappaaye matta.m ^a^V2.0137^ea^ jaanaati, pari.natabhojii ca hoti, siilavaa ca, kalyaa.namitto ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa aayussaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu.m {vi + apa + kaasitu.m = vapakaasitu.m}. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena senaasanena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, kaamasa"nkappabahulo ca viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha ^a^P3.0146^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena senaasanena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena ^a^M2.0129^ea^, nekkhammasa"nkappabahulo {na kaamasa"nkappabahulo (ka0)} ca viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m sa"nghamhaa vapakaasitu''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, sama.nadukkhaani. katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena senaasanena, asantu.t.tho hoti itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, anabhirato ^a^T3.0165^ea^ ca brahmacariya.m carati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sama.nadukkhaani.

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, sama.nasukhaani. katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ^a^V2.0138^ea^ senaasanena, santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, abhirato ca brahmacariya.m carati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sama.nasukhaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aapaayikaa nerayikaa parikuppaa atekicchaa. katame pa~nca? maataa {maatara.m (ka0)} jiivitaa voropitaa hoti, pitaa {pitara.m (ka0)} jiivitaa voropito {voropitaa (ka0)} hoti, araha.m {arahanta.m (ka0), arahaa (syaa0)} jiivitaa voropito hoti, tathaagatassa du.t.thena cittena lohita.m uppaadita.m hoti, sa"ngho bhinno hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aapaayikaa nerayikaa parikuppaa atekicchaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P3.0147^ea^, bhikkhave, byasanaani. katamaani pa~nca? ~naatibyasana.m, bhogabyasana.m, rogabyasana.m, siilabyasana.m, di.t.thibyasana.m. na, bhikkhave, sattaa ~naatibyasanahetu vaa ^a^M2.0130^ea^ bhogabyasanahetu vaa rogabyasanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. siilabyasanahetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thibyasanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca byasanaani.

[01] ``pa~ncimaa, bhikkhave, sampadaa. katamaa pa~nca? ~naatisampadaa, bhogasampadaa, aarogyasampadaa, siilasampadaa, di.t.thisampadaa. na, bhikkhave, sattaa ~naatisampadaahetu vaa bhogasampadaahetu vaa aarogyasampadaahetu ^a^T3.0166^ea^ vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. siilasampadaahetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa di.t.thisampadaahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sampadaa''ti. dasama.m.
