[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0140^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato raajaa cakkavattii dhammeneva cakka.m vatteti {pavatteti (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m {appativattiya.m (sii0)} ^a^P3.0148^ea^ kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paa.ninaa.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii attha~n~nuu ca hoti, dhamma~n~nuu ca, matta~n~nuu ca, kaala~n~nuu ca, parisa~n~nuu ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato raajaa cakkavattii dhammeneva cakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paa.ninaa.

[03] ``evameva.m ^a^M2.0131^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammeneva anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa ^a^T3.0167^ea^ brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m.

[01] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho attha~n~nuu, dhamma~n~nuu, matta~n~nuu, kaala~n~nuu, parisa~n~nuu. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammeneva anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti dhammacakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no cakkavattissa je.t.tho putto pitaraa pavattita.m cakka.m dhammeneva anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paa.ninaa.

[03] ``katamehi ^a^V2.0141^ea^ pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no cakkavattissa je.t.tho putto attha~n~nuu ca hoti, dhamma~n~nuu ca, matta~n~nuu ca, kaala~n~nuu ca, parisa~n~nuu ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no cakkavattissa je.t.tho putto pitaraa pavattita.m cakka.m dhammeneva anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paa.ninaa.

[03] ``evameva.m ^a^P3.0149^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato saariputto tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m sammadeva anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, saariputto attha~n~nuu, dhamma~n~nuu, matta~n~nuu ^a^T3.0168^ea^, kaala~n~nuu, parisa~n~nuu. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato saariputto tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m sammadeva anuppavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^M2.0132^ea^ so {yopi kho (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa, sopi na araajaka.m cakka.m vattetii''ti. eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko pana, bhante, ra~n~no cakkavattissa dhammikassa dhammara~n~no raajaa''ti? ``dhammo, bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``idha, bhikkhu, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati antojanasmi.m.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati khattiyesu anuyantesu {anuyuttesu (sii0) a0 ni0 3.14} ...pe0... balakaayasmi.m braahma.nagahapatikesu negamajaanapadesu ^a^V2.0142^ea^ sama.nabraahma.nesu migapakkhiisu. sa ^a^P3.0150^ea^ kho so, bhikkhu, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa antojanasmi.m dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa khattiyesu anuyantesu balakaayasmi.m braahma.nagahapatikesu negamajaanapadesu sama.nabraahma.nesu migapakkhiisu dhammeneva cakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena ^a^T3.0169^ea^ paa.ninaa.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati bhikkhuusu -- `evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m manokamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m manokamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupo aajiivo sevitabbo, evaruupo aajiivo na sevitabbo; evaruupo gaamanigamo sevitabbo, evaruupo gaamanigamo na sevitabbo'ti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0133^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati bhikkhuniisu {bhikkhuusu bhikkhuniisu (sii0 pii0)} ...pe0... upaasakesu...pe0... upaasikaasu -- `evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupa.m manokamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m manokamma.m na sevitabba.m; evaruupo aajiivo sevitabbo, evaruupo aajiivo na sevitabbo; evaruupo gaamanigamo sevitabbo, evaruupo gaamanigamo na sevitabbo'''ti.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiko ^a^P3.0151^ea^ dhammaraajaa dhamma~n~neva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa bhikkhuusu, dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa bhikkhuniisu, dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa upaasakesu, dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa upaasikaasu dhammeneva anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti; ta.m hoti cakka.m ^a^V2.0143^ea^ appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.
[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati, sakasmi.myeva vijite viharati.

[03] ``katamehi ^a^T3.0170^ea^ pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; a.d.dho hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro; balavaa kho pana hoti catura"nginiyaa senaaya samannaagato assavaaya ovaadapa.tikaraaya; pari.naayako kho panassa hoti pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m; tassime cattaaro dhammaa yasa.m paripaacenti. so iminaa yasapa~ncamena ^a^M2.0134^ea^ {yasena pa~ncamena (ka0), pa~ncamena (sii0)} dhammena samannaagato yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati, sakasmi.myeva vijite viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti vijitaaviina.m.

[01] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati, vimuttacittova {vimuttacitto (sii0 pii0), vimuttacitto ca (ka0)} viharati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu -- raajaava ^a^P3.0152^ea^ khattiyo muddhaavasitto jaatisampanno; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa -- raajaava ^a^V2.0144^ea^ khattiyo muddhaavasitto a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu -- raajaava khattiyo muddhaavasitto balasampanno; pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa -- raajaava khattiyo muddhaavasitto pari.naayakasampanno; tassime cattaaro dhammaa vimutti.m paripaacenti ^a^T3.0171^ea^. so iminaa vimuttipa~ncamena dhammena samannaagato yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati vimuttacittova viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti vimuttacittaana''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto rajja.m pattheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; abhiruupo hoti ^a^M2.0135^ea^ dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato; maataapituuna.m piyo hoti manaapo; negamajaanapadassa piyo hoti manaapo; yaani taani ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m sippa.t.thaanaani hatthismi.m vaa assasmi.m vaa rathasmi.m vaa dhanusmi.m vaa tharusmi.m vaa tattha sikkhito hoti anavayo.

[03] ``tassa ^a^P3.0153^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi maataapituuna.m piyo manaapo. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi negamajaanapadassa piyo manaapo. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi yaani taani ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m ^a^T3.0172^ea^ sippa.t.thaanaani hatthismi.m vaa assasmi.m vaa rathasmi.m vaa dhanusmi.m vaa tharusmi.m vaa, tattha {tatthamhi (sii0), tatthapi (ka0)} sikkhito anavayo. kasmaaha.m rajja.m na pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto rajja.m pattheti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m pattheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro ^a^V2.0145^ea^ purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko, samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya; asa.tho hoti amaayaavii, yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.

[03] ``tassa ^a^M2.0136^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi saddho, saddahaami tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. `kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m ^a^P3.0154^ea^ khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi appaabaadho appaata"nko samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi asa.tho amaayaavii yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi aaraddhaviiriyo viharaami akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m ^a^T3.0173^ea^ khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi pa~n~navaa udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m patthetii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto oparajja.m {uparajja.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} pattheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; abhiruupo hoti dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato; maataapituuna.m piyo hoti manaapo, balakaayassa piyo hoti manaapo; pa.n.dito hoti viyatto medhaavii pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m.

[03] ``tassa ^a^V2.0146^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi maataapituuna.m piyo ^a^M2.0137^ea^ manaapo. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m ^a^P3.0155^ea^ khomhi balakaayassa piyo manaapo. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m ^a^T3.0174^ea^ na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m. kasmaaha.m oparajja.m na pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto oparajja.m pattheti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m pattheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto {supa.t.thitacitto (sii0 syaa0), suupa.t.thitacitto (ka0)} hoti; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.

[03] ``tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m khomhi siilavaa, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharaami aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhaami sikkhaapadesu. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi bahussuto sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m {satthaa bya~njanaa (sii0)} kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaa me dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi aaraddhaviiriyo viharaami akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya.m! aha.m khomhi pa~n~navaa udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya ^a^P3.0156^ea^ sammaa ^a^V2.0147^ea^ dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. kasmaaha.m aasavaana.m khaya.m na pattheyya'nti! imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aasavaana.m khaya.m patthetii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0175^ea^ ^a^M2.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, appa.m rattiyaa supanti, bahu.m jagganti. katame pa~nca? itthii, bhikkhave, purisaadhippaayaa appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati. puriso, bhikkhave, itthaadhippaayo appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati. coro, bhikkhave, aadaanaadhippaayo appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati. raajaa {raajayutto (pii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, raajakara.niiyesu yutto appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati. bhikkhu, bhikkhave, visa.myogaadhippaayo appa.m rattiyaa supati, bahu.m jaggati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca appa.m rattiyaa supanti, bahu.m jaggantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no naago bhattaadako ca hoti okaasaphara.no ca la.n.dasaara.no ca salaakaggaahii ca ra~n~no naagotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no naago bhattaadako ca okaasaphara.no ca la.n.dasaara.no ca salaakaggaahii ca, ra~n~no naagotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhattaadako ca hoti, okaasaphara.no ca ma~ncapii.thamaddano {pii.thamaddano (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ca salaakaggaahii ca, bhikkhutveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha ^a^P3.0157^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ^a^T3.0176^ea^ bhattaadako ca hoti okaasaphara.no ca ma~ncapii.thamaddano ca salaakaggaahii ca, bhikkhutveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0148^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no naago na raajaaraho hoti na raajabhoggo, na ra~n~no a"nga.mtveva sa"nkha.m gacchati ^a^M2.0139^ea^. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato hatthikaaya.m vaa disvaa assakaaya.m vaa disvaa rathakaaya.m vaa disvaa pattikaaya.m vaa disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti saddaana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato hatthisadda.m vaa sutvaa assasadda.m vaa sutvaa rathasadda.m vaa sutvaa pattisadda.m vaa sutvaa bheripa.navasa"nkhati.navaninnaadasadda.m vaa sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti saddaana.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti gandhaana.m? idha ^a^P3.0158^ea^, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato ye te ra~n~no naagaa abhijaataa sa"ngaamaavacaraa tesa.m muttakariisassa gandha.m ghaayitvaa sa.msiidati visiidati, na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti gandhaana.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti pho.t.thabbaana.m? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago ^a^V2.0149^ea^ sa"ngaamagato ekena vaa saravegena viddho, dviihi vaa tiihi vaa catuuhi vaa pa~ncahi vaa saravegehi viddho sa.msiidati visiidati, na ^a^M2.0140^ea^ santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago akkhamo hoti pho.t.thabbaana.m.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu na aahuneyyo hoti na paahuneyyo na dakkhi.neyyo na a~njalikara.niiyo na anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti ruupaana.m, akkhamo saddaana.m, akkhamo gandhaana.m, akkhamo rasaana.m, akkhamo pho.t.thabbaana.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago yamena.m hatthidammasaarathi {hatthidammasaarathii (sii0)} kaara.na.m kaareti -- yadi vaa katapubba.m yadi vaa akatapubba.m ^a^P3.0162^ea^ -- ta.m a.t.thi.m katvaa {a.t.thikatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a0 ni0 4.114} manasi katvaa sabba.m cetasaa {sabbacetasaa (?)} samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto su.naati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago hantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato hatthimpi hanati {hanti (sii0 pii0)}, hatthaaruhampi hanati, assampi hanati, assaaruhampi hanati, rathampi hanati, rathikampi {rathaaruhampi (pii0)} hanati, pattikampi hanati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago hantaa hoti.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0147^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii hoti; ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii hoti; ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo aarabhati ca vippa.tisaarii ca hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa ^a^V2.0157^ea^ nirujjhanti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato kho aarambhajaa {aarabbhajaa (pii0 ka0), aarabhajaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} aasavaa sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa pava.d.dhanti {sa.mva.d.dhanti (ka0)}, saadhu vataayasmaa aarambhaje aasave pahaaya vippa.tisaaraje aasave pa.tivinodetvaa citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu {bhaavetu.m (sii0 pii0)}; evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato kho aarambhajaa aasavaa sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa na pava.d.dhanti, saadhu vataayasmaa aarambhaje aasave pahaaya citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu; evamaayasmaa ^a^T3.0187^ea^ amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo na aarabhati vippa.tisaarii hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato ^a^P3.0167^ea^ kho aarambhajaa aasavaa na sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa pava.d.dhanti, saadhu vataayasmaa vippa.tisaaraje aasave pa.tivinodetvaa citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu; evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii''' ti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo na aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa ^a^M2.0148^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aayasmato kho aarambhajaa aasavaa na sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa na pava.d.dhanti, saadhu vataayasmaa citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu; evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii'''ti.
[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro puggalaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena eva.m ovadiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiyamaanaa anupubbena aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.nantii''ti {pu0 pa0 191}. dutiya.m.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0158^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaana.m licchavisataana.m saarandade cetiye sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa ^a^T3.0188^ea^ udapaadi -- ``pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? hatthiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, assaratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, ma.niratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, itthiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, gahapatiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi''nti.

[03] atha ^a^P3.0168^ea^ kho te licchavii magge purisa.m .thapesu.m {pesesu.m (syaa0 ka0)} -- ``yadaa tva.m {yathaa tva.m (sii0 pii0)}, ambho purisa, passeyyaasi bhagavanta.m, atha amhaaka.m aaroceyyaasii''ti. addasaa kho so puriso bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m; disvaana yena te licchavii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te licchavii etadavoca -- ``aya.m so, bhante, bhagavaa gacchati araha.m sammaasambuddho; yassadaani kaala.m ma~n~nathaa''ti.
[03] atha kho te licchavii yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho te licchavii bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``saadhu, bhante, yena saarandada.m cetiya.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho bhagavaa yena ^a^M2.0149^ea^ saarandada.m cetiya.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa te licchavii etadavoca -- ``kaaya nuttha, licchavii, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m ^a^T3.0189^ea^? hatthiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, assaratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, ma.niratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, itthiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, gahapatiratanassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi'''nti.

[03] ``kaamaadhimuttaana.m ^a^V2.0159^ea^ vata, bho, licchaviina.m {kaamaadhimuttaana.m vata vo licchaviina.m (sii0), kaamaadhimuttaana.m vata vo licchavii (syaa0), kaamaadhimuttaana.mva vo licchavii (?)} kaama.myeva aarabbha antaraakathaa udapaadi. pa~ncanna.m, licchavii, ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa ^a^P3.0169^ea^ desetaa puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m, tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vi~n~naataa puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m, tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vi~n~naataa {vi~n~naatassa (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0 5.195} dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m, kata~n~nuu katavedii puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m. imesa.m kho, licchavii, pa~ncanna.m ratanaana.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saakete viharati tika.n.dakiivane {ka.n.dakiivane (sa.m0 ni0 5.902)}. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii {appa.tikkuule pa.tikkuulasa~n~nii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vihareyya. saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya. saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ^a^M2.0150^ea^ ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya. saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii ^a^T3.0190^ea^ vihareyya. saadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m pa.tikuula~nca appa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya sato sampajaano.

[03] ``ki~nca {katha~nca (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me dosaniiyesu dhammesu doso udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.

[03] ``ki~nca ^a^V2.0160^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m ^a^P3.0170^ea^ pa.ticca appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago udapaadi, maa me dosaniiyesu dhammesu doso udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuule ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya? `maa me dosaniiyesu dhammesu doso udapaadi, maa me rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuula~nca appa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya? `sato sampajaano maa me ^a^T3.0191^ea^ kvacani {kvacini (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} katthaci ki~ncana.m {ki~ncana (sii0 pii0)} rajaniiyesu dhammesu raago udapaadi, maa me kvacani katthaci ki~ncana.m dosaniiyesu dhammesu doso udapaadi, maa me kvacani katthaci ki~ncana.m mohaniiyesu dhammesu moho udapaadii'ti -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasa.m pa.ticca pa.tikuula~nca appa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya sato sampajaano''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii ^a^M2.0151^ea^ hoti, musaavaadii hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[01] ``pa~ncahi ^a^P3.0171^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imehi ^a^V2.0161^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? kammanta.m kaareti, adhikara.na.m aadiyati, paamokkhesu bhikkhuusu pa.tiviruddho hoti, diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m {avatthaanacaarika.m (syaa0)} anuyutto viharati, nappa.tibalo hoti kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m ^a^T3.0192^ea^ samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? na kammanta.m kaareti, na adhikara.na.m aadiyati, na paamokkhesu bhikkhuusu pa.tiviruddho hoti, na diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyutto viharati, pa.tibalo hoti kaalena kaala.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, asappurisadaanaani. katamaani pa~nca? asakkacca.m deti, acittiikatvaa {acittikatvaa (pii0), aciti.m katvaa (syaa0), acitti.m katvaa (ka0)} deti, asahatthaa deti, apaviddha.m {apavi.t.ta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} deti, anaagamanadi.t.thiko deti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca asappurisadaanaani.

[03] ``pa~ncimaani ^a^M2.0152^ea^ ^a^P3.0172^ea^, bhikkhave, sappurisadaanaani. katamaani pa~nca? sakkacca.m deti, cittiikatvaa deti, sahatthaa deti, anapaviddha.m deti, aagamanadi.t.thiko deti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sappurisadaanaanii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^V2.0162^ea^, bhikkhave, sappurisadaanaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaaya daana.m deti, sakkacca.m daana.m deti, kaalena daana.m deti, anuggahitacitto {anaggahitacitto (sii0)} daana.m deti, attaana~nca para~nca anupahacca daana.m deti.

[03] ``saddhaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa daanassa ^a^T3.0193^ea^ vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo, abhiruupo ca hoti dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato.

[03] ``sakkacca.m kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa daanassa vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo. yepissa te honti puttaati vaa daaraati vaa daasaati vaa pessaati vaa kammakaraati {kammakaaraati (ka0)} vaa, tepi sussuusanti sota.m odahanti a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti.
[03] ``kaalena kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa daanassa vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo; kaalaagataa cassa atthaa pacuraa honti.

[03] ``anuggahitacitto kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa daanassa vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo; u.laaresu ca pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu bhogaaya citta.m namati.

[03] ``attaana~nca ^a^P3.0173^ea^ para~nca anupahacca kho pana, bhikkhave, daana.m datvaa yattha yattha tassa daanassa vipaako nibbattati, a.d.dho ca hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo; na cassa kutoci bhogaana.m upaghaato aagacchati aggito vaa udakato vaa raajato vaa corato vaa appiyato vaa daayaadato vaa {appiyato vaa daayaadato vaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), appiyadaayaadato vaa (ka0)}. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca sappurisadaanaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0163^ea^ ^a^M2.0153^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? kammaaraamataa, bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa ^a^T3.0194^ea^, sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, yathaavimutta.m citta.m na paccavekkhati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? na kammaaraamataa, na bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, na sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, yathaavimutta.m citta.m paccavekkhati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ {kathaa0 267} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? kammaaraamataa, bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa, indriyesu aguttadvaarataa, bhojane amatta~n~nutaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? na kammaaraamataa, na bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, indriyesu guttadvaarataa, bhojane matta~n~nutaa. ime ^a^P3.0174^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] tika.n.dakiivaggo pa~ncamo.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0195^ea^ ^a^V2.0164^ea^ ^a^M2.0154^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? katha.m paribhoti, kathika.m {kathita.m (ka0)} paribhoti, attaana.m paribhoti, vikkhittacitto dhamma.m su.naati, anekaggacitto ayoniso ca {ayoniso (syaa0 ka.m0)} manasi karoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m ^a^P3.0175^ea^ bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na katha.m paribhoti, na kathika.m paribhoti, na attaana.m paribhoti, avikkhittacitto dhamma.m su.naati, ekaggacitto yoniso ca manasi karoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? katha.m paribhoti, kathika.m paribhoti, attaana.m paribhoti, duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo, ana~n~naate a~n~naatamaanii hoti. imehi kho ^a^T3.0196^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0165^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? na katha.m paribhoti, na kathika.m paribhoti, na attaana.m paribhoti, pa~n~navaa hoti ^a^M2.0155^ea^ aja.lo ane.lamuugo, na ana~n~naate a~n~naatamaanii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? makkhii dhamma.m su.naati makkhapariyu.t.thito, upaarambhacitto {saupaarambhacitto (syaa0 ka.m0)} dhamma.m su.naati randhagavesii, dhammadesake ^a^P3.0176^ea^ aahatacitto hoti khiilajaato {khilajaato (syaa0 pii0)}, duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo, ana~n~naate a~n~naatamaanii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? amakkhii dhamma.m su.naati na makkhapariyu.t.thito, anupaarambhacitto dhamma.m su.naati na randhagavesii, dhammadesake anaahatacitto hoti akhiilajaato, pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo ane.lamuugo, na ^a^T3.0197^ea^ ana~n~naate a~n~naatamaanii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu na sakkacca.m dhamma.m su.nanti, na sakkacca.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, na sakkacca.m dhamma.m dhaarenti, na sakkacca.m dhaataana.m {dhataana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhanti, na ^a^V2.0166^ea^ sakkacca.m atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjanti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sakkacca.m dhamma.m su.nanti, sakkacca.m ^a^M2.0156^ea^ dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, sakkacca.m dhamma.m dhaarenti, sakkacca.m dhaataana.m dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhanti, sakkacca.m atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjanti. ime ^a^P3.0177^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu dhamma.m na pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m ^a^T3.0198^ea^ na vitthaarena paresa.m desenti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m na vitthaarena para.m {paresa.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), pare (?)} vaacenti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0157^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m desenti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakkenti anuvicaarenti manasaanupekkhanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 4.160} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu duggahita.m suttanta.m pariyaapu.nanti dunnikkhittehi padabya~njanehi ^a^V2.0168^ea^. dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabya~njanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu dubbacaa honti, dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa, akkhamaa appadakkhi.naggaahino anusaasani.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0179^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa, te na sakkacca.m suttanta.m para.m vaacenti; tesa.m accayena chinnamuulako suttanto hoti appa.tisara.no. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, theraa bhikkhuu baahulikaa honti saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa ^a^T3.0200^ea^, na viiriya.m aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa ^a^M2.0158^ea^ anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati. saapi hoti baahulikaa saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, na viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho bhinno hoti. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m paribhaasaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajanaa {pariccajaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} ca honti. tattha appasannaa ceva nappasiidanti, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathatta.m hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu suggahita.m suttanta.m pariyaapu.nanti sunikkhittehi ^a^V2.0169^ea^ padabya~njanehi. sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabya~njanassa atthopi sunayo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0180^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu suvacaa honti sovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa, khamaa padakkhi.naggaahino anusaasani.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya ^a^T3.0201^ea^ sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa, te sakkacca.m suttanta.m para.m vaacenti; tesa.m accayena na chinnamuulako {acchinnamuulako (ka0) a0 ni0 4.160} suttanto hoti sappa.tisara.no. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, theraa bhikkhuu na baahulikaa honti na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa; viiriya.m aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa ^a^M2.0159^ea^ anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati. saapi hoti na baahulikaa na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa, viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, sa"ngho samaggo sammodamaano avivadamaano ekuddeso phaasu.m viharati. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m akkosaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m paribhaasaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajanaa honti. tattha appasannaa ceva pasiidanti, pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncanna.m ^a^T3.0202^ea^ ^a^V2.0170^ea^ ^a^P3.0181^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaana.m kathaa dukkathaa puggale puggala.m {puggala.m puggala.m (sii0 pii0)} upanidhaaya. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? assaddhassa, bhikkhave, saddhaakathaa dukkathaa; dussiilassa siilakathaa dukkathaa; appassutassa baahusaccakathaa dukkathaa; maccharissa {macchariyassa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} caagakathaa dukkathaa; duppa~n~nassa pa~n~naakathaa dukkathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, assaddhassa saddhaakathaa dukkathaa? assaddho, bhikkhave, saddhaakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, saddhaasampada.m attani na samanupassati {na sampassati (sii0)}, na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa assaddhassa saddhaakathaa dukkathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilakathaa dukkathaa? dussiilo, bhikkhave, siilakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so ^a^M2.0160^ea^, bhikkhave, siilasampada.m attani na samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa dussiilassa siilakathaa dukkathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, appassutassa baahusaccakathaa dukkathaa? appassuto, bhikkhave, baahusaccakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampada.m attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa appassutassa baahusaccakathaa ^a^T3.0203^ea^ dukkathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, maccharissa caagakathaa dukkathaa? maccharii, bhikkhave, caagakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti ^a^V2.0171^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, caagasampada.m attani na samanupassati na ca labhati ^a^P3.0182^ea^ tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa maccharissa caagakathaa dukkathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, duppa~n~nassa pa~n~naakathaa dukkathaa? duppa~n~no, bhikkhave, pa~n~naakathaaya kacchamaanaaya abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, pa~n~naasampada.m attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa duppa~n~nassa pa~n~naakathaa dukkathaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m puggalaana.m kathaa dukkathaa puggale puggala.m upanidhaaya.

[03] ``pa~ncanna.m, bhikkhave, puggalaana.m kathaa sukathaa puggale puggala.m upanidhaaya. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m? saddhassa, bhikkhave, saddhaakathaa sukathaa; siilavato siilakathaa sukathaa; bahussutassa baahusaccakathaa sukathaa; caagavato caagakathaa sukathaa; pa~n~navato pa~n~naakathaa sukathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, saddhassa saddhaakathaa sukathaa? saddho, bhikkhave, saddhaakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, saddhaasampada.m attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m ^a^T3.0204^ea^. tasmaa saddhassa saddhaakathaa sukathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, siilavato siilakathaa sukathaa? siilavaa, bhikkhave, siilakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na ^a^M2.0161^ea^ patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, siilasampada.m attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa siilavato siilakathaa sukathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, bahussutassa baahusaccakathaa sukathaa? bahussuto, bhikkhave, baahusaccakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na patitthiiyati ^a^P3.0183^ea^ na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampada.m attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa bahussutassa baahusaccakathaa sukathaa.

[03] ``kasmaa ^a^V2.0172^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, caagavato caagakathaa sukathaa? caagavaa, bhikkhave, caagakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, caagasampada.m attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidaana.m piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa caagavato caagakathaa sukathaa.

[01] ``kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, pa~n~navato pa~n~naakathaa sukathaa? pa~n~navaa, bhikkhave, pa~n~naakathaaya kacchamaanaaya naabhisajjati na kuppati na byaapajjati na patitthiiyati na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, pa~n~naasampada.m attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidaana.m ^a^T3.0205^ea^ piitipaamojja.m. tasmaa pa~n~navato pa~n~naakathaa sukathaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m puggalaana.m kathaa sukathaa puggale puggala.m upanidhaayaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu saarajja.m okkanto {okkamanto (ka0)} hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, dussiilo hoti, appassuto hoti, kusiito hoti, dupa~n~no hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu saarajja.m okkanto hoti.

[01] ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0162^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu visaarado hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, siilavaa hoti, bahussuto hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti. imehi ^a^P3.0184^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu visaarado hotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udaayii mahatiyaa gihiparisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m udaayi.m mahatiyaa gihiparisaaya parivuta.m dhamma.m desenta.m nisinna.m. disvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^V2.0173^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, udaayii mahatiyaa gihiparisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desetii''ti {desento nisinno''ti (syaa0)}.

[03] ``na kho, aananda ^a^T3.0206^ea^, sukara.m paresa.m dhamma.m desetu.m. paresa.m, aananda, dhamma.m desentena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paresa.m dhammo desetabbo. katame pa~nca? `anupubbi.m katha.m {aanupubbikatha.m (sii0), anupubbikatha.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo desetabbo; `pariyaayadassaavii katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo desetabbo; `anuddayata.m pa.ticca katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo desetabbo; `na aamisantaro katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo desetabbo; `attaana~nca para~nca anupahacca katha.m kathessaamii'ti paresa.m dhammo desetabbo. na kho, aananda, sukara.m paresa.m dhamma.m desetu.m. paresa.m, aananda, dhamma.m desentena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paresa.m dhammo desetabbo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, uppannaa duppa.tivinodayaa. katame pa~nca? uppanno ^a^P3.0185^ea^ raago duppa.tivinodayo, uppanno doso duppa.tivinodayo, uppanno moho ^a^M2.0163^ea^ duppa.tivinodayo, uppanna.m pa.tibhaana.m duppa.tivinodaya.m, uppanna.m gamikacitta.m duppa.tivinodaya.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca uppannaa duppa.tivinodayaa''ti. dasama.m.
