[21] tayo sammattaniyaamaa, tayo saddhammasammosaa.
[22] dukkathaa ceva saarajja.m, udaayidubbinodayaati..

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0207^ea^ ^a^V2.0174^ea^, bhikkhave, aaghaatapa.tivinayaa yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aaghaato sabbaso pa.tivinetabbo. katame pa~nca? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, mettaa tasmi.m puggale bhaavetabbaa; eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, karu.naa tasmi.m puggale bhaavetabbaa; eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, upekkhaa tasmi.m puggale bhaavetabbaa; eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, asatiamanasikaaro tasmi.m puggale aapajjitabbo; eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. yasmi.m ^a^P3.0186^ea^, bhikkhave, puggale aaghaato jaayetha, kammassakataa tasmi.m puggale adhi.t.thaatabbaa -- `kammassako ayamaayasmaa kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammappa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissati kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa tassa daayaado bhavissatii'ti; eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aaghaatapa.tivinayaa, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aaghaato sabbaso pa.tivinetabbo''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ tatra ^a^M2.0164^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~ncime, aavuso, aaghaatapa.tivinayaa ^a^T3.0208^ea^ yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aaghaato sabbaso pa.tivinetabbo. katame pa~nca? idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. idha panaavuso, ekacco ^a^V2.0175^ea^ puggalo aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, labhati ca kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, na ca labhati kaalena ^a^P3.0187^ea^ kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, labhati ca kaalena vaa kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m; evaruupepi, aavuso, puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.

[03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo? seyyathaapi, aavuso, bhikkhu pa.msukuuliko rathiyaaya nantaka.m disvaa vaamena paadena nigga.nhitvaa dakkhi.nena paadena pattharitvaa {vitthaaretvaa (sii0 pii0)}, yo tattha saaro ta.m paripaatetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya; evameva.m khvaavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro, yaassa aparisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa na ^a^T3.0209^ea^ saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa, yaa ^a^M2.0165^ea^ ca khvaassa parisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa. eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.

[03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo? seyyathaapi, aavuso, pokkhara.nii sevaalapa.nakapariyonaddhaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito. so ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa ubhohi hatthehi iticiti ca sevaalapa.naka.m apaviyuuhitvaa a~njalinaa pivitvaa pakkameyya. evameva.m kho, aavuso ^a^P3.0188^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro, yaassa aparisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa na saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa, yaa ca khvaassa parisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa. eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.

[03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca ^a^V2.0176^ea^ kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo? seyyathaapi, aavuso, paritta.m gopade {gopadake (sii0 syaa0)} udaka.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito. tassa evamassa -- `ida.m kho paritta.m gopade udaka.m. sacaaha.m a~njalinaa vaa pivissaami bhaajanena vaa khobhessaamipi ta.m ^a^T3.0210^ea^ lo.lessaamipi ta.m apeyyampi ta.m karissaami. ya.mnuunaaha.m catukku.n.diko {catugu.n.diko (sii0), catuku.n.diko (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), catuko.n.diko (dii0 ni0 3.7)} nipatitvaa gopiitaka.m pivitvaa pakkameyya'nti. so catukku.n.diko nipatitvaa gopiitaka.m pivitvaa pakkameyya. evameva.m kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, yaassa aparisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa na saassa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa; yaapissa aparisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa na saapissa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa. ya~nca kho so labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m ^a^P3.0189^ea^ cetaso pasaada.m, tamevassa {tadevassa (sii0 syaa0)} tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabba.m. eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.

[03] ``tatraavuso ^a^M2.0166^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro na ca labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo? seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano addhaanamaggappa.tipanno. tassa puratopissa duure gaamo pacchatopissa duure gaamo. so na labheyya sappaayaani bhojanaani, na labheyya sappaayaani bhesajjaani, na labheyya patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m, na labheyya gaamantanaayaka.m. tamena.m a~n~nataro puriso passeyya addhaanamaggappa.tipanno. so tasmi.m purise kaaru~n~na.myeva upa.t.thaapeyya, anuddaya.myeva upa.t.thaapeyya, anukampa.myeva upa.t.thaapeyya -- `aho vataaya.m puriso labheyya sappaayaani bhojanaani, labheyya sappaayaani bhesajjaani, labheyya patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m, labheyya gaamantanaayaka.m! ta.m kissa hetu? maaya.m ^a^T3.0211^ea^ {aya.m (ka0)} puriso idheva anayabyasana.m aapajjii'ti {aapajjeyya (ka0)}! evameva.m kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro na ca labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, evaruupepi {evaruupe (pii0)}, aavuso, puggale kaaru~n~na.myeva upa.t.thaapetabba.m anuddayaayeva upa.t.thaapetabbaa anukampaayeva upa.t.thaapetabbaa -- `aho vata ayamaayasmaa kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaaveyya, vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaaveyya, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaaveyya ^a^V2.0177^ea^! ta.m kissa hetu? maaya.m aayasmaa {ayamaayasmaa (ka0)} kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjii'ti {upapajjatiiti (ka0)}! eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo.

[03] ``tatraavuso ^a^P3.0190^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, katha.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo? seyyathaapi, aavuso, pokkhara.nii acchodakaa saatodakaa siitodakaa {acchodikaa saatodikaa siitodikaa (sii0)} setakaa {setodakaa (ka0)} supatitthaa rama.niiyaa naanaarukkhehi sa~nchannaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito ^a^M2.0167^ea^. so ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa nhaatvaa ca pivitvaa ca paccuttaritvaa tattheva rukkhacchaayaaya nisiideyya vaa nipajjeyya vaa.

[03] evameva.m kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro labhati ca kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, yaapissa ^a^T3.0212^ea^ parisuddhakaayasamaacaarataa saapissa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa; yaapissa parisuddhavaciisamaacaarataa saapissa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabbaa; yampi labhati kaalena kaala.m cetaso vivara.m cetaso pasaada.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye manasi kaatabba.m. eva.m tasmi.m puggale aaghaato pa.tivinetabbo. samantapaasaadika.m, aavuso, puggala.m aagamma citta.m pasiidati.
[03] ``ime kho, aavuso, pa~nca aaghaatapa.tivinayaa, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno aaghaato sabbaso pa.tivinetabbo''ti. dutiya.m.
[03] 163^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] {a0 ni0 5.65-66} ``pa~ncahaavuso ^a^P3.0191^ea^, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m saakaccho sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idhaavuso, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti, siilasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m ^a^V2.0178^ea^ byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti, samaadhisampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti. imehi kho, aavuso, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m saakaccho sabrahmacaariina''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.65} tatra ^a^M2.0168^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... ``pa~ncahi, aavuso, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? idhaavuso, bhikkhu attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti ^a^T3.0213^ea^, siilasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti, samaadhisampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, pa~n~naasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaakathaaya ca aagata.m pa~nha.m byaakattaa hoti. imehi kho, aavuso, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.msaajiivo sabrahmacaariina''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... ``yo hi koci, aavuso, para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, sabbo so pa~ncahi .thaanehi, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena. katamehi pa~ncahi? mandattaa momuuhattaa {momuhattaa (sii0)} para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, paapiccho icchaapakato para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, paribhava.m para.m ^a^P3.0192^ea^ pa~nha.m pucchati, a~n~naatukaamo para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, atha vaa paneva.mcitto {atha vaa pakuppanto (sii0 pii0)} para.m pa~nha.m pucchati -- `sace me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati icceta.m kusala.m, no ce {no ca (syaa0)} me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati ahamassa sammadeva byaakarissaamii'ti. yo hi koci, aavuso, para.m pa~nha.m pucchati, sabbo so imehi pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0179^ea^ .thaanehi, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena. aha.m kho panaavuso, eva.mcitto para.m pa~nha.m pucchaami -- `sace me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati ^a^T3.0214^ea^ icceta.m kusala.m, no ce me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati, ahamassa sammadeva byaakarissaamii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m ^a^M2.0169^ea^ samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi {samaapajjeyyapi vu.t.thaheyyapi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- attheta.m .thaana.m. no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m {kaba.li.mkaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa udaayii aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso saariputta, anavakaaso ya.m so bhikkhu atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- nattheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmaa ^a^P3.0193^ea^ saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana.m. no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] tatiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso saariputta ^a^T3.0215^ea^, anavakaaso ya.m so bhikkhu atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- nattheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0180^ea^ kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``yaavatatiyakampi {yaavatatiyampi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kho me aayasmaa udaayii pa.tikkosati, na ca me koci bhikkhu anumodati. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana.m. no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m ^a^M2.0170^ea^ aaraadheyya, atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa udaayii aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso saariputta, anavakaaso ya.m so bhikkhu atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- nattheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m ^a^P3.0194^ea^ samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana.m ^a^T3.0216^ea^. no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya, atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] tatiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso saariputta, anavakaaso ya.m so bhikkhu atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- nattheta.m .thaana''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavatopi kho me sammukhaa aayasmaa udaayii yaavatatiyaka.m pa.tikkosati, na ca me koci bhikkhu anumodati. ya.mnuunaaha.m tu.nhii assa''nti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0181^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aamantesi -- ``ka.m pana tva.m, udaayi, manomaya.m kaaya.m paccesii''ti? ``ye te, bhante, devaa aruupino sa~n~naamayaa''ti. ``ki.m nu kho tuyha.m, udaayi, baalassa abyattassa bha.nitena! tvampi naama bha.nitabba.m ma~n~nasii''ti! atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``atthi naama, aananda, thera.m bhikkhu.m vihesiyamaana.m ajjhupekkhissatha ^a^M2.0171^ea^. na hi naama, aananda, kaaru~n~nampi bhavissati theramhi {byattamhi (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} bhikkhumhi vihesiyamaanamhii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilasampanno samaadhisampanno pa~n~naasampanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana.m. no ce di.t.theva dhamme a~n~na.m aaraadheyya ^a^T3.0217^ea^, atikkammeva kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m a~n~natara.m manomaya.m kaaya.m upapanno sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjeyyaapi vu.t.thaheyyaapi -- attheta.m .thaana''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] atha ^a^P3.0195^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenaayasmaa upavaa.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m etadavoca -- ``idhaavuso upavaa.na, a~n~ne there bhikkhuu vihesenti. maya.m tena na muccaama. anacchariya.m kho, paneta.m aavuso upavaa.na, ya.m bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito etadeva aarabbha udaahareyya yathaa aayasmanta.myevettha upavaa.na.m pa.tibhaaseyya. idaaneva amhaaka.m saarajja.m okkanta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena upa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m etadavoca --

[03] ``katiihi nu kho, upavaa.na, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti? ``pa~ncahi, bhante, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bhante, thero bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya ^a^T3.0218^ea^ anelagalaaya {anelaga.laaya (syaa0 ka.m0)} atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m ^a^V2.0182^ea^ khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhante, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu ^a^M2.0172^ea^ sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^P3.0196^ea^ saadhu, upavaa.na! imehi kho, upavaa.na, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca. ime ce, upavaa.na, pa~nca dhammaa therassa bhikkhuno na sa.mvijjeyyu.m, ta.m sabrahmacaarii na sakkareyyu.m na garu.m kareyyu.m na maaneyyu.m na puujeyyu.m kha.n.diccena paaliccena valittacataaya. yasmaa ca kho, upavaa.na, ime pa~nca dhammaa therassa bhikkhuno sa.mvijjanti, tasmaa ta.m sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujentii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 167^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``codakena, aavuso, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''.

[03] ``katame pa~nca? kaalena vakkhaami, no akaalena; bhuutena vakkhaami, no abhuutena; sa.nhena vakkhaami, no pharusena; atthasa.mhitena vakkhaami, no anatthasa.mhitena; mettacitto {mettacittena (sii0 pii0 ka0) cuu.lava0 400 passitabba.m} vakkhaami, no dosantaro {dosantarena (sii0 pii0 ka0)}. codakena, aavuso, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo.

[03] ``idhaaha.m ^a^T3.0219^ea^, aavuso, ekacca.m puggala.m passaami akaalena codiyamaana.m no kaalena kupita.m, abhuutena codiyamaana.m no bhuutena kupita.m, pharusena codiyamaana.m no sa.nhena kupita.m, anatthasa.mhitena codiyamaana.m no atthasa.mhitena kupita.m, dosantarena codiyamaana.m no mettacittena kupita.m.

[03] ``adhammacuditassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo {upadahitabbo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} -- `akaalenaayasmaa cudito no kaalena ^a^P3.0197^ea^, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; abhuutenaayasmaa cudito no bhuutena ^a^V2.0183^ea^, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; pharusenaayasmaa cudito no sa.nhena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya ^a^M2.0173^ea^; anatthasa.mhitenaayasmaa cudito no atthasa.mhitena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; dosantarenaayasmaa cudito no mettacittena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraayaa'ti. adhammacuditassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo.

[03] ``adhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- `akaalena te, aavuso, codito {cudito (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} no kaalena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; abhuutena te, aavuso, codito no bhuutena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; pharusena te, aavuso, codito no sa.nhena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; anatthasa.mhitena te, aavuso, codito no atthasa.mhitena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; dosantarena te, aavuso, codito no mettacittena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraayaa'ti. adhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa na a~n~nopi bhikkhu ^a^T3.0220^ea^ abhuutena codetabba.m ma~n~neyyaati.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, aavuso, ekacca.m puggala.m passaami kaalena codiyamaana.m no akaalena kupita.m, bhuutena codiyamaana.m no abhuutena kupita.m, sa.nhena codiyamaana.m no pharusena kupita.m, atthasa.mhitena codiyamaana.m no anatthasa.mhitena kupita.m, mettacittena codiyamaana.m no dosantarena kupita.m.

[03] ``dhammacuditassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- `kaalenaayasmaa cudito no akaalena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; bhuutenaayasmaa cudito no abhuutena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; sa.nhenaayasmaa cudito no pharusena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; atthasa.mhitenaayasmaa cudito no anatthasa.mhitena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraaya; mettacittenaayasmaa cudito no dosantarena, ala.m te vippa.tisaaraayaa'ti. dhammacuditassa ^a^P3.0198^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi vippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo.

[03] ``dhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo -- `kaalena te, aavuso, codito no akaalena, ala.m ^a^M2.0174^ea^ te avippa.tisaaraaya; bhuutena te, aavuso, codito no abhuutena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; sa.nhena te, aavuso, codito no ^a^V2.0184^ea^ pharusena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; atthasa.mhitena te, aavuso, codito no anatthasa.mhitena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraaya; mettacittena te, aavuso, codito no dosantarena, ala.m te avippa.tisaaraayaa'ti. dhammacodakassa, aavuso, bhikkhuno imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi avippa.tisaaro upadahaatabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa a~n~nopi ^a^T3.0221^ea^ bhikkhu bhuutena coditabba.m ma~n~neyyaati.

[03] ``cuditena, aavuso, puggalena dviisu dhammesu pati.t.thaatabba.m -- sacce ca, akuppe ca. ma.m cepi {pa~ncahi (syaa0 ka0)}, aavuso, pare codeyyu.m kaalena vaa akaalena vaa bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa sa.nhena vaa pharusena vaa atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa mettacittaa {mettacittena (sii0 pii0 ka0) ma0 ni0 1.227 passitabba.m} vaa dosantaraa {dosantarena (sii0 pii0 ka0)} vaa, ahampi dviisuyeva dhammesu pati.t.thaheyya.m -- sacce ca, akuppe ca. sace jaaneyya.m -- `attheso mayi dhammo'ti, `atthii'ti na.m vadeyya.m -- `sa.mvijjateso mayi dhammo'ti. sace jaaneyya.m -- `nattheso mayi dhammo'ti, `natthii'ti na.m vadeyya.m -- `neso dhammo mayi sa.mvijjatii'ti.
[03] ``evampi kho te {evampi kho (ka0)}, saariputta, vuccamaanaa atha ca panidhekacce moghapurisaa na padakkhi.na.m ga.nhantii''ti.

[03] ``ye te, bhante, puggalaa assaddhaa jiivikatthaa na saddhaa ^a^P3.0199^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa sa.thaa maayaavino ketabino {ke.tubhino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa indriyesu aguttadvaaraa bhojane amatta~n~nuno jaagariya.m ananuyuttaa saama~n~ne anapekkhavanto sikkhaaya na tibbagaaravaa baahulikaa saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa, te mayaa eva.m vuccamaanaa na padakkhi.na.m ga.nhanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, bhante, kulaputtaa ^a^T3.0222^ea^ saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhojane matta~n~nuno jaagariya.m ^a^M2.0175^ea^ anuyuttaa saama~n~ne apekkhavanto sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa na baahulikaa na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa aaraddhaviiriyaa ^a^V2.0185^ea^ pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatino sampajaanaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te mayaa eva.m vuccamaanaa padakkhi.na.m ga.nhantiiti.

[03] ``ye te, saariputta, puggalaa assaddhaa jiivikatthaa na saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa sa.thaa maayaavino ketabino uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa indriyesu aguttadvaaraa bhojane amatta~n~nuno jaagariya.m ananuyuttaa saama~n~ne anapekkhavanto sikkhaaya na tibbagaaravaa baahulikaa saathalikaa okkamane pubba"ngamaa paviveke nikkhittadhuraa kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa, ti.t.thantu te.

[03] ``ye pana, te saariputta, kulaputtaa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhojane matta~n~nuno jaagariya.m anuyuttaa saama~n~ne apekkhavanto sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa na baahulikaa na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa aaraddhaviiriyaa pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatino sampajaanaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te tva.m, saariputta, vadeyyaasi ^a^P3.0200^ea^. ovada, saariputta ^a^T3.0223^ea^, sabrahmacaarii; anusaasa, saariputta, sabrahmacaarii -- `asaddhammaa vu.t.thaapetvaa saddhamme pati.t.thaapessaami sabrahmacaarii'ti. eva~nhi te, saariputta, sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``dussiilassa, aavuso, siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi ^a^M2.0176^ea^ ...pe0... pheggupi... saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi ^a^V2.0186^ea^ asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``siilavato, aavuso, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m ^a^T3.0224^ea^ hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho, saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi...pe0... pheggupi... saaropi ^a^P3.0201^ea^ paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, siilavato siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti {a0 ni0 5.168; 6.50; 7.65}. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti, kusalesu dhammesu suggahitaggaahii ca, bahu~nca ga.nhaati, gahita~ncassa nappamussatii''ti? ``aayasmaa kho aanando bahussuto. pa.tibhaatu aayasmanta.myeva aananda''nti. ``tenahaavuso saariputta, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi ^a^M2.0177^ea^ karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi. aayasmaa aanando etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu atthakusalo ca hoti, dhammakusalo ca, bya~njanakusalo ca ^a^V2.0187^ea^, niruttikusalo ca, pubbaaparakusalo ca. ettaavataa kho ^a^T3.0225^ea^, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu, suggahitaggaahii ca, bahu~nca ga.nhaati, gahita~ncassa nappamussatii''ti. ``acchariya.m, aavuso! abbhuta.m, aavuso!! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m aayasmataa aanandena. imehi ca maya.m pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagata.m aayasmanta.m aananda.m dhaarema -- `aayasmaa aanando atthakusalo dhammakusalo bya~njanakusalo niruttikusalo pubbaaparakusalo'''ti. navama.m.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P3.0202^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddaji yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m bhaddaji.m aayasmaa aanando etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso bhaddaji, dassanaana.m agga.m, ki.m savanaana.m agga.m, ki.m sukhaana.m agga.m, ki.m sa~n~naana.m agga.m, ki.m bhavaana.m agga''nti?

[03] ``atthaavuso, brahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii, yo ta.m brahmaana.m passati, ida.m dassanaana.m agga.m. atthaavuso, aabhassaraa naama devaa sukhena abhisannaa parisannaa. te kadaaci karahaci udaana.m udaanenti -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'nti! yo ta.m sadda.m su.naati, ida.m savanaana.m agga.m. atthaavuso, subhaki.nhaa naama devaa. te santa.myeva tusitaa sukha.m pa.tivedenti, ida.m sukhaana.m agga.m. atthaavuso, aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaa devaa, ida.m sa~n~naana.m ^a^T3.0226^ea^ agga.m. atthaavuso, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaa devaa, ida.m bhavaana.m agga''nti. ``sameti kho ida.m aayasmato bhaddajissa, yadida.m bahunaa janenaa''ti?

[03] ``aayasmaa ^a^M2.0178^ea^ kho, aanando, bahussuto. pa.tibhaatu aayasmanta.myeva aananda''nti. ``tenahaavuso bhaddaji, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa bhaddaji aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi. aayasmaa aanando etadavoca --

[03] ``yathaa ^a^V2.0188^ea^ passato kho, aavuso, anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ida.m dassanaana.m agga.m. yathaa su.nato anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ida.m savanaana.m agga.m. yathaa sukhitassa anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ida.m sukhaana.m agga.m. yathaa sa~n~nissa anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ida.m sa~n~naana.m agga.m. yathaa bhuutassa anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ida.m bhavaana.m agga''nti. dasama.m.
[06] aaghaatavaggo ^a^P3.0203^ea^ dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve aaghaatavinayaa, saakacchaa saajiivato pa~nha.m.
[22] pucchaa nirodho codanaa, siila.m nisanti bhaddajiiti..

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0189^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti ^a^T3.0227^ea^. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako saarajja.m okkanto hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako saarajja.m okkanto hoti.

[03] ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0179^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako visaarado hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako visaarado hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako avisaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasati. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatii ^a^P3.0204^ea^ hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako avisaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasati.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako visaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasati. katamehi ^a^V2.0190^ea^ pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako visaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto ^a^T3.0228^ea^ eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0180^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pa~nca, gahapati, bhayaani veraani appahaaya `dussiilo' iti vuccati, niraya~nca upapajjati. katamaani pa~nca? paa.naatipaata.m, adinnaadaana.m, kaamesumicchaacaara.m, musaavaada.m, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m -- imaani ^a^P3.0205^ea^ kho, gahapati, pa~nca bhayaani veraani appahaaya `dussiilo' iti vuccati, niraya~nca upapajjati.

[03] ``pa~nca, gahapati, bhayaani veraani pahaaya `siilavaa' iti vuccati, sugati~nca upapajjati ^a^V2.0191^ea^. katamaani pa~nca? paa.naatipaata.m, adinnaadaana.m, kaamesumicchaacaara.m, musaavaada.m, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m -- imaani kho, gahapati, pa~nca bhayaani veraani pahaaya `siilavaa' iti vuccati, sugati~nca upapajjati.

[03] ``ya.m, gahapati, paa.naatipaatii paa.naatipaatapaccayaa di.t.thadhammikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, samparaayikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, cetasikampi ^a^T3.0229^ea^ dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato neva di.t.thadhammika.m bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, na samparaayika.m bhaya.m vera.m pasavati, na cetasika.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratassa eva.m ta.m bhaya.m vera.m vuupasanta.m hoti.
[03] ``ya.m, gahapati, adinnaadaayii...pe0....

[03] ``ya.m, gahapati, musaavaadii...pe0....

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako upaasakaca.n.daalo ca hoti upaasakamala~nca upaasakapatiku.t.tho ca {upaasakapatiki.t.tho ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. katamehi pa~ncahi? assaddho hoti; dussiilo hoti; kotuuhalama"ngaliko hoti, ma"ngala.m pacceti no kamma.m; ito ca bahiddhaa dakkhi.neyya.m gavesati; tattha ca pubbakaara.m karoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako upaasakaca.n.daalo ca hoti upaasakamala~nca upaasakapatiku.t.tho ca.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato upaasako upaasakaratana~nca hoti upaasakapaduma~nca upaasakapu.n.dariika~nca {upaasakapu.n.dariiko ca (pii0 ka0)}. katamehi pa~ncahi? saddho hoti; siilavaa hoti; akotuuhalama"ngaliko hoti, kamma.m pacceti no ma"ngala.m; na ito bahiddhaa dakkhi.neyya.m gavesati; idha ca pubbakaara.m karoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato upaasako upaasakaratana~nca hoti upaasakapaduma~nca upaasakapu.n.dariika~ncaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0182^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati pa~ncamattehi upaasakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``tumhe kho, gahapati, bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena ^a^V2.0193^ea^. na kho, gahapati, taavatakeneva tu.t.thi kara.niiyaa -- `maya.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarenaa'ti ^a^T3.0231^ea^. tasmaatiha, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kinti ^a^P3.0207^ea^ maya.m kaalena kaala.m paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja vihareyyaamaa'ti! eva~nhi vo, gahapati, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- `tumhe kho, gahapati, bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. na kho, gahapati, taavatakeneva tu.t.thi kara.niiyaa -- maya.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarenaati. tasmaatiha, gahapati, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- kinti maya.m kaalena kaala.m paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja vihareyyaamaati! eva~nhi vo, gahapati, sikkhitabba'nti. yasmi.m, bhante, samaye ariyasaavako paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharati, pa~ncassa .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na honti. yampissa kaamuupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa kaamuupasa.mhita.m sukha.m somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m sukha.m somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa kusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yasmi.m, bhante, samaye ariyasaavako paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharati, imaanissa pa~nca {imaani pa~ncassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na hontii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^M2.0183^ea^ saadhu, saariputta! yasmi.m, saariputta, samaye ariyasaavako ^a^P3.0208^ea^ paviveka.m ^a^T3.0232^ea^ piiti.m upasampajja viharati, pa~ncassa .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na honti. yampissa kaamuupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa kaamuupasa.mhita.m sukha.m somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa akusaluupasa.mhita.m sukha.m somanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yampissa kusaluupasa.mhita.m dukkha.m domanassa.m, tampissa tasmi.m samaye na hoti. yasmi.m, saariputta, samaye ariyasaavako paviveka.m piiti.m upasampajja viharati, imaanissa {imaanettha (sii0)} pa~nca .thaanaani tasmi.m samaye na hontii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^V2.0194^ea^, bhikkhave, va.nijjaa upaasakena akara.niiyaa. katamaa pa~nca? satthava.nijjaa, sattava.nijjaa, ma.msava.nijjaa, majjava.nijjaa, visava.nijjaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca va.nijjaa upaasakena akara.niiyaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `aya.m puriso paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratoti {pa.tivirato hotiiti (sii0), pa.tivirato hoti (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa paa.naatipaataa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `aya.m puriso paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa paa.naatipaataa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca, khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m ^a^T3.0233^ea^ ^a^P3.0209^ea^ pavedenti {tatheva paapaka.m kamma.m pavedayanti (sii0), tadeva paapakamma.m pavedeti (syaa0 ka.m0)} -- `aya.m puriso itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa jiivitaa voropesiiti {voropetiiti (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa paa.naatipaatahetu hananti vaa bandhanti ^a^M2.0184^ea^ vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati {suuyissati (sii0 pii0)} caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `aya.m puriso adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa adinnaadaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti? ``no heta.m bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `aya.m puriso adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa adinnaadaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso gaamaa vaa ara~n~naa vaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyiiti {aadiyati (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa adinnaadaanahetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m ^a^V2.0195^ea^ vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `aya.m puriso kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti? ``no heta.m ^a^T3.0234^ea^, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `aya.m puriso kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso paritthiisu parakumaariisu caaritta.m aapajjiiti {aapajjati (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa kaamesumicchaacaarahetu hananti ^a^P3.0210^ea^ vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `aya.m puriso musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa ^a^M2.0185^ea^ musaavaadaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `aya.m puriso musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa musaavaadaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa musaavaadena attha.m pabha~njiiti {bha~njatiiti (sii0), bha~njati (syaa0 ka.m0), bha~njiiti (pii0)}. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa musaavaadahetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti ^a^T3.0235^ea^.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m ^a^V2.0196^ea^ vaa karontii'ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa ^a^P3.0211^ea^ pa.tiviratoti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa verama.nihetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karontii'ti. api ca khvassa tatheva paapakamma.m pavedenti -- `aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa jiivitaa voropesi {voropeti (syaa0)}; aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto gaamaa vaa ara~n~naa vaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi {aadiyati (sii0 syaa0)}; aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto paritthiisu parakumaariisu caaritta.m aapajji {aapajjati (sii0 syaa0)}; aya.m puriso suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m anuyutto gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa musaavaadena attha.m pabha~njiiti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanahetu hananti vaa bandhanti vaa pabbaajenti vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karonti. api nu tumhehi evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa'''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T3.0236^ea^ ^a^M2.0186^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati pa~ncamattehi upaasakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m ka~nci {ya.m ki~nci (sii0 pii0)}, saariputta, jaaneyyaatha gihi.m odaatavasana.m pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanta.m catunna.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhi.m akicchalaabhi.m akasiralaabhi.m, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''ti.

[03] ``katamesu pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanto hoti? idha ^a^P3.0212^ea^, saariputta, ariyasaavako paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. imesu pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanto hoti.

[03] ``katamesa.m ^a^V2.0197^ea^ catunna.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii? idha, saariputta, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi, satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. ayamassa pa.thamo aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro adhigato hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa apariyodaatassa cittassa pariyodapanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, ariyasaavako dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti ^a^T3.0237^ea^ -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. ayamassa dutiyo aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro adhigato hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa apariyodaatassa cittassa pariyodapanaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0187^ea^ capara.m, saariputta, ariyasaavako sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. ayamassa tatiyo aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro adhigato hoti ^a^P3.0213^ea^ avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa apariyodaatassa cittassa pariyodapanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, saariputta, ariyasaavako ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammaasehi bhujissehi vi~n~nuppasatthehi aparaama.t.thehi samaadhisa.mvattanikehi. ayamassa catuttho aabhicetasiko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaro adhigato hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyaa apariyodaatassa cittassa pariyodapanaaya. imesa.m catunna.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] ``ya.m ka~nci, saariputta, jaaneyyaatha gihi.m odaatavasana.m -- imesu pa~ncasu sikkhaapadesu sa.mvutakammanta.m, imesa~nca catunna.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhi.m ^a^T3.0238^ea^ akicchalaabhi.m akasiralaabhi.m, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi ^a^V2.0198^ea^ khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato, sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'''ti.
[21] ``nirayesu bhaya.m disvaa, paapaani parivajjaye.
[22] ariyadhamma.m samaadaaya, pa.n.dito parivajjaye..
[21] ``na hi.mse paa.nabhuutaani, vijjamaane parakkame.
[22] musaa ca na bha.ne jaana.m, adinna.m na paraamase..
[21] ``sehi daarehi santu.t.tho, paradaara~nca aarame {naarame (sii0 syaa0)}.
[22] meraya.m vaaru.ni.m jantu, na pive cittamohani.m..
[21] ``anussareyya ^a^M2.0188^ea^ sambuddha.m, dhamma~ncaanuvitakkaye.
[22] abyaapajja.m {abyaapajjha.m (?) abyaapajjha.m (ka0)} hita.m citta.m, devalokaaya bhaavaye..
[21] ``upa.t.thite deyyadhamme, pu~n~natthassa jigiisato {jigi.msato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
[22] santesu pa.thama.m dinnaa, vipulaa hoti dakkhi.naa..
[21] ``santo have pavakkhaami, saariputta su.nohi me.
[22] iti ^a^P3.0214^ea^ ka.nhaasu setaasu, rohi.niisu hariisu vaa..
[21] ``kammaasaasu saruupaasu, gosu paarevataasu vaa.
[22] yaasu kaasuci etaasu, danto jaayati pu"ngavo..
[21] ``dhorayho balasampanno, kalyaa.najavanikkamo.
[22] tameva ^a^T3.0239^ea^ bhaare yu~njanti, naassa va.n.na.m parikkhare..
[21] ``evameva.m ^a^V2.0199^ea^ manussesu, yasmi.m kismi~nci jaatiye.
[22] khattiye braahma.ne vesse, sudde ca.n.daalapukkuse..
[21] ``yaasu kaasuci etaasu, danto jaayati subbato.
[22] dhamma.t.tho siilasampanno, saccavaadii hiriimano..
[21] ``pahiinajaatimara.no, brahmacariyassa kevalii.
[22] pannabhaaro visa.myutto, katakicco anaasavo..
[21] ``paaraguu sabbadhammaana.m, anupaadaaya nibbuto.
[22] tasmi~nca viraje khette, vipulaa hoti dakkhi.naa..
[21] ``baalaa ca avijaanantaa, dummedhaa assutaavino.
[22] bahiddhaa dadanti daanaani, na hi sante upaasare..
[21] ``ye ca sante upaasanti, sappa~n~ne dhiirasammate.
[22] saddhaa ca nesa.m sugate, muulajaataa pati.t.thitaa..
[21] ``devaloka~nca te yanti, kule vaa idha jaayare.
[22] anupubbena nibbaana.m, adhigacchanti pa.n.ditaa''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0189^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. addasaa kho bhagavaa addhaanamaggappa.tipanno a~n~natarasmi.m padese mahanta.m saalavana.m; disvaana {disvaa (sii0 pii0)} maggaa okkamma {ukkamma (katthaci)} yena ta.m saalavana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m saalavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m padese sita.m paatvaakaasi.

[03] atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``ko ^a^T3.0240^ea^ nu kho hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa paatukammaaya? na akaara.nena tathaagataa sita.m paatukarontii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa ^a^V2.0200^ea^ aanando bhagavanta.m ^a^P3.0215^ea^ etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa paatukammaaya? na akaara.nena tathaagataa sita.m paatukarontii''ti.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, aananda, imasmi.m padese nagara.m ahosi iddha~nceva phiita~nca bahujana.m aaki.n.namanussa.m. ta.m kho panaananda, nagara.m kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho upanissaaya vihaasi. kassapassa kho panaananda, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa gavesii naama upaasako ahosi siilesu aparipuurakaarii. gavesinaa kho, aananda, upaasakena pa~ncamattaani upaasakasataani pa.tidesitaani samaadapitaani {samaadaapitaani (?)} ahesu.m siilesu aparipuurakaarino. atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa etadahosi -- `aha.m kho imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m bahuupakaaro {bahukaaro (katthaci)} pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa {samaadaapetaa (?)}, aha~ncamhi siilesu aparipuurakaarii, imaani ca pa~nca upaasakasataani siilesu aparipuurakaarino. icceta.m samasama.m, natthi ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena taani pa~nca upaasakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa taani pa~nca upaasakasataani etadavoca -- `ajjatagge ma.m aayasmanto siilesu paripuurakaari.m dhaarethaa'ti! atha kho, aananda, tesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m etadahosi -- `ayyo kho gavesii amhaaka.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa ^a^T3.0241^ea^. ayyo hi naama gavesii ^a^M2.0190^ea^ siilesu paripuurakaarii bhavissati. kima"nga.m {kima"nga (sii0 pii0)} pana maya'nti {pana na mayanti (sii0) a0 ni0 4.159; cuu.lava0 330; sa.m0 ni0 5.1020 paa.liyaa sa.msandetabba.m}! atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani yena gavesii upaasako tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa gavesi.m upaasaka.m etadavocu.m -- `ajjatagge ayyo gavesii imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani siilesu paripuurakaarino dhaaretuu'ti. atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa etadahosi -- `aha.m kho imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa, aha~ncamhi siilesu paripuurakaarii, imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani siilesu paripuurakaarino ^a^P3.0216^ea^. icceta.m samasama.m, natthi ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti!

[03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena taani pa~nca upaasakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa taani pa~nca upaasakasataani etadavoca -- `ajjatagge ma.m aayasmanto brahmacaari.m dhaaretha aaraacaari {anaacaari.m (pii0)} virata.m methunaa gaamadhammaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, tesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m ^a^V2.0201^ea^ etadahosi -- `ayyo kho gavesii amhaaka.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa. ayyo hi naama gavesii brahmacaarii bhavissati aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. kima"nga.m pana maya'nti! atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani yena gavesii upaasako tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa gavesi.m upaasaka.m etadavocu.m -- `ajjatagge ayyo gavesii imaanipi pa~nca ^a^T2.0242^ea^ upaasakasataani brahmacaarino dhaaretu aaraacaarino virataa methunaa gaamadhammaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa etadahosi -- `aha.m kho imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa. aha~ncamhi siilesu paripuurakaarii. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani siilesu paripuurakaarino. aha~ncamhi brahmacaarii aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani brahmacaarino aaraacaarino virataa methunaa gaamadhammaa. icceta.m samasama.m, natthi ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena taani pa~nca upaasakasataani tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa taani pa~nca upaasakasataani etadavoca -- `ajjatagge ma.m aayasmanto ekabhattika.m dhaaretha rattuuparata.m virata.m ^a^M2.0191^ea^ vikaalabhojanaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, tesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m etadahosi -- `ayyo kho gavesii bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa. ayyo hi naama gavesii ekabhattiko bhavissati rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. kima"nga.m pana maya'nti! atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani yena gavesii upaasako tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa gavesi.m upaasaka.m etadavocu.m ^a^P3.0217^ea^ -- `ajjatagge ayyo gavesii imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani ekabhattike dhaaretu rattuuparate virate vikaalabhojanaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, gavesissa upaasakassa etadahosi -- `aha.m kho imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ^a^T3.0243^ea^ upaasakasataana.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa. aha~ncamhi siilesu paripuurakaarii. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani siilesu paripuurakaarino. aha~ncamhi brahmacaarii aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani brahmacaarino aaraacaarino virataa methunaa gaamadhammaa. aha~ncamhi ekabhattiko rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. imaanipi pa~nca upaasakasataani ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa vikaalabhojanaa. icceta.m samasama.m, natthi ki~nci atireka.m; handaaha.m atirekaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako yena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami ^a^V2.0202^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m labheyya.m upasampada'nti. alattha kho, aananda, gavesii upaasako kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaananda, gavesii bhikkhu eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaananda, gavesii bhikkhu arahata.m ahosi.

[03] ``atha ^a^T3.0244^ea^ kho, aananda, tesa pa~ncanna.m upaasakasataana.m etadahosi -- `ayyo kho gavesii amhaaka.m bahuupakaaro pubba"ngamo samaadapetaa. ayyo hi naama gavesii kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa ^a^M2.0192^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati. kima"nga.m pana maya'nti! atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani yena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^P3.0218^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavocu.m -- `labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada'nti. alabhi.msu kho, aananda, taani pa~nca upaasakasataani kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike pabbajja.m, alabhi.msu upasampada.m.

[03] ``atha kho, aananda, gavesissa bhikkhuno etadahosi -- `aha.m kho imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikaamalaabhii homi akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. aho vatimaanipi pa~nca bhikkhusataani imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikaamalaabhino assu akicchalaabhino akasiralaabhino'ti. atha kho, aananda, taani pa~nca bhikkhusataani vuupaka.t.thaa {bhikkhusataani ekekaa vuupaka.t.thaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharantaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihari.msu. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~ni.msu''.

[03] ``iti kho ^a^T3.0245^ea^, aananda, taani pa~nca bhikkhusataani gavesiipamukhaani uttaruttari {uttaruttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.niitapa.niita.m ^a^V2.0203^ea^ vaayamamaanaa anuttara.m vimutti.m sacchaaka.msu. tasmaatiha, aananda, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `uttaruttari pa.niitapa.niita.m vaayamamaanaa anuttara.m vimutti.m sacchikarissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, aananda, sikkhitabba''nti. dasama.m.

[21] saarajja.m ^a^P3.0219^ea^ visaarado niraya.m, vera.m ca.n.daalapa~ncama.m.
[22] piiti va.nijjaa raajaano, gihii ceva gavesinaati..

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0204^ea^ ^a^M2.0193^ea^, bhikkhave, aara~n~nikaa {aara~n~nataa (sabbattha) pari0 443 passitabba.m}. katame pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa aara~n~niko hoti, paapiccho icchaapakato aara~n~niko hoti, ummaadaa cittakkhepaa aara~n~niko hoti, va.n.nita.m buddhehi buddhasaavakehiiti aara~n~niko hoti, appicchata.myeva nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva {idama.t.thita.myeva (sii0 pii0)} nissaaya aara~n~niko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aara~n~nikaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m yvaaya.m aara~n~niko appicchata.myeva nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya aara~n~niko hoti, aya.m ^a^T3.0246^ea^ imesa.m pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho {paamokkho (a0 ni0 4.95; 10.91)} ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do, sappima.n.do {sappimhaa sappima.n.do (ka0) sa.m0 ni0 3.662} tattha aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m yvaaya.m aara~n~niko appicchata.myeva nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya aara~n~niko hoti, aya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m aara~n~nikaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro caa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0205^ea^, bhikkhave, pa.msukuulikaa. katame pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa pa.msukuuliko hoti...pe0... idamatthita.myeva nissaaya pa.msukuuliko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca pa.msukuulikaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, rukkhamuulikaa. katame pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa rukkhamuuliko hoti...pe0... idamatthita.myeva nissaaya rukkhamuuliko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca rukkhamuulikaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, pattapi.n.dikaa. katame pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa pattapi.n.diko hoti, paapiccho icchaapakato pattapi.n.diko hoti, ummaadaa cittakkhepaa pattapi.n.diko hoti, `va.n.nita.m buddhehi buddhasaavakehii'ti pattapi.n.diko hoti, appicchata.myeva nissaaya ^a^T3.0247^ea^ santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya pattapi.n.diko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca pattapi.n.dikaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanna.m pattapi.n.dikaana.m yvaaya.m pattapi.n.diko appicchata.myeva nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva ^a^M2.0195^ea^ nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya pattapi.n.diko hoti, aya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m pattapi.n.dikaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do, sappima.n.do tattha aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m pattapi.n.dikaana.m yvaaya.m pattapi.n.diko appicchata.myeva ^a^P3.0221^ea^ nissaaya santu.t.thi.myeva nissaaya sallekha.myeva nissaaya paviveka.myeva nissaaya idamatthita.myeva nissaaya pattapi.n.diko hoti, aya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m pattapi.n.dikaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro caa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0207^ea^, bhikkhave, poraa.naa braahma.nadhammaa etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no braahma.nesu. katame pa~nca? pubbe suda.m {pubbassuda.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.myeva gacchanti, no abraahma.ni.m. etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.nimpi gacchanti, abraahma.nimpi gacchanti. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa sunakhi.myeva gacchanti, no asunakhi.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu.

[03] ``pubbe suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.m utuni.myeva gacchanti, no anutuni.m. etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa ^a^P3.0222^ea^ braahma.ni.m utunimpi gacchanti, anutunimpi gacchanti ^a^M2.0196^ea^. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa sunakhi.m utuni.myeva gacchanti, no anutuni.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu.

[03] ``pubbe suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.m neva ki.nanti no vikki.nanti, sampiyeneva sa.mvaasa.m sa.mbandhaaya {sa.msaggatthaaya (sii0 pii0)} sa.mpavattenti. etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa braahma.ni.m ki.nantipi vikki.nantipi, sampiyenapi sa.mvaasa.m sa.mbandhaaya sa.mpavattenti. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa sunakhi.m neva ki.nanti no vikki.nanti, sampiyeneva sa.mvaasa.m sa.mbandhaaya sa.mpavattenti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu.

[03] ``pubbe suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa na sannidhi.m karonti dhanassapi ^a^T3.0249^ea^ dha~n~nassapi rajatassapi jaataruupassapi. etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa sannidhi.m karonti dhanassapi dha~n~nassapi rajatassapi jaataruupassapi. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa na sannidhi.m karonti dhanassapi dha~n~nassapi rajatassapi jaataruupassapi. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu.

[03] ``pubbe ^a^V2.0208^ea^ suda.m, bhikkhave, braahma.naa saaya.m saayamaasaaya paato paataraasaaya bhikkha.m pariyesanti. etarahi, bhikkhave, braahma.naa yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa avasesa.m aadaaya pakkamanti. etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhaa saaya.m saayamaasaaya paato paataraasaaya bhikkha.m pariyesanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo poraa.no braahma.nadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no braahma.nesu. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca poraa.naa braahma.nadhammaa etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no braahma.nesuu''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P3.0223^ea^ kho do.no braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho do.no braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``suta.m ^a^M2.0197^ea^ meta.m, bho gotama -- `na sama.no gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimantetii'ti. tayida.m, bho gotama, tatheva. na hi bhava.m gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vu.d.dhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa ^a^T3.0250^ea^ aasanena vaa nimanteti. tayida.m, bho gotama, na sampannamevaa''ti. ``tvampi no, do.na, braahma.no pa.tijaanaasii''ti? ``ya~nhi ta.m, bho gotama, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `braahma.no ubhato sujaato -- maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhito anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, ajjhaayako mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo'ti, mameva ta.m, bho gotama, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. aha~nhi, bho gotama, braahma.no ubhato sujaato -- maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, ajjhaayako mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo''ti.

[03] ``ye kho, te do.na, braahma.naana.m pubbakaa ^a^P3.0224^ea^ isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m ^a^V2.0209^ea^ etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti bhaasitamanubhaasanti sajjhaayitamanusajjhaayanti vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako, vaamako, vaamadevo, vessaamitto, yamadaggi {yamataggi (sii0) dii0 ni0 1.284, 526, 536; ma0 ni0 2.427; mahaava0 300; a0 ni0 5.192 passitabba.m}, a"ngiiraso, bhaaradvaajo, vaase.t.tho, kassapo, bhagu; tyaassu'me pa~nca braahma.ne pa~n~naapenti -- brahmasama.m, devasama.m, mariyaada.m, sambhinnamariyaada.m, braahma.naca.n.daala.myeva pa~ncama.m. tesa.m tva.m do.na, katamo''ti?

[03] ``na kho maya.m, bho gotama, pa~nca braahma.ne jaanaama, atha kho maya.m braahma.naatveva ^a^T3.0251^ea^ jaanaama. saadhu me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa aha.m ime pa~nca braahma.ne jaaneyya''nti. ``tena hi, braahma.na, su.nohi, saadhuka.m ^a^M2.0198^ea^ manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho do.no braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no brahmasamo hoti? idha, do.na, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m {kodhaara.m brahmacariya.m (syaa0 ka0)} carati mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no adhammena.

[03] ``tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva ^a^P3.0225^ea^ kasiyaa na va.nijjaaya na gorakkhena na issatthena {na issattena (ka0)} na raajaporisena na sippa~n~natarena, kevala.m bhikkhaacariyaaya kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano. so aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa {niiyyaadetvaa (sii0), niiyaadetvaa (pii0), niyyaatetvaa (katthaci)} kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m {catutthi.m (sii0)}, iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena {abyaapajjhena (ka0) abyaabajjhena (?)} pharitvaa viharati. karu.naa...pe0... muditaa... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m ^a^T3.0252^ea^, iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so ime cattaaro ^a^V2.0210^ea^ brahmavihaare bhaavetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m brahmaloka.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no brahmasamo hoti.

[03] ``tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva kayena na vikkayena, braahma.ni.myeva udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.ni.myeva gacchati, na khattiyi.m na vessi.m na suddi.m na ca.n.daali.m na nesaadi.m na veni.m {na ve.ni.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} na rathakaari.m na pukkusi.m gacchati, na gabbhini.m gacchati, na paayamaana.m gacchati, na anutuni.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na gabbhini.m gacchati? sace, do.na, braahma.no gabbhini.m gacchati, atimii.lhajo naama so hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa {maa.navakii (ka0)} vaa ^a^T3.0253^ea^. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na gabbhini.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na paayamaana.m gacchati? sace, do.na, braahma.no paayamaana.m gacchati, asucipa.tipii.lito naama so hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa vaa. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na paayamaana.m gacchati. tassa saa hoti braahma.nii neva kaamatthaa na davatthaa na ratatthaa, pajatthaava braahma.nassa braahma.nii hoti. so methuna.m uppaadetvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so ime cattaaro jhaane ^a^V2.0211^ea^ bhaavetvaa kaayassa bhedaa ^a^P3.0227^ea^ para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no devasamo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no mariyaado hoti? idha, do.na, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m carati mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no adhammena ^a^M2.0200^ea^. tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva kasiyaa na va.nijjaaya na gorakkhena na issatthena na raajaporisena na sippa~n~natarena, kevala.m bhikkhaacariyaaya kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano. so aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa daara.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no adhammena.

[03] ``tattha ca, do.na ^a^T3.0254^ea^, ko dhammo? neva kayena na vikkayena, braahma.ni.myeva udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.ni.myeva gacchati, na khattiyi.m na vessi.m na suddi.m na ca.n.daali.m na nesaadi.m na veni.m na rathakaari.m na pukkusi.m gacchati, na gabbhini.m gacchati, na paayamaana.m gacchati, na anutuni.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na gabbhini.m gacchati? sace, do.na, braahma.no gabbhini.m gacchati, atimii.lhajo naama so hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa vaa. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na gabbhini.m gacchati. kasmaa ca, do.na, braahma.no na paayamaana.m gacchati? sace, do.na, braahma.no paayamaana.m gacchati, asucipa.tipii.lito naama so hoti maa.navako vaa maa.navikaa vaa. tasmaa, do.na, braahma.no na paayamaana.m gacchati. tassa saa hoti braahma.nii neva kaamatthaa na davatthaa na ratatthaa, pajatthaava braahma.nassa braahma.nii hoti. so methuna.m uppaadetvaa tameva puttassaada.m nikaamayamaano ku.tumba.m ajjhaavasati, na agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. yaava poraa.naana.m braahma.naana.m mariyaado tattha ti.t.thati, ta.m na viitikkamati. `yaava poraa.naana.m braahma.naana.m mariyaado tattha braahma.no .thito ta.m na viitikkamatii'ti, kho, do.na, tasmaa braahma.no mariyaadoti vuccati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no mariyaado hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no sambhinnamariyaado hoti? idha ^a^P3.0228^ea^, do.na, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto ^a^V2.0212^ea^ anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena ^a^T3.0255^ea^. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m carati mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati dhammeneva, no adhammena.

[03] ``tattha ca, do.na, ko dhammo? neva kasiyaa na va.nijjaaya na gorakkhena na issatthena na raajaporisena na sippa~n~natarena, kevala.m bhikkhaacariyaaya kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano. so aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa daara.m ^a^M2.0201^ea^ pariyesati dhammenapi adhammenapi kayenapi vikkayenapi braahma.nimpi udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.nimpi gacchati khattiyimpi gacchati vessimpi gacchati suddimpi gacchati ca.n.daalimpi gacchati nesaadimpi gacchati venimpi gacchati rathakaarimpi gacchati pukkusimpi gacchati gabbhinimpi gacchati paayamaanampi gacchati utunimpi gacchati anutunimpi gacchati. tassa saa hoti braahma.nii kaamatthaapi davatthaapi ratatthaapi pajatthaapi braahma.nassa braahma.nii hoti. yaava poraa.naana.m braahma.naana.m mariyaado tattha na ti.t.thati, ta.m viitikkamati. `yaava poraa.naana.m braahma.naana.m mariyaado tattha braahma.no na .thito ta.m viitikkamatii'ti kho, do.na, tasmaa braahma.no sambhinnamariyaadoti vuccati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no sambhinnamariyaado hoti.

[01] ``katha~nca, do.na, braahma.no braahma.naca.n.daalo hoti? idha, do.na, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti -- maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko, yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto ^a^T3.0256^ea^ anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. so a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani ^a^P3.0229^ea^ komaarabrahmacariya.m carati mante adhiiyamaano. a.t.thacattaaliisavassaani komaarabrahmacariya.m caritvaa mante adhiiyitvaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesati dhammenapi adhammenapi kasiyaapi va.nijjaayapi gorakkhenapi issatthenapi raajaporisenapi sippa~n~natarenapi, kevalampi bhikkhaacariyaaya, kapaala.m anatima~n~namaano.

[01] ``so aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m niyyaadetvaa daara.m pariyesati dhammenapi adhammenapi kayenapi vikkayenapi braahma.nimpi udakuupassa.t.tha.m. so braahma.nimpi gacchati khattiyimpi gacchati vessimpi gacchati suddimpi gacchati ca.n.daalimpi gacchati nesaadimpi gacchati venimpi gacchati rathakaarimpi gacchati pukkusimpi gacchati gabbhinimpi gacchati paayamaanampi gacchati utunimpi gacchati anutunimpi gacchati. tassa saa hoti braahma.nii kaamatthaapi davatthaapi ratatthaapi pajatthaapi braahma.nassa ^a^V2.0213^ea^ braahma.nii hoti. so sabbakammehi jiivika.m {jiivita.m (ka0)} kappeti. tamena.m braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `kasmaa bhava.m braahma.no pa.tijaanamaano sabbakammehi jiivika.m kappetii'ti? so evamaaha -- `seyyathaapi, bho, aggi sucimpi .dahati asucimpi .dahati, na ca tena aggi upalippati {upalimpati (ka0)}; evameva.m kho, bho, sabbakammehi cepi braahma.no jiivika.m kappeti, na ca tena braahma.no upalippati'. `sabbakammehi jiivika.m kappetii'ti kho, do.na ^a^M2.0202^ea^, tasmaa braahma.no braahma.naca.n.daaloti vuccati. eva.m kho, do.na, braahma.no braahma.naca.n.daalo hoti.

[03] ``ye kho te, do.na, braahma.naana.m pubbakaa ^a^T3.0257^ea^ isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro yesamida.m etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samiihita.m tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti bhaasitamanubhaasanti sajjhaayitamanusajjhaayanti vaacimanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako, vaamako, vaamadevo, vessaamitto, yamadaggi, a"ngiiraso, bhaaradvaajo, vaase.t.tho ^a^P3.0230^ea^, kassapo, bhagu; tyaassume pa~nca braahma.ne pa~n~naapenti -- brahmasama.m, devasama.m, mariyaada.m, sambhinnamariyaada.m, braahma.naca.n.daala.myeva pa~ncama.m. tesa.m tva.m, do.na, katamo''ti?
