[03] 193^b^.^eb^ atha kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena kadaaci diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa? ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena kadaaci diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa''ti?

[03] ``yasmi.m, braahma.na, samaye kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati ^a^V2.0214^ea^, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi tasmi.m ^a^T3.0258^ea^ samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto sa.msa.t.tho laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya vaa. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m ^a^P3.0231^ea^ mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya ^a^M2.0203^ea^ na passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto agginaa santatto ukkudhito {ukka.t.thito (sii0 pii0), ukku.t.thito (syaa0 ka.m0)} ussadakajaato {usumakajaato (katthaci), ussurakajaato (ka0), usmudakajaato (ma0 ni0 3 majjhimanikaaye)}. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya na passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti ^a^T3.0259^ea^, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m ^a^P3.0232^ea^ nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto sevaalapa.nakapariyonaddho. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya na passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa ^a^V2.0215^ea^ nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m ^a^M2.0204^ea^ samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto vaaterito calito bhanto uumijaato {ummijaato (pii0)}. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya na passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m ^a^P3.0233^ea^ sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[01] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena 3.0260, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto aavilo lu.lito kalaliibhuuto andhakaare nikkhitto. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya na passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati na passati, diigharatta.m sajjhaayakataapi mantaa nappa.tibhanti, pageva asajjhaayakataa.

[03] ``yasmi~nca ^a^V2.0216^ea^ ^a^M2.0205^ea^ kho, braahma.na, samaye na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, paratthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto asa.msa.t.tho laakhaaya vaa haliddiyaa vaa niiliyaa vaa ma~nji.t.thaaya ^a^P3.0234^ea^ vaa. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m pajaaneyya passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati...pe0... ^a^T3.0261^ea^.

[01] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati ^a^P3.0236^ea^, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, paratthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi ^a^M2.0206^ea^ mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, udapatto accho vippasanno anaavilo aaloke nikkhitto. tattha cakkhumaa puriso saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano yathaabhuuta.m pajaaneyya passeyya. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, yasmi.m samaye na vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, attatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, paratthampi...pe0... ubhayatthampi tasmi.m samaye yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati passati, diigharatta.m asajjhaayakataapi mantaa pa.tibhanti, pageva sajjhaayakataa.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena kaara.napaalii {kara.napaalii (ka0)} braahma.no licchaviina.m kammanta.m kaareti. addasaa kho kaara.napaalii braahma.no pi"ngiyaani.m braahma.na.m duuratova ^a^P3.0237^ea^ aagacchanta.m; disvaa pi"ngiyaani.m braahma.na.m etadavoca --

[03] ``handa, kuto nu bhava.m pi"ngiyaanii aagacchati divaa divassaa''ti? ``itoha.m {idhaaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0), ito hi kho aha.m (ma0 ni0 1.288)}, bho, aagacchaami sama.nassa gotamassa santikaa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nati bhava.m, pi"ngiyaanii, sama.nassa ^a^V2.0218^ea^ gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m? pa.n.dito ma~n~ne''ti? ``ko caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m jaanissaami! sopi nuunassa taadisova yo sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m jaaneyyaa''ti! ``u.laaraaya khalu bhava.m, pi"ngiyaanii, sama.na.m gotama.m pasa.msaaya pasa.msatii''ti. ``ko caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.na.m ^a^M2.0207^ea^ gotama.m pasa.msissaami! pasatthappasatthova {pasa.t.thapasa.t.tho ca (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} so bhava.m gotamo se.t.tho devamanussaana''nti. ``ki.m pana bhava.m, pi"ngiyaanii, atthavasa.m sampassamaano sama.ne gotame eva.m abhippasanno''ti?

[01] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso aggarasaparititto na a~n~nesa.m hiinaana.m rasaana.m piheti; evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa ^a^T3.0264^ea^ dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato na a~n~nesa.m puthusama.nabraahma.nappavaadaana.m piheti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso jighacchaadubbalyapareto madhupi.n.dika.m adhigaccheyya. so yato yato saayetha, labhateva {saayeyya, labhetheva (ma0 ni0 1.205)} saadurasa.m asecanaka.m; evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato labhateva attamanata.m, labhati cetaso pasaada.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso candanagha.tika.m adhigaccheyya -- haricandanassa vaa lohitacandanassa vaa. so yato yato ghaayetha -- yadi muulato, yadi majjhato, yadi aggato -- adhigacchateva ^a^P3.0238^ea^ {adhigacchetheva (?)} surabhigandha.m asecanaka.m; evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato adhigacchati paamojja.m adhigacchati somanassa.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, puriso aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. tassa kusalo bhisakko .thaanaso aabaadha.m niihareyya; evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa abbhattha.m gacchanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0219^ea^ ^a^M2.0208^ea^, bho, pokkhara.nii acchodakaa saatodakaa siitodakaa setakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya ghammaabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipaasito ^a^T3.0265^ea^. so ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa nhaatvaa ca pivitvaa ca sabbadarathakilamathapari.laaha.m pa.tippassambheyya. evameva.m kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhamma.m su.naati -- yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyaakara.naso, yadi abbhutadhammaso -- tato tato sabbadarathakilamathapari.laahaa pa.tippassambhantii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte kaara.napaalii braahma.no u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.na.m jaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m nihantvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi --

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaani licchavisataani bhagavanta.m payirupaasanti. appekacce licchavii niilaa honti niilava.n.naa niilavatthaa niilaala"nkaaraa, appekacce licchavii piitaa honti piitava.n.naa piitavatthaa piitaala"nkaaraa ^a^T3.0266^ea^, appekacce licchavii lohitakaa honti lohitakava.n.naa lohitakavatthaa lohitakaala"nkaaraa, appekacce licchavii odaataa ^a^M2.0209^ea^ honti odaatava.n.naa odaatavatthaa odaataala"nkaaraa. tyassuda.m bhagavaa atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato pa~nca mahaasupinaa paaturahesu.m. katame pa~nca? tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ^a^M2.0210^ea^ aya.m mahaapathavii mahaasayana.m ahosi, himavaa pabbataraajaa bibbohana.m {bibbohana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), bimba + ohana.m = iti padavibhaago} ahosi, puratthime samudde vaamo hattho ohito ahosi, pacchime samudde dakkhi.no hattho ohito ^a^V2.0221^ea^ ahosi, dakkhi.ne samudde ubho paadaa ohitaa ahesu.m. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m pa.thamo mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato tiriyaa naama ti.najaati naabhiyaa uggantvaa nabha.m aahacca .thitaa ahosi. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave ^a^P3.0241^ea^, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m dutiyo mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setaa kimii ka.nhasiisaa paadehi ussakkitvaa ( ) {(agganakhato) katthaci dissati} yaava jaa.numa.n.dalaa pa.ticchaadesu.m. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato ^a^T3.0268^ea^ sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m tatiyo mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattaaro saku.naa naanaava.n.naa catuuhi disaahi aagantvaa paadamuule nipatitvaa sabbasetaa sampajji.msu. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m catuttho mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samaano mahato mii.lhapabbatassa uparuupari ca"nkamati alippamaano mii.lhena. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m pa~ncamo mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``yampi ^a^M2.0211^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aya.m mahaapathavii mahaasayana.m ahosi, himavaa pabbataraajaa bibbohana.m ahosi, puratthime samudde vaamo hattho ohito ahosi, pacchime samudde dakkhi.no hattho ohito ahosi, dakkhi.ne samudde ubho paadaa ohitaa ahesu.m; tathaagatena ^a^V2.0222^ea^, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena anuttaraa sammaasambodhi abhisambuddhaa. tassaa abhisambodhaaya aya.m pa.thamo mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``yampi ^a^P3.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato tiriyaa naama ^a^T3.0269^ea^ ti.najaati naabhiyaa uggantvaa nabha.m aahacca .thitaa ahosi; tathaagatena, bhikkhave, arahataa sammaasambuddhena ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo abhisambujjhitvaa yaava devamanussehi suppakaasito. tassa abhisambodhaaya aya.m dutiyo mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setaa kimii ka.nhasiisaa paadehi ussakkitvaa yaava jaa.numa.n.dalaa pa.ticchaadesu.m; bahuu, bhikkhave, gihii odaatavasanaa tathaagata.m paa.nupetaa {paa.nupeta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sara.na.m gataa. tassa abhisambodhaaya aya.m tatiyo mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattaaro saku.naa naanaava.n.naa catuuhi disaahi aagantvaa paadamuule nipatitvaa sabbasetaa sampajji.msu; cattaarome, bhikkhave, va.n.naa khattiyaa braahma.naa vessaa suddaa te tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa anuttara.m vimutti.m sacchikaronti. tassa abhisambodhaaya aya.m catuttho mahaasupino paaturahosi.

[03] ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samaano mahato mii.lhapabbatassa uparuupari ca"nkamati ^a^M2.0212^ea^ alippamaano mii.lhena; laabhii, bhikkhave, tathaagato ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, ta.m {tattha ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} tathaagato agathito {agadhito (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} amucchito anajjhosanno {anajjhaapanno (ka0) anajjhopanno (sii0 syaa0)} aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. tassa abhisambodhaaya aya.m pa~ncamo mahaasupino ^a^T3.0270^ea^ paaturahosi.
[03] ``tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ime pa~nca mahaasupinaa paaturahesu''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0223^ea^ ^a^P3.0243^ea^, bhikkhave, vassassa antaraayaa, ya.m nemittaa {nemittakaa (katthaci)} na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati. katame pa~nca? upari, bhikkhave, aakaase tejodhaatu pakuppati. tena uppannaa meghaa pa.tivigacchanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, upari aakaase vaayodhaatu pakuppati. tena uppannaa meghaa pa.tivigacchanti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raahu asurindo paa.ninaa udaka.m sampa.ticchitvaa mahaasamudde cha.d.deti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, vassavalaahakaa devaa pamattaa honti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, manussaa adhammikaa honti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo vassassa antaraayo, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca vassassa antaraayaa, ya.m nemittaa na jaananti, yattha nemittaana.m cakkhu na kamatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0271^ea^ ^a^M2.0213^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagataa vaacaa subhaasitaa hoti, no dubbhaasitaa, anavajjaa ca ananuvajjaa ca vi~n~nuuna.m {ananuvajjaa vi~n~nuuna.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}. katamehi pa~ncahi? kaalena ^a^P3.0244^ea^ ca bhaasitaa hoti, saccaa ca bhaasitaa hoti, sa.nhaa ca bhaasitaa hoti, atthasa.mhitaa ca bhaasitaa hoti, mettacittena ca bhaasitaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagataa ^a^V2.0224^ea^ vaacaa subhaasitaa hoti, no dubbhaasitaa, anavajjaa ca ananuvajjaa ca vi~n~nuuna''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m, bhikkhave, siilavanto pabbajitaa kula.m upasa"nkamanti, tattha manussaa pa~ncahi .thaanehi bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavanti. katamehi pa~ncahi? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m upasa"nkamante manussaa disvaa cittaani pasaadenti {pasiidanti (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, saggasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m hoti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m upasa"nkamante manussaa paccu.t.thenti abhivaadenti aasana.m denti, uccaakuliinasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m hoti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m upasa"nkamante manussaa maccheramala.m pa.tivinenti {pa.tivinodenti (sii0 pii0)}, mahesakkhasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m hoti.

[01] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m upasa"nkamante manussaa yathaasatti yathaabala.m sa.mvibhajanti, mahaabhogasa.mvattanika.m ^a^T3.0272^ea^, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m hoti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye siilavante pabbajite kula.m upasa"nkamante manussaa paripucchanti paripa~nhanti dhamma.m su.nanti, mahaapa~n~naasa.mvattanika.m, bhikkhave, ta.m kula.m tasmi.m samaye pa.tipada.m pa.tipanna.m hoti. ya.m ^a^P3.0245^ea^, bhikkhave, siilavanto pabbajitaa kula.m upasa"nkamanti, tattha manussaa imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaa ^a^M2.0214^ea^, bhikkhave, nissaara.niiyaa {nissara.niiyaa (pii0), nissara.niyaa (dii0 ni0 3.321)} dhaatuyo. katamaa pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ^a^V2.0225^ea^ kaama.m {kaame (syaa0 ka.m0) dii0 ni0 3.321} manasikaroto kaamesu citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. nekkhamma.m kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m {sukata.m (pii0 ka0)} subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m {visa.myutta.m (katthaci, dii0 ni0 3.321)} kaamehi; ye ca kaamapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vediyati. idamakkhaata.m kaamaana.m nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno byaapaada.m manasikaroto byaapaade citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. abyaapaada.m kho panassa manasikaroto abyaapaade citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m byaapaadena; ye ca byaapaadapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vediyati. idamakkhaata.m byaapaadassa nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vihesa.m manasikaroto ^a^T3.0273^ea^ vihesaaya citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. avihesa.m kho panassa manasikaroto avihesaaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m vihesaaya; ye ca vihesaapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vediyati. idamakkhaata.m vihesaaya nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0246^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ruupa.m manasikaroto ruupe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. aruupa.m kho panassa manasikaroto aruupe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m ruupehi; ye ca ruupapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vediyati. idamakkhaata.m ruupaana.m nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0215^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkaaya.m manasikaroto sakkaaye citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. sakkaayanirodha.m kho panassa manasikaroto ^a^V2.0226^ea^ sakkaayanirodhe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m suvisa.myutta.m sakkaayena; ye ca sakkaayapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vediyati. idamakkhaata.m sakkaayassa nissara.na.m.

[03] ``tassa kaamanandiipi naanuseti, byaapaadanandiipi naanuseti, vihesaanandiipi naanuseti ^a^T3.0274^ea^, ruupanandiipi naanuseti, sakkaayanandiipi naanuseti (so) {( ) katthaci natthi} kaamanandiyaapi ananusayaa, byaapaadanandiyaapi ananusayaa, vihesaanandiyaapi ananusayaa, ruupanandiyaapi ananusayaa, sakkaayanandiyaapi ananusayaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niranusayo, acchecchi {acchejji (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ta.nha.m, vivattayi {vaavattayi (sii0)} sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca nissaara.niiyaa dhaatuyo''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T3.0275^ea^ ^a^V2.0227^ea^ ^a^M2.0216^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kimilaaya.m {kimbilaaya.m (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0 6.40; 7.59} viharati ve.luvane. atha kho aayasmaa kimilo {kimbilo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa kimilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti? ``idha, kimila, tathaagate parinibbute bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, dhamme agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sa"nghe agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sikkhaaya agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, a~n~nama~n~na.m agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa. aya.m kho, kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti.

[03] ``ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti? ``idha, kimila, tathaagate parinibbute bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, dhamme sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sa"nghe sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sikkhaaya sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, a~n~nama~n~na.m sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa. aya.m kho, kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo ^a^T3.0276^ea^ cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0248^ea^, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa dhammassavane. katame pa~nca? assuta.m su.naati ^a^V2.0228^ea^, suta.m pariyodaapeti, ka"nkha.m vitarati {vihanati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}, di.t.thi.m uju.m karoti, cittamassa pasiidati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa dhammassavane''ti. dutiya.m.
[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^M2.0217^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro {bhaddo (pii0)} assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? ajjavena, javena, maddavena, khantiyaa, soraccena -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? ajjavena, javena, maddavena, khantiyaa, soraccena -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani pa~nca? saddhaabala.m, hiribala.m, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca balaanii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 9.71; ma0 ni0 1.185; dii0 ni0 3.319} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, cetokhilaa. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0277^ea^, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati ^a^P3.0249^ea^ na sampasiidati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya ^a^V2.0229^ea^ saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, aya.m pa.thamo cetokhilo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme ka"nkhati...pe0... sa"nghe ka"nkhati...pe0... sikkhaaya ka"nkhati...pe0... sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti ^a^M2.0218^ea^ anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, aya.m pa~ncamo cetokhilo. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca cetokhilaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 9.72; dii0 ni0 3.320} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, cetasovinibandhaa {cetovinibaddhaa (saaratthadiipanii.tiikaaya.m)}. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago {avigataraago (ka0)} hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, aya.m pa.thamo cetasovinibandho.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye aviitaraago hoti...pe0... ruupe aviitaraago ^a^T3.0278^ea^ hoti...pe0... yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati...pe0... a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya ^a^P3.0250^ea^ brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, aya.m pa~ncamo cetasovinibandho. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0230^ea^, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa yaaguyaa. katame pa~nca? khudda.m {khuda.m (sii0 pii0) khudhaati sakkataanuloma.m. mahaava0 282} pa.tihanati, pipaasa.m pa.tivineti, vaata.m anulometi, vatthi.m sodheti, aamaavasesa.m ^a^M2.0219^ea^ paaceti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa yaaguyaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa dantaka.t.thassa akhaadane. katame pa~nca? acakkhussa.m, mukha.m duggandha.m hoti, rasahara.niyo na visujjhanti, pitta.m semha.m bhatta.m pariyonandhati {pariyonaddhanti (sii0 pii0), pariyonaddhati (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) cuu.lava0 282 passitabba.m}, bhattamassa nacchaadeti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa dantaka.t.thassa akhaadane.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa dantaka.t.thassa khaadane. katame pa~nca? cakkhussa.m, mukha.m ^a^T3.0279^ea^ na duggandha.m hoti, rasahara.niyo visujjhanti, pitta.m semha.m bhatta.m na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chaadeti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa dantaka.t.thassa khaadane''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 249} ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0251^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m bha.nantassa. katame pa~nca? attanaapi tasmi.m sare saarajjati, parepi tasmi.m sare saarajjanti, gahapatikaapi ujjhaayanti -- `yatheva maya.m gaayaama, evameva.m kho sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa gaayantii'ti, sarakuttimpi nikaamayamaanassa samaadhissa bha"ngo hoti, pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa aayatakena giitassarena dhamma.m bha.nantassaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ {mahaava0 353} ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato ^a^V2.0231^ea^. katame pa~nca? dukkha.m supati, dukkha.m pa.tibujjhati, paapaka.m supina.m passati, devataa na rakkhanti, asuci muccati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa mu.t.thassatissa asampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa sampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato. katame pa~nca? sukha.m supati, sukha.m pa.tibujjhati, na paapaka.m supina.m passati ^a^M2.0220^ea^, devataa rakkhanti, asuci na muccati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa upa.t.thitassatissa sampajaanassa nidda.m okkamayato''ti. dasama.m.
[06] kimilavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kimilo ^a^T3.0280^ea^ dhammassavana.m, aajaaniiyo bala.m khila.m.
[22] vinibandha.m yaagu ka.t.tha.m, giita.m mu.t.thassatinaa caati..

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^V2.0232^ea^ ^a^P3.0252^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhaasako ariyuupavaadii sabrahmacaariina.m, tassa pa~nca aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame pa~nca? paaraajiko vaa hoti chinnaparipantho {chinnaparibandho (ka0)}, a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjati, baa.lha.m vaa rogaata"nka.m phusati, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhaasako ariyuupavaadii sabrahmacaariina.m, tassa ime pa~nca aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bha.n.danakaarako kalahakaarako vivaadakaarako bhassakaarako sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarako, tassa pa~nca aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame pa~nca? anadhigata.m naadhigacchati, adhigataa {adhigata.m (sabbattha)} parihaayati, paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bha.n.danakaarako kalahakaarako vivaadakaarako bhassakaarako sa"nghe adhikara.nakaarako, tassa ime pa~nca aadiinavaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ {mahaava0 209; dii0 ni0 3.316} ``pa~ncime ^a^T3.0281^ea^ ^a^M2.0221^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, dussiilo siilavipanno pamaadaadhikara.na.m mahati.m bhogajaani.m nigacchati. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.
[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0233^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilavipannassa paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0253^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilo siilavipanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m, yadi braahma.naparisa.m, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m -- avisaarado upasa"nkamati ma"nkubhuuto. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilo siilavipanno sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, dussiilo siilavipanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaaya. katame pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno appamaadaadhikara.na.m mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m adhigacchati. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavato siilasampannassa kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m, yadi braahma.naparisa.m ^a^T3.0282^ea^, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto. aya.m bhikkhave, tatiyo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.
[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0222^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0234^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, siilavaa siilasampanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. ime ^a^P3.0254^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaayaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa bahubhaa.nismi.m puggale. katame pa~nca? musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, pharusa.m bha.nati, samphappalaapa.m bha.nati, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa bahubhaa.nismi.m puggale.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa mantabhaa.nismi.m puggale. katame pa~nca? na musaa bha.nati, na pisu.na.m bha.nati, na pharusa.m bha.nati, na samphappalaapa.m bha.nati, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa mantabhaa.nismi.m puggale''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa. katame pa~nca? bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanaapo, verabahulo ca hoti, vajjabahulo ca, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m ^a^T3.0283^ea^ duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa khantiyaa. katame pa~nca? bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo, na verabahulo hoti, na vajjabahulo, asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa khantiyaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0235^ea^ ^a^P3.0255^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa. katame pa~nca? bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanaapo, luddo ca hoti, vippa.tisaarii ca, sammuu.lho ^a^M2.0223^ea^ kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa akkhantiyaa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa khantiyaa. katame pa~nca? bahuno janassa piyo hoti manaapo, aluddo ca hoti, avippa.tisaarii ca, asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa khantiyaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa apaasaadike. katame pa~nca? attaapi attaana.m upavadati, anuvicca vi~n~nuu garahanti, paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa apaasaadike.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa paasaadike ^a^T3.0284^ea^. katame pa~nca? attaapi attaana.m na upavadati, anuvicca vi~n~nuu pasa.msanti, kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa paasaadike''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa apaasaadike. katame pa~nca? appasannaa ^a^P3.0256^ea^ nappasiidanti, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathatta.m hoti, satthusaasana.m akata.m {na kata.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} hoti, pacchimaa janataa ^a^V2.0236^ea^ di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, cittamassa nappasiidati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa apaasaadike.

[01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa paasaadike. katame pa~nca? appasannaa pasiidanti, pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavo hoti, satthusaasana.m kata.m hoti, pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, cittamassa pasiidati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa paasaadike''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0224^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa aggismi.m. katame pa~nca? acakkhusso, dubba.n.nakara.no, dubbalakara.no, sa"nga.nikaapava.d.dhano {sa"nga.nikaapavaddhano (sii0), sa"nga.nikaaraamabaddhano (ka0)}, tiracchaanakathaapavattaniko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa aggismi''nti. navama.m.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa madhuraaya.m. katame pa~nca? visamaa, bahurajaa, ca.n.dasunakhaa, vaa.layakkhaa, dullabhapi.n.daa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa madhuraaya''nti. dasama.m.
[06] akkosakavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] akkosabha.n.danasiila.m ^a^T3.0285^ea^ ^a^P3.0257^ea^, bahubhaa.nii dve akhantiyo.
[22] apaasaadikaa dve vuttaa, aggismi.m madhurena caati..

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0237^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa viharato. katame pa~nca? assuta.m na su.naati, suta.m na pariyodaapeti, sutenekaccena avisaarado hoti, gaa.lha.m {baa.lha.m (syaa0)} rogaata"nka.m phusati, na ca mittavaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa viharato.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samavatthacaare. katame pa~nca? assuta.m su.naati, suta.m pariyodaapeti, sutenekaccena visaarado hoti, na gaa.lha.m rogaata"nka.m phusati, mittavaa ca hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa samavatthacaare''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0225^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa viharato. katame pa~nca? anadhigata.m naadhigacchati, adhigataa parihaayati, adhigatenekaccena avisaarado hoti, gaa.lha.m rogaata"nka.m phusati, na ca mittavaa hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa diighacaarika.m anavatthacaarika.m anuyuttassa viharato.

[01] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa ^a^T3.0286^ea^ samavatthacaare. katame pa~nca? anadhigata.m adhigacchati, adhigataa na parihaayati, adhigatenekaccena visaarado hoti, na gaa.lha.m rogaata"nka.m phusati, mittavaa ca hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa samavatthacaare''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^V2.0238^ea^ ^a^P3.0258^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa atinivaase. katame pa~nca? bahubha.n.do hoti bahubha.n.dasannicayo, bahubhesajjo hoti bahubhesajjasannicayo, bahukicco hoti bahukara.niiyo byatto ki.mkara.niiyesu, sa.msa.t.tho viharati gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisa.msaggena, tamhaa ca aavaasaa pakkamanto saapekkho pakkamati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa atinivaase.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase. katame pa~nca? na bahubha.n.do hoti na bahubha.n.dasannicayo, na bahubhesajjo hoti na bahubhesajjasannicayo, na bahukicco hoti na bahukara.niiyo na byatto ki.mkara.niiyesu, asa.msa.t.tho viharati gaha.t.thapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisa.msaggena, tamhaa ca aavaasaa pakkamanto anapekkho pakkamati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa atinivaase. katame pa~nca? aavaasamaccharii hoti, kulamaccharii hoti, laabhamaccharii hoti, va.n.namaccharii hoti, dhammamaccharii hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa atinivaase.

[03] ``pa~ncime ^a^M2.0226^ea^, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase. katame pa~nca? na ^a^T3.0287^ea^ aavaasamaccharii hoti, na kulamaccharii hoti, na laabhamaccharii hoti, na va.n.namaccharii hoti, na dhammamaccharii hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa samavatthavaase''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa kuluupake {kulupake (syaa0 pii0), kuluupage (sii0)}. katame pa~nca? anaamantacaare ^a^P3.0259^ea^ aapajjati, raho nisajjaaya aapajjati, pa.ticchanne aasane aapajjati, maatugaamassa uttari chappa~ncavaacaahi ^a^V2.0239^ea^ dhamma.m desento aapajjati, kaamasa"nkappabahulo viharati. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa kuluupake''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa kuluupakassa bhikkhuno ativela.m kulesu sa.msa.t.thassa viharato. katame pa~nca? maatugaamassa abhi.nhadassana.m, dassane sati sa.msaggo, sa.msagge sati vissaaso, vissaase sati otaaro, oti.n.nacittasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `anabhirato vaa brahmacariya.m carissati a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjissati sikkha.m vaa paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissati'. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa kuluupakassa bhikkhuno ativela.m kulesu sa.msa.t.thassa viharato''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa bhogesu. katame pa~nca? aggisaadhaara.naa bhogaa, udakasaadhaara.naa bhogaa, raajasaadhaara.naa bhogaa, corasaadhaara.naa bhogaa, appiyehi daayaadehi saadhaara.naa bhogaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa bhogesu.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa bhogesu. katame pa~nca? bhoge nissaaya attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sammaa ^a^T3.0288^ea^ sukha.m pariharati, maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati, puttadaaradaasakammakaraporise sukheti ^a^M2.0227^ea^ pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati, mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati, sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa bhogesuu''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0260^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa ussuurabhatte kule. katame pa~nca? ye te atithii paahunaa, te na kaalena ^a^V2.0240^ea^ pa.tipuujenti; yaa taa balipa.tiggaahikaa devataa, taa na kaalena pa.tipuujenti; ye te sama.nabraahma.naa ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa vikaalabhojanaa, te na kaalena pa.tipuujenti; daasakammakaraporisaa vimukhaa kamma.m karonti; taavataka.myeva asamayena bhutta.m anojavanta.m hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa ussuurabhatte kule.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa samayabhatte kule. katame pa~nca? ye te atithii paahunaa, te kaalena pa.tipuujenti; yaa taa balipa.tiggaahikaa devataa, taa kaalena pa.tipuujenti; ye te sama.nabraahma.naa ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa vikaalabhojanaa, te kaalena pa.tipuujenti; daasakammakaraporisaa avimukhaa kamma.m karonti; taavataka.myeva samayena bhutta.m ojavanta.m hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aanisa.msaa samayabhatte kule''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe. katame pa~nca? asuci, duggandho, sabhiiru, sappa.tibhayo, mittadubbhii -- ime kho, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0289^ea^, pa~nca aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime aadiinavaa maatugaame. katame pa~nca? asuci, duggandho, sabhiiru, sappa.tibhayo, mittadubbhii -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa maatugaame''ti. navama.m.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe. katame pa~nca? kodhano, upanaahii, ghoraviso, dujjivho, mittadubbhii -- ime ^a^P3.0261^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa ka.nhasappe.

[03] ``evameva.m ^a^M2.0228^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime aadiinavaa maatugaame. katame pa~nca? kodhano, upanaahii, ghoraviso, dujjivho, mittadubbhii. tatrida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa ghoravisataa -- yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, maatugaamo tibbaraago. tatrida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa dujjivhataa -- yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, maatugaamo pisu.navaaco. tatrida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa mittadubbhitaa -- yebhuyyena ^a^V2.0241^ea^, bhikkhave, maatugaamo aticaarinii. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa maatugaame''ti. dasama.m.
[06] diighacaarikavaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve diighacaarikaa vuttaa, atinivaasamaccharii.
[22] dve ca kuluupakaa bhogaa, bhatta.m sappaapare duveti..

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi *3.0290 ^a^V2.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu abhaavaniiyo hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? na aakappasampanno hoti na vattasampanno; na bahussuto hoti na sutadharo; na pa.tisallekhitaa {sallekhitaa (ka0 sii0)} hoti na pa.tisallaanaaraamo; na kalyaa.navaaco hoti na kalyaa.navaakkara.no; duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu abhaavaniiyo hoti.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu bhaavaniiyo hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? aakappasampanno ^a^P3.0262^ea^ hoti vattasampanno; bahussuto hoti sutadharo; pa.tisallekhitaa hoti pa.tisallaanaaraamo; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no; pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo ^a^M2.0229^ea^ ane.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu bhaavaniiyo hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.
[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] ``katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m ^a^T3.0291^ea^ parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa ^a^V2.0243^ea^; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo caa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu aavaasa.m sobheti. katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa ^a^P3.0263^ea^ hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa; pa.tibalo hoti upasa"nkamante dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetu.m samaadapetu.m samuttejetu.m sampaha.msetu.m; catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu aavaasa.m sobhetii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0244^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu gihiina.m {gihi.m (syaa0), gihii (katthaci)} anukampati. katamehi pa~ncahi? adhisiile {adhisiilesu (syaa0)} samaadapeti; dhammadassane niveseti; gilaanake upasa"nkamitvaa sati.m uppaadeti -- `arahaggata.m aayasmanto ^a^P3.0264^ea^ sati.m upa.t.thaapethaa'ti; mahaa kho pana bhikkhusa"ngho abhikkanto naanaaverajjakaa bhikkhuu gihiina.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaroceti -- `mahaa kho, aavuso, bhikkhusa"ngho abhikkanto naanaaverajjakaa bhikkhuu, karotha pu~n~naani, samayo pu~n~naani kaatu'nti; ya.m kho panassa bhojana.m denti luukha.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ta.m attanaa paribhu~njati, saddhaadeyya.m na vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu gihiina.m anukampatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0293^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi pa~ncahi? ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati; ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati; ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti; ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ^a^M2.0231^ea^ pasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti; saddhaadeyya.m vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi pa~ncahi? anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti; anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti; saddhaadeyya.m na vinipaateti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato aavaasiko bhikkhu yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa sivathikaaya {siivathikaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. katame pa~nca? asuci, duggandhaa, sappa.tibhayaa, vaa.laana.m amanussaana.m aavaaso, bahuno janassa aarodanaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa sivathikaaya.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime aadiinavaa sivathikuupame puggale. katame pa~nca? idha ^a^P3.0269^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagato hoti; asucinaa vaciikammena samannaagato hoti; asucinaa manokammena samannaagato hoti. idamassa asucitaaya vadaami. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, sivathikaa asuci; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``tassa asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagatassa, asucinaa vaciikammena samannaagatassa, asucinaa manokammena samannaagatassa paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. idamassa duggandhataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, sivathikaa duggandhaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``tamena.m asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa vaciikammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa manokammena samannaagata.m pesalaa sabrahmacaarii aarakaa parivajjanti. idamassa sappa.tibhayasmi.m vadaami. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, sivathikaa sappa.tibhayaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``so asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagato, asucinaa vaciikammena samannaagato ^a^T3.0299^ea^, asucinaa manokammena samannaagato sabhaagehi puggalehi saddhi.m sa.mvasati. idamassa vaa.laavaasasmi.m ^a^V2.0251^ea^ vadaami. seyyathaapi saa ^a^M2.0236^ea^, bhikkhave, sivathikaa vaa.laana.m amanussaana.m aavaaso; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[01] ``tamena.m asucinaa kaayakammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa vaciikammena samannaagata.m, asucinaa manokammena samannaagata.m pesalaa sabrahmacaarii disvaa khiiyadhamma.m {khiiyanadhamma.m (sii0)} aapajjanti -- `aho vata no dukkha.m ye maya.m evaruupehi puggalehi saddhi.m sa.mvasaamaa'ti! idamassa aarodanaaya vadaami. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, sivathikaa bahuno janassa aarodanaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca aadiinavaa sivathikuupame puggale''ti. navama.m.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime ^a^P3.0270^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa puggalappasaade. katame pa~nca? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathaaruupa.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa sa"ngho ukkhipati. tassa eva.m hoti -- `yo kho myaaya.m puggalo piyo manaapo so sa"nghena ukkhitto'ti. bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo hoti. bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo samaano a~n~ne bhikkhuu na bhajati. a~n~ne bhikkhuu abhajanto saddhamma.m na su.naati. saddhamma.m asu.nanto saddhammaa parihaayati. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo aadiinavo puggalappasaade.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yasmi.m puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathaaruupa.m aapatti.m aapanno hoti yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa sa"ngho ante nisiidaapeti ^a^T3.0300^ea^. tassa eva.m hoti -- `yo kho myaaya.m puggalo piyo manaapo so sa"nghena ante nisiidaapito'ti. bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo hoti. bhikkhuusu appasaadabahulo samaano a~n~ne bhikkhuu na bhajati. a~n~ne bhikkhuu abhajanto saddhamma.m na su.naati. saddhamma.m asu.nanto saddhammaa parihaayati. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo aadiinavo puggalappasaade.
